{"code":1,"isDone":false,"toInsertArticleList":[{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"5 inspiring quotes from legendary basketball coach John Thompson display how he modeled leadership","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/georgetown-coach-john-thompsons-best-quotes-on-leadership-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d282e7ffa48002894d28f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"john thompson\" height=\"1263\" width=\"1685\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Legendary Georgetown coach John Thompson Jr. died on August 31, 2020 at 78 years old.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Georgetown University/Collegiate Images via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Legendary basketball coach John Thompson Jr. died Monday, at 78 years old, his family announced in a statement.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>Thompson, the first Black coach to win an NCAA championship, mentored numerous NBA greats including Allen Iverson and Patrick Ewing, who stepped into Thompson's shoes as Georgetown coach <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/ap-georgetown-hires-patrick-ewing-as-mens-basketball-coach-2017-4\">three years ago</a>.</strong></li><li>Thompson, the first Black coach<strong> to win an NCAA championship, joined Georgetown University's team in 1972, when it had just come off a season with a win total of only three games. Within 10 years, Thompson turned the program into a powerhouse.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>The coach was passionate about advocating for underprivileged children and racial equality. He once boycotted two games to protest a rule that would deny financial aid to students with low SAT scores.</strong></li><li><strong>Throughout his tenure, Thompson talked about how he succeeded and his leadership style, while advocating for players and students. Business Insider rounded up five quotes that best show how he modeled leadership for so many years.&#160;</strong></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThompson likened his basketball coaching style to directing a play: \"I'm going to pick the script, and I'm going to give them their roles. They're the actors. Their job is to learn those roles — that's what practice is about. When we go out on the court, that's our stage. Out there, they're supposed to perform as we practiced. I don't want anybody making up new lines, putting on their own act.\"\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d423f7ffa48002894d303?format=jpeg\" alt=\"john thompson patrick ewing\" height=\"2016\" width=\"2689\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">ASSOCIATED PRESS</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Like other legendary coaches, Thompson used his prowess as a leader to turn a failing program around. The season before he was hired in 1972, Georgetown had won just three games, and it had made just one appearance in a championship game, all the way back in 1943.&#160;</p><p>Within a decade, Thompson transformed the losing team to a national contender, reaching the NCAA Tournament Elite Eight by 1980, and becoming a powerhouse in 1981 after recruiting basketball great Patrick Ewing.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Thompson attributed his team's success to mixing both talent with work ethic. \"Without talent, all the character in the world won't do it, but talent alone isn't enough,\" he said. \"There are great individuals and teams with lots of talent who don't win.\"</p><p>Besides winning, he distinguished himself as a leader and mentor to many young men, including Patrick Ewing, his great center from the 1980s and now his successor as Georgetown coach. An imposing 6'10\" himself, he specialized in centers, coaching both Dikembe Mutombo and Alonzo Mourning after Ewing, although the diminutive point guard Allen Iverson also came through his program.</p><p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.espn.com/mens-college-basketball/story/_/id/29778123/john-thompson-took-chance-hapless-georgetown-worked-miracle\">ESPN</a>, <a href=\"https://vault.si.com/vault/1980/12/01/the-gospel-according-to-john-georgetown-basketball-was-white-and-wan-before-john-thompson-came-in-to-recruit-blacks-and-to-preach-discipline-and-education\">Sports Illustrated</a> </em></p>\n\tJohn Thompson once met with a drug dealer who had befriended several of his players, and told him to stop coming to meet them. \"We cannot close ourselves off from the whole of society,\" he said of the meeting. \"Anybody who experienced the Len Bias situation knows we cannot isolate [ourselves], seal ourselves off from people. We'd better start confronting these problems.\"\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d37b360bf1f002807981d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"john thompson\" height=\"1156\" width=\"1541\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Matthew Stockman / Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>At the time of Thompson and the gang leader's meeting, crack cocaine was ravaging Washington DC. <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/1990/09/23/magazine/dc-s-war-on-drugs-why-bennett-is-losing.html\">The New York Times</a> estimated in 1990 that one in 10 of the city's residents used drugs, and named DC the \"murder capital\" of America.</p><p>But instead of painting dealers as villains, Thompson referred to them as \"our children,\" <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/sports/1989/04/29/thompson-met-with-drug-suspect-to-confront-problem/49928a80-1665-4071-847a-6d9d46d4d105/\">The Washington Post</a> reported, \"it's not like somebody crawled out of some hole who is so different from us.\" Thompson said the people who were involved with gangs and drugs had grown up with his Georgetown players and deserved empathy, too.&#160;</p><p>So Thompson decided to take matters into is own hands to ensure his players steered clear of violence &#8212; but with humanity. He invited the city's most prolific dealer, Rayful Edmond III, who was <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/public-safety/after-30-years-behind-bars-80s-dc-drug-kingpin-rayful-edmond-iii-returns-to-court-in-hopes-of-early-release/2019/10/15/aa41da9a-ec58-11e9-9306-47cb0324fd44_story.html\">sentenced to a life without parole in 1990</a>, to his office and told him to stay away from his players. But Thompson said he didn't accuse him of anything, and Edmond came to talk to him with \"good intentions.\"&#160;</p><p>Thompson said while he felt \"tired\" by the city's drug problem, \"being&#160;tired when it comes to this is a luxury we cannot afford.\"</p><p><em><a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/sports/1989/04/29/thompson-met-with-drug-suspect-to-confront-problem/49928a80-1665-4071-847a-6d9d46d4d105/\">Source: Washington Post</a></em></p>\n\t\"What I hope to do is to bring attention to the fact that [Proposal 42] is very much discriminatory,\" Thompson said in protest of a rule that denied financial aid to students with low SAT scores. \"I'm beginning to feel like the kid from the lower socio-economic background who has been invited to dinner, had dessert, and now is being asked to leave.\"\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d3b7260bf1f002807982e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"georgetown coach john thompson\" height=\"1803\" width=\"2400\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mitchell Layton/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Thompson often used his power to advocate for underprivileged students.</p><p>The coach boycotted two Georgetown games in 1989 to protest an NCAA rule that would take away financial aid for students who earned below a 700 on their SATs. The coach said it discriminated against students in disadvantaged high schools, and his actions led the NCAA to ultimately modify the rule.</p><p>But Thompson didn't take these kinds of actions because he was soft on academics.&#160;The <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=29qrJx834RM\">Hall of Famer</a> boasted a <a href=\"https://guhoyas.com/hof.aspx?hof=1\">97% graduation rate</a> for his players during his time as Georgetown coach, something <a href=\"https://vault.si.com/vault/1991/02/18/the-head-hoyaa-revealing-look\">Sports Illustrated</a> called rare in the \"the often sordid business of college athletics.\"</p><p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://vault.si.com/vault/1991/02/18/the-head-hoyaa-revealing-look\">Sports Illustrated</a>, <a href=\"https://thehoya.com/thompson-protests-racist-proposition/\">TheHoya.com</a></em></p>\n\tJohn Thompson: \"I am not trying to be anything other than what I am, and I'm really not certain what that is.\"\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d3d877ffa48002894d2ed?format=jpeg\" alt=\"John Thompson\" height=\"1064\" width=\"1418\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jonathan Daniel/Allsport / Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Thompson also often showed humility, admitting he wasn't perfect. The coach said he knew he could work players too hard, and once said he spoke two languages: <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/sports/john-thompson-never-minded-rocking-the-boat-on-the-airwaves/2012/02/28/gIQA1xMvgR_story.html\">English and profanity</a>.&#160;</p><p>In an interview with <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/sports/1991/02/03/inside-the-man-what-makes-thompson-tick/954c2fe0-1f3c-49cb-a143-29d96cf837ee/\">The Washington Post</a> in 1991, Thompson said he's \"not Saint John.\"&#160;</p><p>\"I do not go to confession seven days a week,\" Thompson said. \"I am not a father figure to my players. They all have parents, mothers and fathers, and I think you insult those people when you call me a father image to their sons. It is not my intention to be a crusader for this cause or that cause. I don't want to be a social worker.\"</p><p>Thompson concluded that he's not trying to be \"anything other than what I am.\"</p><p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/sports/1991/02/03/inside-the-man-what-makes-thompson-tick/954c2fe0-1f3c-49cb-a143-29d96cf837ee/\">Washington Post</a>, <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/sports/john-thompson-never-minded-rocking-the-boat-on-the-airwaves/2012/02/28/gIQA1xMvgR_story.html\">Washington Post</a></em></p>\n\t\"Don't let the sum total of your existence be eight to 10 pounds of air.\"\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d56fe7ffa48002894d395?format=jpeg\" alt=\"john thompson\" height=\"722\" width=\"962\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">DOUG MILLS/ASSOCIATED PRESS</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>\"Don't let the sum total of your existence be eight to 10 pounds of air\" is perhaps Thompson's most famous quote, as he often repeated it to <a href=\"https://www.casualhoya.com/2020/8/31/21408891/twitter-mourns-loss-of-john-thompson-jr-ewing-mutombo-mourning-iverson-reed-jordan-magic-boeheim\">players and staff</a>.</p><p>During a ceremony honoring him 2012, Thompson elaborated on his saying:&#160;</p><blockquote class=\"blockquote\"><section class=\"blockquote-wrapper\">\"The saying on that wall is that 10 pounds of air in a basketball should not be your sum total,\" Thompson said. \"We said that a lot about your experiences in the game because your life is useless if the only significance as a ballplayer and an athlete is 10 pounds of air in a basketball. I would tell the kids all the time, if they let all the air out of all the basketballs in the world, and you had no value, how significant is your life?'</section></blockquote><p>When Allen Iverson made the Hall of Fame, he <a href=\"https://twitter.com/RexChapman/status/1300419695800193026?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Etweet&#38;_ga=2.39701796.688609218.1598905977-1045084183.1587332608\">emotionally thanked Thompson</a> for \"saving my life.\" On Monday he repeated the message <a href=\"https://twitter.com/alleniverson/status/1300433377166843905\">in a tweet</a>: \"Thanks For Saving My life Coach.\"</p><p>Given the <a href=\"https://www.cbssports.com/college-basketball/news/allen-iverson-dikembe-mutombo-michael-jordan-and-others-react-to-death-of-georgetowns-john-thompson/\">outpouring of remembrances</a> throughout the basketball community upon his death, eight pounds of air doesn't begin to sum up Thompson's life.</p><p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://guhoyas.com/news/2012/10/26/John_Thompson_Jr_Honored_as_Nike_Georgetown_Superstore_Opens#:~:text=WASHINGTON%20%2D%20Upon%20walking%20into%20the,%2D10%20pounds%20of%20air.%22\">GUHoyas.com</a></em></p>\n</div><div Akhtar)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f4d282e7ffa48002894d28f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn100@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-14-385_7586383e820284f5.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f4d423f7ffa48002894d303?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn78@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-17-045_a5bc667ae2deee22.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f4d37b360bf1f002807981d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn60@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-22-452_cf391c0fddb652cf.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f4d3b7260bf1f002807982e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn22@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-24-176_1ac9a8d62c9c0bf1.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f4d3d877ffa48002894d2ed?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn98@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-27-570_0f9d87f19cce07c0.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f4d56fe7ffa48002894d395?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn88@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-17-831_a4f8af10f7375a73.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=qwBUOcMghSQ:TJPdQ8FayGc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn70@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-922_1d5287826b379a10.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn80@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-14-200_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn77@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-13-332_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=qwBUOcMghSQ:TJPdQ8FayGc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn56@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-23-293_1faef28f1da2fb43.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn48@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-20-505_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/qwBUOcMghSQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn43@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-15-971_54c11f534ccbaf00.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683392},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"As online and streaming platforms kill off traditional television, conventions have become more irrelevant than ever","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/republican-democrat-convention-ratings-and-polls-matter-for-undecided-voters-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d201f60bf1f00280797a8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"republican democrat convention ratings polls\" height=\"1199\" width=\"2398\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The ratings and polling numbers following both the Republican and Democratic Party conventions say more about who&#39;s tuned out than who&#39;s persuadable.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mario Tama/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>It might be time to stop putting so much stock into the TV ratings on the major party conventions.</li><li>The largest audience arrived on the final night of each convention, with the Democrats edging out the Republicans with 24.6 million viewers compared to 23.8 million.</li><li>Nielsen found a decline in ratings for both the DNC and RNC this year compared to 2016, but the broader trends are worth paying more attention to.</li><li>More Americans are picking up their news in bits and pieces on social media, and there is no similar Nielsen-like source for streaming numbers.</li><li>While the convention programming may be geared toward getting out the vote and persuading undecided voters &#8212; who break <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/05/upshot/swing-voters-2020-election.html\">heavily male</a> &#8212; using TV ratings as a metric for predicting some sort of boost to the campaigns may no longer apply.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>Hemming and hawing over the ratings and polling bumps from the major party conventions every four years is <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2016/07/30/us/politics/convention-ratings.html\">nothing new</a>, but both of them taking place at least semi-virtually during a pandemic and recession is.</p><p>The sheer number of programming hours was roughly cut in half by both parties, with Democrats holding a more strictly virtual campaign while <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/photos-crowd-maskless-convention-white-house-trump-speech-social-distancing-2020-8\">Republicans packed the South Lawn at the White House</a> for the biggest speeches last Thursday night, while the rest spoke in front of a cavernous Mellon Auditorium in Washington.</p><p>Amid the unusual circumstances, overall viewership on conventional television was down, according to Nielsen's ratings, considered the gold standard in the TV business.</p><p>Yet the numbers following both the Republican and Democratic Party conventions say more about who's tuned out than who's persuadable.</p><h2>Parsing the raw numbers</h2><p>Televised viewership of the conventions has been steadily trending down, with both parties seeing a drop this year compared to 2016.&#160;</p><p>The Democrats outperformed the Republicans on TV each night, according to Nielsen.&#160;</p><p>Each convention's final night saw the biggest audience of the week, with the Democrats edging out the Republicans with 24.6 million viewers compared to 23.8 million.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d39417ffa48002894d2d4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screen Shot 2020 08 31 at 12.32.42 PM\" height=\"1012\" width=\"2024\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Total household viewership for the Democratic and Republican conventions.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Nielsen 2020 election hub</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Going beneath those numbers by network, Fox News cleaned up in its convention coverage, particularly during the RNC.</p><p>Fox News broke a cable news record for total viewers during a convention on the final night of the RNC when President Trump spoke, averaging 7.8 million in total, according to Nielsen and a breakdown of data from Fox sent to Insider.</p><p>On the other nights of the RNC, around 50% of the people watching the convention at all on TV were watching it on Fox News, with the other cable and major networks splitting up the rest, according to Nielsen.</p><p>The viewership was more evenly split among the networks during the DNC, and the decline of younger viewers is also a relatively evenly shared dynamic.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d41a360bf1f002807984b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screen Shot 2020 08 31 at 2.28.50 PM\" height=\"987\" width=\"1974\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Young voters have tuned out of the conventions since 2008.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.nielsen.com/us/en/insights/article/2020/2020-election-hub/\" target=\"_blank\">Nielsen 2020 election hub</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Interestingly, both nights two and four of the RNC this year got more viewers between 18 and 34 than the DNC, with First Lady Melania Trump and President Trump drawing eyeballs in primetime.</p><h2>Nielson numbers don't tell the whole story</h2><p>What the Nielsen data doesn't show is how many people are streaming the conventions or tuning out entirely.</p><p>When it comes to streaming, it gets a little more complicated.</p><p>There is no Nielsen equivalent for capturing online viewership, with major firms like Crowdtangle focusing on a variety of social media metrics but not live viewership of an event split between countless outlets online.</p><p>A viral claim that 128 million people watched the RNC's first night when streaming viewers were included has been <a href=\"https://apnews.com/afs:Content:9320290469\">debunked</a>, since there is no evidence for that figure and no empirical way to round up the streaming audience into one number.</p><p>A new poll from <a href=\"https://www.ipsos.com/en-us/news-polls/abc-republican-national-convention-2020\">Ipsos</a> shows how positively or negatively viewers found the convention programming, but that still doesn't account for who tuned out.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Sawyer Hackett  (@SawyerHackett) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300102144490602497?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 30, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>&#160;</p><p>However, there is polling out there showing that a sizable number of voters have what's sometimes referred to as \"Trump fatigue,\" where they block out the news.&#160;</p><p>Even by the midterms in 2018, Pew Research found <a href=\"https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2020/02/26/almost-seven-in-ten-americans-have-news-fatigue-more-among-republicans/\">two-thirds of Americans feel \"worn out\" by the news</a>, and that number <a href=\"https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2020/02/26/almost-seven-in-ten-americans-have-news-fatigue-more-among-republicans/\">hasn't budged in 2020</a>.</p><p>Trump's tweets have gotten fewer and <a href=\"https://www.axios.com/president-trump-tweets-engagement-4c6067a8-734d-4184-984a-d5c9151aa339.html\">fewer interactions over time</a>.</p><p>So while the convention programming may be geared toward getting out the vote and persuading undecided voters &#8212; who break <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/05/upshot/swing-voters-2020-election.html\">heavily male</a> &#8212; using the ratings as a metric for predicting some sort of boost to the campaigns may no longer apply.</p><p>Even if it weren't for the pandemic displacing the pageantry of the conventions in arenas, the modern landscape of people getting their news from disparate clips makes leaning heavily on the Nielsen ratings a risky bet.</p><p>Instead, the convention ratings show how much the American monoculture has broken down, and the incalculable amount of people who were not willing or able to make an appointment to watch the parties make their pitch in a televised infomercial.</p><p>The fall debates will likely fall to a similar scenario. And if the conventions are any indication, it might be safer to hold off on making any sweeping predictions following a singular televised event, given where American news consumers are by now.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/republican-democrat-convention-ratings-and-polls-matter-for-undecided-voters-2020-8'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?a=hx1MhLJfqI0:piDGxvsly_U:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img family","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/jacob-blake-father-trump-trying-to-call-family-cnn-pastor-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f482bbbcd2fec00296a4b01?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages 1228201676\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>WISCONSIN, USA - AUGUST 25: Jacob Blakeâs father Jacob Blake speaks during the press conference in front of the Kenosha County Courthouse in Kenosha, Wisconsin, United States on August 25, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tayfun Coskun/Anadolu Agency via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>In a live interview on CNN Monday, Jacob Blake's father refuted President Donald Trump's account of the White House trying to get the Blake family on the phone.</li><li>Less than an hour earlier, Trump said during his press briefing that he was unable to get in touch with the Blakes because \"they wanted to have lawyers involved, and I thought that was inappropriate so I didn't do that. But I did speak with the pastor of the family.\"</li><li>White House Senior Communications Adviser Ben Williamson tweeted, \"The President was referring to the pastor of Julia Jackson&#8212;Jacob Blake's mother.\"</li><li>The family's attorney later said the president reached out to Jacob Blake's mother's pastor and Trump declined to have a call if their legal team monitored it.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>Minutes after President Donald Trump explained why he wasn't able to get on the phone with Jacob Blake's family, Jacob Blake Sr. refuted the president's stated reason.</p><p>Thousands of Americans have been protesting against police brutality and racism anew after a Kenosha police officer shot Jacob Blake in Wisconsin on August 23. He is paralyzed from the waist down, and the officer is on administrative leave while the state Department of Justice investigates.</p><p>Earlier on Monday evening, Trump said from behind the White House lectern during a press briefing that the Blake family \"wanted to have lawyers involved,\" so the president ended up speaking to the \"family pastor\" instead.</p><p>\"We don't have a family pastor,\" Blake Sr. said on CNN when host Jim Acosta asked why Trump claimed he spoke with a pastor and not the family.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Josh Campbell  (@joshscampbell) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300567175741280256?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 31, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Blake Sr. was adamant that he did not want to \"play politics\" with his son's life, later adding, along with his lawyer, that he and his family received threats deemed serious enough that they had to temporarily relocate.</p><p>Benjamin Crump, the family attorney, told Acosta that the White House had been coordinating with Blake's mother and a pastor for her family to work out a phone call with the president.</p><p>\"But for some reason,\" Crump said, \"the call never came.\"</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;🇺🇸 MrRuffin ♌️  (@MrRuffin_) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300570107052130304?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 31, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>After the CNN interview aired, White House senior communications adviser Ben Williamson <a href=\"https://twitter.com/_WilliamsonBen/status/1300563650877497344\">tweeted</a>, \"The President was referring to the pastor of Julia Jackson&#8212;Jacob Blake's mother.\"</p><p>The Blake family legal team later released a statement saying Trump had reached out to Jackson's pastor, and the president declined to have a call if the family's legal team monitored it.</p><p>\"If the call had occurred, Ms. Jackson was prepared to ask President Trump to watch the video of Mr. Blake's shooting and to do what she has asked all of America to do &#8212; examine your heart,\" the <a href=\"https://twitter.com/AttorneyCrump/status/1300589771132227585\">statement on Crump's Twitter account</a> said.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Ben Crump  (@AttorneyCrump) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300589771132227585?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 1, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Democratic Presidential candidate Joe <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/trump-called-jacob-blake-mom-about-shooting-missed-call-2020-8\">Jackson, said she missed Trump's call</a> <a href=\"https://edition.cnn.com/videos/us/2020/08/26/jacob-blake-mother-julia-jackson-message-to-trump-hospital-crump-lemon-bts-vpx.cnn/video/playlists/jacob-blake-shooting/\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\">in a separate interview with CNN</a> that day.</p><p>\"I'm sorry I missed your call,\" she said on CNN, addressing Trump. \"Because had I not missed your call maybe the comments that you made would have been different and I'm not mad at you at all.\"</p><p>Jackson said she has the \"utmost respect\" for the president, adding: \"Like I said before, and I'm not saying this to him directly, we should always get the details from the right source before we start throwing bricks.\"</p><p>Trump is expected to visit Kenosha on Tuesday, despite <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wisconsin-governor-tony-evers-trump-letter-reconsider-kenosha-visit-2020-8\">Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers' request for the president to reconsider</a>.</p><p>\"I am concerned your presence will only hinder our healing,\" Evers wrote in a letter to the White House on Sunday. \"I am concerned your presence will only delay our work to overcome division and move forward together.\"</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a public","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/wish-discounts-files-to-go-public-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43d1c642f43f001ddfe97f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Wish filed to go public.&#160;</li><li>The company did not disclose whether it planned to go public via an IPO or direct listing.</li><li>Wish was <a href=\"https://www.generalatlantic.com/media-article/wish-valuation-rises-to-more-than-11-billion-following-series-h-financing-led-by-general-atlantic/\">last valued at $11.2 billion</a> in a $300 million Series H funding round led by General Atlantic in August 2019.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>Wish, the e-commerce marketplace <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wish-shopping-experience-review-2019-3\">known for</a> its rock-bottom prices, <a href=\"https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20200831005161/en/Announces-Confidential-Submission-Draft-Registration-Statement-Proposed\">said Monday</a> that it has confidentially filed paperwork with the US Securities and Exchange Commission to go public.&#160;</p><p>The company did not disclose any of its financial information or share whether it planned to go public via an IPO or direct listing.&#160;</p><p>Wish was <a href=\"https://www.generalatlantic.com/media-article/wish-valuation-rises-to-more-than-11-billion-following-series-h-financing-led-by-general-atlantic/\">last valued at $11.2 billion</a> in a $300 million Series H funding round led by General Atlantic in August 2019. It has more than 70 million active users and over one million registered merchants, <a href=\"https://www.wish.com/company_info\">according to</a> the company. Its vendors sell everything from apparel and home goods to electronics.&#160;</p><p>Much of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wish-shopping-experience-review-2019-3\">Wish's business was built</a> on shipping cheap goods directly from sellers and manufactures in China. At the time of its latest funding round, it said it would look to \"expand its merchant footprint in Europe and North America,\" according to <a href=\"https://www.generalatlantic.com/media-article/wish-valuation-rises-to-more-than-11-billion-following-series-h-financing-led-by-general-atlantic/\">a press release</a>.</p><p>Wish was founded in 2010 by former Google engineer Peter Szulczewski, who is currently the company's CEO.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/wish-discounts-files-to-go-public-2020-8'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a 397},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"The best coffee and espresso pods","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-coffee-and-espresso-pod","description":"<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Coffee pods are a quick-and-easy solution to making a cup of coffee or espresso.</strong></li><li><strong>The best Nespresso pod is the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00I08JAYG/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B00I08JAYG&linkId=685f0d75f05e641e7ec641b313c9a6dcf05e641e7ec641b313c9a6dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">The Donut Shop's Extra Bold Medium Roast</a>, and the best Illy pod is <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006ZH05H0/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B006ZH05H0&linkId=ffa39535219963351ff7b88ef3a6a8d6219963351ff7b88ef3a6a8d6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">IperEspresso espresso and coffee pods</a>.</strong></li></ul><p>To be clear, an espresso pod machine is not an espresso machine, and the liquid it delivers, while inspired, is not espresso. However, pod machines (coffee or espresso) make a morning cuppa quickly and easily, require almost no maintenance, and take up minimal counter space, so it's easy enough to justify having one.</p><p>For this guide, we tested three pod-based systems, the Nespresso, Keurig K-Cup, and Illy IperEspresso. We actually found Illy's espresso pods to produce the most espresso-like consistency of any pod we've tried. However, that's your only option, because only Illy makes the pods, so if you own an Illy machine, your choice is either <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/F4958B74-88DF-4FC3-848A-46B02B22AAFA?ingress=2&visitId=d618f9ab-293a-4d5c-9839-4cf45e73d2de&ref_=bl_dp_s_web_259388601193886011\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Illy's IperEspresso espresso and coffee pods</a> or nothing.</p><p>Depending on which machine you have, these are our taste-tested and approved top picks.</p><h2>Here are the best coffee and espresso pods:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Best Nespresso pods overall: <a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">The Donut Shop's Extra Bold Medium Roast</a></li><li>Best budget Nespresso pods: <a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow\">Nespresso OriginalLine pods</a></li><li>Best Illy pods: <a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\"></a><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/F4958B74-88DF-4FC3-848A-46B02B22AAFA?ingress=2&visitId=d618f9ab-293a-4d5c-9839-4cf45e73d2de&ref_=bl_dp_s_web_259388601193886011\" target=\"_blank\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\"></a></li></ul><p><em>Updated 8/31/2020. We updated prices and links.</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best Nespresso pods overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c3cc15fbd77303fee269844?format=jpeg\" alt=\"recaps\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>With <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XG2N6LT/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XG2N6LT&#38;linkId=0679aef1d5b12a4d0529dc4e6d8c68f1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Recaps Stainless Steel Refillable Capsules Reusable Pods</a>, you're free to build the perfect espresso-like shot on your own terms.</h3><p>There are more reusable Nespresso-compatible pods on the market than for any other pod coffee or espresso system, and the best pod for a Nespresso system is the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XG2N6LT/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XG2N6LT&#38;linkId=0679aef1d5b12a4d0529dc4e6d8c68f1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Recaps Stainless Steel Refillable Capsules Reusable Pods</a>.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XG2N6LT/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XG2N6LT&#38;linkId=0679aef1d5b12a4d0529dc4e6d8c68f1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Recaps</a> and <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00WOWZ74Q/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;creativeASIN=B00WOWZ74Q&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;linkId=30eebaccd35eb02d30840067ebf5d235\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Sealpods</a> are essentially the same contraptions, but Recaps pods win out because they come with a tamper in addition to the pods, and cost nearly $20 less than Sealpods. The fitted tamper is a huge help, especially when dealing with such tiny capsules, and made our experience filling them far less painstaking.</p><p>With that said, filling these pods is a chore. It gets easier the more you do it, but it is something you might accomplish better by sitting down. It's also tricky to learn the optimal size for grounds and tamping to produce a good shot in any given machine. It will take a while to dial these things in, but you should, with a little practice, get a much better shot than with the pre-filled Nespresso and third-party pods.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>(Sort of) environmentally friendly, much more cost-effective than single-use pods</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Still somewhat wasteful with single-use aluminum foil glue-on tops</p>\n\tThe best K-Cup pods overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c40b0d4ecbeb43aa55b6ad3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"donutshop\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00I08JAYG/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00I08JAYG&#38;linkId=685f0d75f05e641e7ec641b313c9a6dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">The Original Donut Shop's Extra Bold Medium Roast K-Cups</a> are not only among the most affordable single-use K-Cup pods but the clear favorite of Keurig users.</h3><p>From <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00I08JH58/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=48&#38;imprToken=d8ba22e2-65b5-689f-441&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B008YA1LQK&#38;linkId=30725162d824290d68d97fd20c728ab6&#38;th=1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Green Mountain</a> to <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00XA1075Y/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00XA1075Y&#38;linkId=9a3c06bb2f663315c597b1b7e6cd8084\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Dunkin' Donuts</a>, any number of brands make K-Cups filled with a variety of blends from their own grounds.</p><p>But one medium roast seems to be the most popular of all, and while I'm not a regular coffee drinker, I found that <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00I08JAYG/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00I08JAYG&#38;linkId=685f0d75f05e641e7ec641b313c9a6dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">The Original Donut Shop's Extra Bold Medium Roast</a> (made by Keurig Green Mountain) was the least offensive to my palate. It's a fuller-bodied medium roast that should appease most coffee drinkers. It's not overly bitter, nor is it overwhelmingly rich, but it's not flavorless either. It should also be mentioned that \"Extra Bold\" simply means that these cups are packed with more coffee than the usual K-Cup, which is another plus unless you're highly sensitive to caffeine.</p><p><strong>Pros:&#160;</strong>Less expensive than many other brands</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Apart from being single-use</p>\n\tThe best budget Nespresso pods\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c3d02e6aebf4252292e810c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"bestpresso1\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Some of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01EIA2YXI/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=62&#38;imprToken=d8ba22e2-65b5-689f-441&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01EIA2YXI&#38;linkId=ab1ad3615e76351baf568e631d49f6fb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Bestpresso</a>'s blends are better than Nespresso's, in our humble opinion. And, they're also the most affordable ones we've found (and enjoyed).</h3><p>I didn't love every flavor of these pods, but after tasting almost all of them, I was delightfully surprised by several. We all have different tastes, and it's hard to pin down any single brew, blend, or flavor for all, but <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01EIA2YXI/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=62&#38;imprToken=d8ba22e2-65b5-689f-441&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01EIA2YXI&#38;linkId=ab1ad3615e76351baf568e631d49f6fb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Bestpresso</a> was able to delight my picky palate, which is no small feat. And with twelve different flavors, there's sure to be one (or two or three) you'll enjoy.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01EIA2YXI/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=62&#38;imprToken=d8ba22e2-65b5-689f-441&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01EIA2YXI&#38;linkId=ab1ad3615e76351baf568e631d49f6fb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Bestpresso's pods</a> are not terribly different in design from Nespresso's own branded pods, and you get a comparable amount of crema and richness. I like the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MSDASG6/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01MSDASG6&#38;linkId=daec040bc03b28d0ff293f2e3ee029fe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Brazil blend</a>, but the best option for your first go might be a <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01EIA2YXI/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01EIA2YXI&#38;linkId=ab1ad3615e76351baf568e631d49f6fb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">variety pack</a> to suss out which you prefer.</p><p><strong>Pros:&#160;</strong>Affordable, 12 different flavors</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Some flavors may border on offensive</p>\n\tThe best reusable K-Cup pods\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c3fcf3becbeb42bfd216e24?format=jpeg\" alt=\"kcups\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00LGEKOMS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00LGEKOMS&#38;linkId=7aa378ab0b29433cc1560942ca2afcc8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">IParts Plus More Coffee's K-Cups</a> are simple little contraptions that allow you to brew your favorite coffee in a Keurig machine with barely any more effort than popping in a single-use cup.</h3><p>Reusable K-Cups, unlike espresso pods, are much less finicky. Because coffee doesn't require pressure to brew, a loosely-filled mesh pod will do the trick. You could probably make one yourself without much hassle, but then <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00LGEKOMS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00LGEKOMS&#38;linkId=7aa378ab0b29433cc1560942ca2afcc8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">IParts Plus More Coffee</a> has four-packs on offer for about $10, which is worth saving your time fiddling with wire and pliers on a Sunday afternoon.</p><p>This is the answer for just about any coffee-lover who wants a pod machine. You're not beholden to whichever companies produce Keurig-machine-specific pods for their own coffee. And while packing espresso pods for Nespresso machines is a meticulous exercise, you can just pile a couple of spoons-full of coarse grounds into these reusable K-Cups without much attention because their only job is to facilitate steeping.</p><p>The beauty of these contraptions is their simplicity &#8212; not a whole lot can go wrong with them &#8212; and pods, whether they're espresso or coffee, are not cheap. If you're going to go the Keurig machine route, this is the best K-Cup purchase you will make.</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong>&#160;Simple, affordable</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Thin, cheap plastic (but if you're gentle with them, they should be fine)</p>\n\tThe best single-use Nespresso pods\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cd5e937021b4c07524e8adb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"nespressowaycaps\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.shutterstock.com/g/vladi79\" target=\"_blank\">Phish Photography/Shutterstock.com</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/s?k=nespresso+pods&#38;rh=p_89%3ANespresso&#38;dc&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=97e886558b215dae1fbcd2395740930f&#38;qid=1547226747&#38;rnid=2528832011&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;ref=sr_nr_p_89_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Nespresso's OriginalLine pods</a> come in plenty of different roasts and flavors that can be brewed several different ways, offering the best variety of almost any pod system we've tried.</h3><p>Single-use pods are often limiting but Nespresso's OriginalLine pods come in more than 20 flavors. We also like that they can either be brewed as ristretto (~25ml), espresso (~40ml), or lungo (~110ml), and Nespresso has specific details on which ones they recommend for which brewing methods.</p><p>Being a strict espresso enthusiast, I find the Arpeggio and Ristretto flavors to be the best, but my advice is to order a variety pack and find out which you prefer.</p><p><strong>Pros:&#160;</strong>Large variety, designed for different brew styles, most compatible and convenient</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Not cheap, no comparison to fresh coffee</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/s?k=nespresso+pods&#38;rh=p_89%3ANespresso&#38;dc&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=97e886558b215dae1fbcd2395740930f&#38;qid=1547226747&#38;rnid=2528832011&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;ref=sr_nr_p_89_1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Shop all Nespresso OriginalLine pods on Amazon</a></h3>\n\tThe best Illy pods\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cd5f094021b4c08861930a3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"illyespresso\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Love is a strong word, but <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/F4958B74-88DF-4FC3-848A-46B02B22AAFA?ingress=2&#38;visitId=d618f9ab-293a-4d5c-9839-4cf45e73d2de&#38;ref_=bl_dp_s_web_2593886011\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Illy's IperEspresso espresso pods</a> produce the most espresso-like consistency of any pod we've tried. It's just too bad you can't fill them with the grounds of your choice (for now).</h3><p>The best Illy pods are the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/F4958B74-88DF-4FC3-848A-46B02B22AAFA?ingress=2&#38;visitId=d618f9ab-293a-4d5c-9839-4cf45e73d2de&#38;ref_=bl_dp_s_web_2593886011\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">pods that Illy makes</a>. But that's only by default: Relatively complex to the rest of the mainstream pod machines (and corresponding capsules), any third-party looking to join the competition has the work cut out for them.&#160;</p><p>That aside, Illy's pods might work the best of all because of how much pressure their design allows, providing the closest thing to espresso you can get from a pod machine. And, if you use <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005UBX8HQ/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_011119_best-espresso-pods-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B005UBX8HQ&#38;linkId=11d7c2c61f58796ae7496b92cabe0794\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Illy's X7.1 by FrancisFrancis!</a> machine, you'll get the closest thing to a cafe-quality espresso out of any pod machine I've ever tried. The only shame is that, especially with it being a $200-$300 machine, you can't use any other espresso besides what comes in Illy's pods.</p><p>There are a couple of brands offering capsules to fit Illy machines, but the Amazon reviews for them are so poor that we can't make a case for trying them just yet. I reached out to Illy about this, and a representative responded by saying that it's currently working on creating a more eco-friendly pod. Here's hoping, and a reusable option might even put them ahead of Nespresso in my book.</p><p><strong>Pros:&#160;</strong>Most espresso-like drink out of any espresso pod machine</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Expensive, almost exclusively Illy (which limits you to about four blends at the time of this writing)</p>\n\tHow to recycle your espresso and coffee pods\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c3e1ac510f0d001742cd211?format=jpeg\" alt=\"pods\" height=\"901\" width=\"1201\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.shutterstock.com/g/Photolango\" target=\"_blank\">Shutterstock.com/Photolango</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Each company has its own pods, but recycling pods for whichever system you decide to commit to is as simple as sending them back to the company, which will now recycle them for you.</p><p>Still, it's important to keep in mind that dedicating time to recycling pods is somewhat antithetical to the whole premise of these machines, which are designed to save us time. Those of us who don't have enough time to make a coffee in the first place is not likely to be the ones taking time out of the day or week to hit FedEx or UPS on the way to work or school. The plan is in place, but it does little to encourage consumers to use it, and, unfortunately, most of us do not.</p><hr /><h3>Nespresso</h3><p><a href=\"https://www.nespresso.com/us/en/order/accessories/original/recycling-bag\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nespresso will send you a recycling bag</a> (often included with the purchase of a machine), which you fill and seal and either drop off at a \"Nespresso Boutique\" (of which, admittedly, there aren't many) or any UPS drop-off location, all free of charge. <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=meSPeX6MJ7s\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Here's a short video about how it works</a>.</p><hr /><h3>Illy IperEspresso</h3><p><a href=\"https://www.illy.com/en-us/shop/coffee/iperespresso-capsules/capsule-recycle-kit/A080.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Illy's recycling plan</a> is, frankly, the least sensible of them all. The company charges you $15 for a recycling kit, which comes with a prepaid (by you) shipping label. If you're a member of Illy Casa (a pod delivery service), the recycling is included, but it's an expensive commitment in and of itself, and if you're not set on having at least a capsule a day, it's probably not worth it unless you have a lot of spare storage. Someone has, it turns out, ingeniously discovered that you can open and reuse an Illy capsule with a can opener. (<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ww8o-5fJyjk\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Here's a YouTube video</a> on that.) <a href=\"https://www.illy.com/en-us/shop/recycle-program/recycle-footer_us.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Here's how Illy's pod recycling program works</a>.</p><hr /><h3>Keurig K-Cups</h3><p><a href=\"http://www.keurigrecycling.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Keurig's K-Cups</a> are the easiest of all to recycle. Simply peel off the aluminum foil lid (which, yes, you'll have to trash), empty the grounds wherever you choose (they make great compost), and toss the #5 plastic cup into the recycling. <a href=\"http://www.keurigrecycling.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Here's how it works</a>.</p>\n\tCheck out our other great coffee buying guides\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ab5007ed0965949008b4621?format=jpeg\" alt=\"espresso maker\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-coffee-maker/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best coffee makers</a></h3><p>We've included top picks for all of these different types of coffee makers. We've tested the majority of our top picks and heavily researched those we have yet to use to bring you the best of all coffee makers.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-espresso-machine\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best espresso machines</a></h3><p>We spent dozens of hours researching, testing, and combing through the details of popular espresso machines to bring you the best options.&#160;</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-french-press\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best French presses</a></h3><p>You can brew coffee in a number of ways, but many connoisseurs swear by the French press method. Here are our top choices.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-milk-frother\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">The best milk frothers</a></h3><p>With a good milk frother, you can easily make lattes and cappuccinos at home, without relying on a barista or incurring the high coffee shop markup. Here are the best frothers.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/best-coffee-and-espresso-pod'>Business Insider</a></div><div r?i=ShxP01qWZzw:u_2SWqj98cY:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn28@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-12-936_0a688b3783207b52.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn48@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-20-505_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/ShxP01qWZzw":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn44@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-768_4fae0162058b48d9.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683390},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"Dow, S&P 500 cap off best August in more than 30 years as tech rally offsets broad weakness","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-market-news-today-sp500-dow-august-returns-tech-rally-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a37dc2fec1ade2e714a5c4f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"cme futures trader traders\" height=\"1500\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>US stocks closed mixed on Monday as an Apple-led rally in tech shares offset broad weakness in the energy, material, and financial sectors.</strong></li><li><strong>The benchmark S&#38;P 500 slid slightly but still posted its best August return since 1986. The </strong><strong>Dow Jones Industrial Average saw its strongest August since 1984.</strong></li><li><strong>Both <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/aapl-stock?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\">Apple</a> and <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/tsla-stock\">Tesla</a> gained after undergoing stock splits.</strong></li><li><strong>The strong month comes as </strong><strong>coronavirus cases continue to climb in the US. Tensions between the US and China also remain elevated over the potential sale of TikTok.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Read more on Business Insider</a>.</strong></li></ul><hr ><p>US stocks closed mixed on Monday as an <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/aapl-stock\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Apple</a>-led rally in tech shares offset broad weakness in the energy, material, and financial sectors. The <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/dow_jones?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dow Jones Industrial</a> <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/dow_jones?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Average</a> and <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/s&p_500_500\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">S&#38;P 500</a> ultimately capped off their best August returns since the mid-1980s.</p><p>The benchmark S&#38;P 500 slid slightly but still posted its best August return since '86. The Dow Jones Industrial Average turned in its strongest August since '84.</p><p>Two major stock splits took effect on Monday. Shares of <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/aapl-stock?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\">Apple</a> rose more than 3% after a 4-for-1 stock split, leading the Nasdaq higher. <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/tsla-stock\">Tesla</a> also climbed after its 5-for-1 split.</p><p>The historic August comes on the heels of repeated records for the S&#38;P 500 and Nasdaq composite index last week. They were driven higher by encouraging consumer-spending data and prospects of a prolonged low-interest-rate environment.</p><p><strong>Here's where US indexes stood at the 4 p.m. ET market close on Monday:</strong></p><ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/s&p_500?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestm=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">S&#38;P 500</a>:</strong> 3,500.31, down 0.2%</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/dow_jones?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dow Jones Industrial Average</a>:</strong> 28,430.05, down 0.8% (224 points)</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/nasdaq_composite?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nasdaq composite</a>:</strong> 11,775.46, up 0.7%</li></ul><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-investing-championship-strategy-matthew-caruso-contender-secret-to-return-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">US Investing Championship hopeful Matthew Caruso landed a 382% return in the first half of 2020. He shares the unique twist he's putting on a classic trading strategy &#8212; and 3 stocks he's holding right now.</a></em></p><p>Abroad, Nikkei 225 stocks rose in Japan, boosted after Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway said on Sunday &#8212; <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/warren-buffett-90th-birthday-stories-sees-candies-geico-berkshire-hathaway-2020-8-1029545669?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\">Buffett's 90th birthday</a> &#8212; that it bought stakes in <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/warren-buffett-reveals-6-billion-investment-5-japanese-companies-2020-8-1029546397\">five of the country's largest trading companies</a>.</p><p>Despite major indexes sitting near record highs, investors are still looking for signs of progress toward further economic stimulus. Congress is set to return from its recess in September and could restart talks on details of the next stimulus package, over which Democrats and Republicans were deadlocked.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-strategy-how-to-hedge-tech-stocks-at-risk-jpmorgan-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">JPMorgan lays out 2 reasons 'bulletproof'-looking tech stocks are actually at serious risk &#8212; and shares 2 simple trades for investors looking to protect themselves</a></em></p><p>Meanwhile, coronavirus cases continue to climb in the US, hanging over markets. Tensions between the US and China also remain high. On Friday, <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-31/china-throws-a-wrench-into-trump-s-plan-to-force-tiktok-sale?sref=Zwwm81xn\">Beijing claimed it could block a sale of TikTok</a> to buyers such as <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/msft-stock\">Microsoft</a>, <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/wmt-stock\">Walmart</a>, or <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/orcl-stock\">Oracle</a>.</p><p>Oil slumped on Monday. <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/oil-price?type=wti\">West Texas Intermediate crude</a> fell as much as 1% to $42.56 per barrel. November-expiry contracts of <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/oil-price\">Brent crude</a>, the international benchmark, slipped 1.3% to $45.21 at intraday lows.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-hedge-mutual-funds-market-favorites-goldman-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">GOLDMAN SACHS: Buy these 9 stocks that are poised to continue crushing the market as the 'shared favorites' of Wall Street's biggest investors</a></em></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original 6683395},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"Jack Ma's $30 billion Ant IPO could push tech fundraising to highest level since dot-com bubble's peak","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/ant-group-ipo-tech-stock-sales-dot-com-bubble-record-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d401260bf1f0028079843?format=jpeg\" alt=\"FILE - In this May 15, 2019, file photo, founder of Alibaba group Jack Ma arrives for the Tech for Good summit in Paris. (AP Photo/Thibault Camus, File)\" height=\"1750\" width=\"3500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>FILE - In this May 15, 2019, file photo, founder of Alibaba group Jack Ma arrives for the Tech for Good summit in Paris. Chinese billionaire Jack Ma is stepping down from the board of SoftBank Group Corp., as the Japanese technology company struggles over its risky investments such as office-sharing venture WeWork. (AP Photo/Thibault Camus, File)\n<p class=\"copyright\">Associated Press</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>Ant Group's upcoming IPO reportedly aims to raise a record $30 billion and could bring first-time tech fundraising to the highest level since 1999.</strong></li><li><strong>Should demand for the offering hold up, Ant's debut could bring global first-time stock sales to more than $57 billion, according to data collected by <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-30/jack-ma-s-ant-fuels-tech-ipo-frenzy-not-seen-since-dotcom-bubble\">Bloomberg</a>. The dot-com bubble's annual proceeds peaked at $62 billion.</strong></li><li><strong>The debut is the latest to enjoy surging investor demand for tech stocks. With concentration in giants like <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/aapl-stock\">Apple</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/msft-stock\">Microsoft</a> reaching historic highs, traders have turned to the IPO market for cheaper entry into the tech sector.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestutm_source=msn.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=msn-slideshow&utm_campaign=bodyurl?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestts&#38;utm_medium=ingest\">Visit the Business Insider homepage for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><hr ><p>Ant Group's <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/ant-group-ipo-jack-ma-files-record-deal-market-debut-2020-8-1029531900\">upcoming initial public offering</a> could bring tech IPO proceeds to the highest level since the dot-com bubble's 1999 summit.</p><p>The company &#8212; an affiliate to billionaire Jack Ma's <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/baba-stock\">Alibaba</a> empire &#8212; is targeting a valuation of $225 billion and could raise roughly $30 billion in the stock sale, <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-25/jack-ma-s-ant-group-files-for-ipo-in-hong-kong-and-shanghai?srnd=markets-vp\">Bloomberg</a> first reported last week. Should demand for Ant's IPO hold strong, the debut would push global first-time stock offerings by tech companies above $57 billion, according to data collected by <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-30/jack-ma-s-ant-fuels-tech-ipo-frenzy-not-seen-since-dotcom-bubble\">Bloomberg</a>.</p><p>The previous record was set in 1999, when investor interest in new tech stock offerings drove $62 billion worth of IPO proceeds. That year represented the peak of the dot-com era, before fledgling tech stocks tumbled at the turn of the century. By 2001, tech IPOs brought in less than $10 billion.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-strategy-how-to-hedge-tech-stocks-at-risk-jpmorgan-2020-8\" data-analytics-position=\"3\" data-analytics-module=\"\">JPMorgan lays out 2 reasons why 'bulletproof'-looking tech stocks are actually at serious risk &#8212; and shares 2 simple trades for investors looking to protect themselves</a></em></p><p>Ant's offering is already set to break records all on its own. Plans to raise at least $30 billion would just edge out Saudi Aramco's blockbuster $29 billion offering from the end of last year. The oil titan sold 3 billion shares at a $1.7 trillion valuation.</p><p>Ant aims to use the funds to accelerate its move into the financial industry and form an online marketplace. The company recently rolled out robo-advising and banking services to Alipay users.&#160;</p><p>Tech stocks are enjoying their best run-up in years as investors flock to the sector to ride out the coronavirus pandemic. Mega-caps including <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/aapl-stock\">Apple</a>, <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/msft-stock\">Microsoft</a>, and <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/goog-stock\">Alphabet</a> led all three major US stock indexes to erase their 2020 losses. The <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/s&p_500_500\">S&#38;P 500</a> and <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/nasdaq_composite\">Nasdaq composite</a> sit at record highs after the market's best August since 1984.</p><p>The sector's rally goaded several companies to enter the market despite the weakened economic backdrop and fears of tech crowding. July alone drove $19 billion in IPO proceeds, according to Bloomberg data, the biggest one-month haul since September 2014.</p><p>The pick-up in IPO activity revives the public funding market after it <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/ipo-market-status-lawyer-managing-director-startup-ceo-weigh-in-2019-11-1028685225#the-future4\">slumped through the end of 2019</a>. A highly anticipated trading debut from WeWork <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/wework-postpones-ipo-indefinitely-under-new-co-ceos-2019-9-1028563636?utm_campaign=browser_notification&utm_source=desktop?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestutm_source=msn.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=msn-slideshow&utm_campaign=bodyurlutm_campaign=bodyurl\">collapsed in a matter of weeks</a>, and investors shunned shares of <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/uber-stock\">Uber</a>, <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/pton-stock\">Peloton</a>, and <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/lyft-stock\">Lyft</a> when the firms first began trading. After years of buying into companies' stories and ignoring annual losses, investors began to prioritize profitability.</p><p>The market's summer surge threw a wrench into that shift. Tech giants' stretched valuations defy fundamental-based strategies, yet concentration in the stocks is its highest in decades. With investors looking for underappreciated tech names, the IPO market has grown into a steady supply of opportunities.</p><p><em><strong>Now read more markets coverage from Markets Insider and Business Insider:</strong></em></p><p><em><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/stock-market-strategy-jpmorgan-kolanovic-trump-reelection-odds-rising-polls-2020-8-1029549292\" data-analytics-position=\"1\" data-analytics-module=\"\">JPMorgan's quant guru lays out 2 reasons he sees Trump's reelection odds rising &#8212; and urges investors to position accordingly</a></strong></em></p><p><em><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/bill-ackman-child-investing-letter-accounts-economic-wealth-inequality-capitalism-2020-8-1029548114\" data-analytics-position=\"2\" data-analytics-module=\"\">Billionaire Bill Ackman says mandatory investing accounts for every US child could combat wealth inequality</a></strong></em></p><p><em><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-investing-championship-strategy-matthew-caruso-contender-secret-to-return-2020-8\" data-analytics-position=\"6\" data-analytics-module=\"\">US Investing Championship hopeful Matthew Caruso landed a 382% return in the first half of 2020. He shares the unique twist he's putting on a classic trading strategy &#8212; and 3 stocks he's holding right now.</a></strong></em></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a
