10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"The best teeth whitening kits","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-teeth-whitening-kit","description":"<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>The best teeth whitening kits come with everything you need to whiten your teeth, are easy to use, and are less likely to irritate your gums or teeth.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>The <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FCrest-3D-Whitestrips-Professional-Effects-Teeth-Whitening-Strips-Kit-20-Treatments%2F4648025046480250\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Crest 3D White Professional Effects Whitestrips kit</a> is our best overall pick because it's effective, simple, and fairly affordable.</strong></li><li><strong style=\"color: #000000;\">We interviewed four professional dentists to inform our choices and explain the ingredients and efficacy of each pick.</strong></li><li><strong><strong>This article was medically reviewed by&#160;<a href=\"https://dental.nyu.edu/faculty/ft/avr6.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Dr. Andr&#233; V. Ritter</a>,&#160;</strong></strong>DDS, MS, MBA, PhD, professor and chair of the Department of Cariology and Comprehensive Care at the NYU College of Dentistry.&#160;</li></ul><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Static</bi-shortcode><p>Let's face it. Some of the most addictive beverages and habits are not the best for our pearly whites. Fortunately, if you want white teeth, you don't have to say goodbye to coffee, soda, sweets, tea, or wine because there are many teeth whitening kits to choose from.</p><p>Teeth whitening is a <a href=\"https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/14/542830158/navigating-the-aisle-of-confusion-to-whiten-your-teeth\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">$3.2 billion worldwide industry</a>. Consequently, there are thousands of options out there, including expensive services at your dentist's office. Thankfully, if you want to save money, there are several effective kits that you can use at home. Below, we rank a few of the best options on the market with insight from four dentists: <a href=\"https://drania.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dr. Ania Mohelicki DDS</a>, <a href=\"https://www.dentaldesigncenter.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dr. Ira Handschuh DDS</a>, Dr. Patrick Campbell DDS, and <a href=\"https://www.aestheticsmilereconstruction.com/meet-dr-charles-sutera-iii/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dr. Charles Sutera DDS, FAGD</a>.</p><p>Experts say that whitening kits are safe when used as directed. However, gum irritation and tooth sensitivity are common side effects even when you follow the directions. For more input on how to whiten sensitive teeth, see the FAQ section at the end.</p><p>We undertook hours of research combing through both consumer and expert reviews and ratings and did personal testing before settling on the whitening kits we've included in this guide. Each of the teeth whitening kits below are effective, easy to use, and less likely to irritate your teeth or gums.</p><section data-slideshow-intro-content=\"\"><p><em>Updated on 7/24/2020 by Mara Leighton: Updated links and prices and added an FAQ section with insight from interviews with four dentists. Added <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com/?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FOpalescence-Go-15-Mint-Whitening%2F167015464%3Fi&xcust=1595625651528brya6f2vu528brya6f2vu\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Opalescence Go 15% Whitening Kit</a> as the best teeth whitening kit with mouth trays and removed the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Crest-White-Whitestrips-Whitening-Strips/dp/B01M63SQTI/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=ll1&tag=biipgf_121117_best-teeth-whitening-kits-20&linkId=826794e163bb717c040fc5e3c225012b&language=en_USp;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-amzn-asin=\"B01M63SQTI\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\">Crest 3D White Whitestrips with Light Kit</a> as the best hybrid teeth whitening option. We're currently testing other mouth tray and whitening gel options, and we will update this guide soon with our findings.</em></p><h3>Here are the best teeth whitening kits you can buy:</h3></section>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best teeth whitening strips\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a3192d44aa6b5bd198b48ee?format=jpeg\" alt=\"crest whitening kit\" height=\"815\" width=\"1087\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Crest</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>If resting a tray on your teeth doesn't sound appealing, <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FCrest-3D-Whitestrips-Professional-Effects-Teeth-Whitening-Strips-Kit-20-Treatments%2F46480250\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">Crest 3D White Professional Effects Whitestrips</a> are an effective, dentist-recommended way to get whiter teeth.</h3><p>The <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FCrest-3D-Whitestrips-Professional-Effects-Teeth-Whitening-Strips-Kit-20-Treatments%2F46480250\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">Crest 3D White Professional Effects Whitestrips kit</a> comes with 40 strips for 20 treatments (each treatment consists of a strip on the upper teeth and one on the lower teeth.) You are supposed to wear the strips for half an hour once per day.</p><p>Crest's \"Advanced Seal Technology\" offers a no-slip grip, which allows you to drink water and talk while wearing the strips. Crest claims that after the 20 daily treatments, you can remove 14 years of tooth stains. Hydrogen peroxide is one of the active ingredients in the Whitestrips.</p><p>The Reviews team interviewed <a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-teeth-whitening-products-dentist-recommendation-2017/#1-opalescence-pf-35-whitening-gel-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dr. Hadaegh DDS</a> to get his recommendations for the best whitening products. He recommended Crest's strips because the hydrogen peroxide levels are relatively low yet still effective.</p><p>But, one drawback of using strips is that they don't offer the custom fit of trays, which means you may notice some increased sensitivity if your gums come in contact with the whitening strips.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Produces results in four or five uses, recommended by dentists, low peroxide levels</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>May irritate the gums</p>\n\tThe best teeth whitening kit for sensitive gums\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f3ae070650894001d071f4d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"69493468 210c 4490 bf7b 3938de307b48_1.d296f6ea889694540f7abd08893e1ac5\" height=\"1228\" width=\"1637\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Walmart</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>If you're looking for more precision in your application to avoid gum sensitivity, your best bet is combining teeth whitening gel with mouth trays or guards like in the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FOpalescence-Go-15-Mint-Whitening%2F167015464%3Fi&#38;xcust=1595625651528brya6f2vu\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Opalescence Go 15% kit</a>.</strong></h3><p>The benefit of using a mouth tray or mouth guard with gel is that, unlike white strips, you aren't as likely to miss spots on the teeth or irritate your gums.&#160;</p><p>If you don't have whitening trays and want as close to professional results as possible, <a href=\"http://nhdentistrybeverlyhills.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">D</a><a href=\"http://nhdentistrybeverlyhills.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">r. Hadaegh DDS</a>&#160;has <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/safe-teeth-whitening-products-recommended-by-dentists\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">recommended</a> Opalescence Go 15% to Business Insider in the past. \"Like Crest 3D Whitestrips, the whitening gel comes in ready-made trays that adapt to your teeth all the way to your molars,\" he wrote. \"They have 15% hydrogen peroxide, which means you only need to wear them for 15 to 20 minutes a day for five to 10 days. It also contains potassium nitrate and fluoride to help reduce sensitivity while strengthening enamel.\" Because the concentration of hydrogen peroxide is so high, there's a chance you may still experience some sensitivity, in which case it's best to switch to a less concentrated alternative like Crest Whitestrips.</p><p>The prefilled trays can be worn right out of the package, but the kit is more expensive than other reusable options on this list. It's convenient, but you could save yourself money by buying reusable trays (or asking your dentist's office to make you some) and replenishing your <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.smiledirectclub.com%2Fproducts%2Fteeth-whitening-pens-8-pack\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">whitening pens</a> when they run out.&#160;</p><p><strong>Pros:&#160;</strong>Effective, greater control over application, potentially less gum sensitivity</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Expensive</p>\n\tThe best LED teeth whitening kit\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e4ef04304389533715585b3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best teeth whitening kit\" height=\"750\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Smile Direct Club</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>If you don't want to use strips and are determined to use an LED light, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Whitening-Hydrogen-Peroxide-Accelerator-Brighten/dp/B07GHBZ7KQ/ref=as_li_ss_tl?creativeASIN=B07GHBZ7KQ&#38;imprToken=pK-5mnrbPqnef.RQ2KgjlQ&#38;slotNum=7&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=w61&#38;tag=biip_103119_amazon-gifts-for-men-giftfinder-20&#38;linkId=4f18f03fb84c113205b11cae4458a5fb&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">SmileDirectClub Teeth Whitening Kit</a> is the way to go.</h3><p>SmileDirectClub, like many of the more expensive direct-to-consumer teeth whitening kits on the market, includes a mouthguard with an LED light inside that's meant to act as a catalyst for the hydrogen peroxide that whitens teeth &#8212; ideally, giving you professional results faster than other options. It also only requires <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Whitening-Hydrogen-Peroxide-Accelerator-Brighten/dp/B07GHBZ7KQ/ref=as_li_ss_tl?creativeASIN=B07GHBZ7KQ&#38;imprToken=pK-5mnrbPqnef.RQ2KgjlQ&#38;slotNum=7&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=w61&#38;tag=biip_103119_amazon-gifts-for-men-giftfinder-20&#38;linkId=4f18f03fb84c113205b11cae4458a5fb&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">10 minutes of use each day</a>.</p><p>However, studies don't seem to agree with the marketing claims that LED lights make teeth whitening more effective, and most of the dentists we interviewed agreed that they don't speed up the process. Dr. Campbell DDS put it succinctly: \"Frankly, these products are not worth the money.\" But, they do come with whitening pens that allow you a bit more control in terms of the application so you can avoid your gums and any increased sensitivity. There's also the option to buy only the <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.smiledirectclub.com%2Fproducts%2Fteeth-whitening-pens-8-pack\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">whitening pens</a> and invest in <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/D-I-Y-Thermo-molding-Mouth-Instant-Wholesale/dp/B003UP3PAY/ref=as_li_ss_tl?dchild=1&#38;keywords=whitening+teeth+trays&#38;qid=1595619236&#38;s=beauty&#38;sr=1-9&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipgf_121117_best-teeth-whitening-kits-20&#38;linkId=b1f9048eafb27dc86e9bdffe907cc337&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">whitening trays</a> for safe and precise application.</p><p>If you don't want to deal with whitening strips or buying gel and trays separately, or you're committed to trying the LED light system, then SmileDirectClub's <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Whitening-Hydrogen-Peroxide-Accelerator-Brighten/dp/B07GHBZ7KQ/ref=as_li_ss_tl?creativeASIN=B07GHBZ7KQ&#38;imprToken=pK-5mnrbPqnef.RQ2KgjlQ&#38;slotNum=7&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=w61&#38;tag=biip_103119_amazon-gifts-for-men-giftfinder-20&#38;linkId=4f18f03fb84c113205b11cae4458a5fb&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Teeth Whitening Kit</a> is one of the most convenient choices.&#160;</p><p>It's built to last you through one full year of treatments and includes nine whitening pens (enough for two full treatments, according to the company's estimates, plus one bonus pen) and the LED light mouthguard. Unlike most LED options that need to be plugged in overnight before you can use them, SmileDirectClub's version can plug right into your smartphone (Android or iPhone) and requires minimal battery power.&#160;</p><p>The company recommends using the device for five minutes in the morning and five minutes in the evening every day for a week, once every six months. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/smile-direct-club-teeth-whitening-kit-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">I tested the device</a> and found the company's estimates to be conservative &#8212; I got more than double the use out of the pens than expected.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Whitening-Hydrogen-Peroxide-Accelerator-Brighten/dp/B07GHBZ7KQ/ref=as_li_ss_tl?creativeASIN=B07GHBZ7KQ&#38;imprToken=pK-5mnrbPqnef.RQ2KgjlQ&#38;slotNum=7&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=w61&#38;tag=biip_103119_amazon-gifts-for-men-giftfinder-20&#38;linkId=4f18f03fb84c113205b11cae4458a5fb&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">SmileDirectClub's Teeth Whitening Kit</a> is $74 for the LED Light and an estimated 12-month supply of whitening pens, and $40 for the LED Light and 6-month pen supply. You can find them all <a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=1314817&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=58461&#38;urllink=&#38;afftrack=biipgf_121117_best-teeth-whitening-kits-20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">here</a>.&#160;</p><p><strong>Pros:&#160;</strong>Few reports of sensitivity issues, more precise application of whitening gel, reusable mouth guard</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Expensive, dentists agree the LED light will not make a noticeable difference&#160;</p>\n\tThe best natural teeth whitening kit\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a29b21ea3b474a60a8b47c8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"teeth whitening\" height=\"702\" width=\"936\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Miswak Club</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"http://amzn.to/2l0EDTn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Miswak Club Natural Teeth Whitening Kit</a> is your best alternative if you're looking for a natural, chemical-free approach to whitening your teeth.</h3><p>Teeth-cleaning sticks known as <a href=\"http://amzn.to/2l0EDTn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Miswak</a> have been used for thousands of years in what is now Pakistan, India, many African countries, and other parts of the world. And, a meta-analysis in the <a href=\"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3545237/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Journal of Ayurveda and Integrative Medicine</a> found that the Miswak was just as effective for oral hygiene as the toothbrush and toothpaste used by Western cultures.</p><p>The Miswak Club Natural Teeth Whitening Kit features two Miswak root sticks with two carrying cases. Each stick will last for three weeks of daily use. Miswak comes from the Arak tree, and this product contains no pesticides or chemicals. Miswak Club offers a 120-day money-back guarantee if you do not have noticeably whiter teeth after using their kit.</p><p>Several expert sites reviewed the Miswak Club kit because of the novelty of it. <a href=\"https://www.bustle.com/p/15-natural-teeth-whiteners-that-are-weird-but-genius-23813\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Bustle</a> liked that it comes with two sticks in the kit, doesn't make a mess, and is easy to bring along when traveling. <a href=\"http://www.subaholic.com/2015/05/18/miswak-club-product-review-may-2015/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Subaholic</a> found that the root works great, but thought the taste was terrible. And, <a href=\"https://www.apartmenttherapy.com/a-hippie-toothbrush-experiment-243209\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Apartment Therapy</a> was put off by the \"sweetly musky\" smell of the root but found that when you soak it in water with some peppermint oil, it is much more bearable.</p><p>Some reviewers have noted that it may take a few weeks of daily use to notice effects and that the smell may be a bit off-putting.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Inexpensive, easy to use, no added chemicals</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Takes some getting used to, smells weird</p>\n\tWhat else we considered\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5efe1bb55af6cc0bad612fb6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"s2263507 main zoom\" height=\"1359\" width=\"1812\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Sephora</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=2417&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sephora.com%2Fproduct%2Fglo-brilliant-teeth-whitening-device-P281835%3Ficid2%3Dproducts%2520grid%3Ap281835%3Aproduct\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">GLO Teeth Whitening Kit</a>:</strong> Glo Science and SmileDirectClub sell similar devices. They both use an LED mouthpiece to reportedly act as a catalyst for hydrogen peroxide, but SmileDirectClub is a better value at half the cost. We still recommend strips over gel and mouth trays over LED light options, though.</li></ul>\n\tCommon FAQs about teeth whitening\n\t\n\t<h3>What types of teeth whitening products exist?</h3><p>There are essentially two types of kits: ones that bleach your teeth to take stains off and ones that physically scrape off the stains. Whitening trays and strips have been the standard for decades and generally rely on carbamide or hydrogen peroxide. Activated charcoal powders had a spike in popularity recently, but the dentists we interviewed would tell you to nix the powders. Dr. Handschuh and Dr. Mohelicki told Business Insider that they don't recommend these because they can be abrasive and only remove surface stains.&#160;</p><p>There is a third type of teeth whitening product that simply blasts your teeth with LED light, which typically claims to speed up the process and achieve more intense results. However, most of the dentists we interviewed agreed that any gains from this treatment are short-lived or nonexistent. \"Most studies show some difference detected by computers, but no visual difference detected by the human eye. For the studies conducted in actual patients (in vivo), most found no added benefit for light-activated systems,\" says Dr. Sutera.</p><p>Only the SmileDirectClub system in our guide uses this technology, but it is used in conjunction with a whitening gel and a mouthguard that may offer better control over your placement and avoid increased gum sensitivity in comparison to strips.&#160;</p><h3>Which teeth whitening products are most effective?</h3><p>\"Shopping for teeth whitening products is very simple.\" Dr. Sutera explained. \"There is only one active ingredient in all teeth whitening products: hydrogen peroxide. It's the same agent whether it's prescription use or over the counter. Any other ingredients in the product are inactive fillers needed to create the right consistency of the product.\" If you see carbamide peroxide on your ingredient list, it's just a derivative of hydrogen peroxide.&#160;</p><p>\"The key is to understand that whitening can be effective at any percentage, but what differs is the time of use. A high percentage of hydrogen peroxide typically is only kept on the teeth for 20 minutes maximum, while a lower percentage can be worn for 6 hours or overnight.\" Dr. Sutera explains. \"Much of the selection comes down to personal preference. If you have a tendency to develop tooth sensitivity or if you want to minimize the risks of irritating your gums, that's when you'd select a lower concentration.\"</p><h3>A few warnings about teeth whitening kits</h3><p>Peroxide is effective, but it comes with several warnings. Pregnant or nursing women may want to <a href=\"https://www.webmd.com/baby/features/revamp-your-pregnancy-beauty-regimen#1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">stop using peroxide-based whitening products</a>. It also isn't suitable for children under 14 years old. And, you should not use peroxide for longer than two weeks of daily use without the supervision of a dentist.</p><p>The FDA does not recommend using any whitening gels with a peroxide concentration of higher than 18%. Two of the kits we recommend use peroxide (Crest Whitestrips and SmileDirectClub) but they should be safe for most people.</p><p>Again, you should always consult with your dentist before starting a course of treatment. For instance, if your darkened teeth are due to the natural thinning of tooth enamel that comes with aging, <a href=\"https://www.consumerreports.org/beauty-personal-care/tooth-whitening-at-home/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">whitening kits will not help you</a>. Also, they cannot whiten fillings, dentures, veneers, crowns, or caps.</p><p>Most importantly, Dr. Mohelicki says the biggest concern is wearing whitening kits for the right amount of time. \"Over-the-counter options are inexpensive when compared to in-office whitening, but they offer no gum protection. With no gum protection, users can experience increased sensitivity and even burns in severe cases.\"&#160;</p><h3>How to use teeth whitening kits effectively</h3><p>Before using a teeth whitening kit, brush your teeth so your whitening agent can make contact with the surface of your teeth to improve efficacy, and so it doesn't accidentally create an uneven white. \"Any buildup of plaque or food debris will not allow for the whitening agent to contact the tooth and therefore not allow the whitening agent to do its job,\" Dr. Campbell explained. \"You could end up with a speckled, uneven whitened appearance.\"&#160;</p><p>And, after you've whitened, try to avoid food and drinks that stain your teeth.\"I recommend that my patients stick to a 'colorless diet' just after whitening,\" Dr. Handschuh told Business Insider. \"Meaning, avoid highly-staining food and drink such as coffee, red wine, tea, sauces, etc.\" But, if you really want to, he recommends using a straw to bypass your teeth a bit.&#160;</p><p>As Dr. Sutera explained, whitening your teeth and then having a glass of red wine is like \"two people in a canoe paddling in different directions. The whitening products open the pores and clean them out. If you have coffee, tea, or red wine within 72 hours of whitening your teeth, your teeth are more likely to absorb dark stains and adversely impact your whitening results.\"</p><h3>Does teeth-whitening damage your enamel?</h3><p>\"Most studies show that whitening does not damage enamel,\" Dr. Sutera said. Though, there has been recent research that shows teeth whitening can affect proteins deeper in the tooth, though researchers are not currently sure if the damage is temporary or permanent, according to Dr. Sutera.</p><h3>How can you prevent tooth sensitivity?</h3><p>\"It is common for the majority of people to experience increased tooth sensitivity after having teeth whitening done.\" Dr. Mohelicki says. \"However, for those who already have sensitive teeth, I recommend starting out by trying a whitening toothpaste. This takes significantly longer than trying an over-the-counter product or having teeth bleached in-office, but it can be significantly less painful.\"</p><p>For whitening toothpaste, Dr. Sutera recommends patients with sensitive teeth use a toothpaste with potassium nitrate and fluoride and also use a fluoride mouth rinse. According to Dr. Sutera, potassium nitrate is the primary ingredient that helps with sensitive teeth, and fluoride a secondary option that has also been shown to help.&#160;&#160;</p><p>If you have sensitive teeth and want to use a teeth whitening agent, you may just want to avoid higher concentrations of hydrogen peroxide. \"The suggestion I would make is to use a lower concentration of whitening agent to get their desired whitening outcome while minimizing the risk of tooth sensitivity.\" Dr. Campbell said. \"Although anecdotal, I've found that brushing with <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Sensodyne-Sensitivity-whitening-toothpaste-Ounce/dp/B084ZJ6541/ref=as_li_ss_tl?dchild=1&#38;keywords=sensodyne&#38;qid=1595625370&#38;s=beauty&#38;sr=1-11&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipgf_121117_best-teeth-whitening-kits-20&#38;linkId=e952e8f66dff800d6256c23e8241d37b&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Sensodyne toothpaste</a> before and after whitening has helped me avoid sensitivity.\"&#160;&#160;</p><h3>Why do you feel increased sensitivity after you whiten?</h3><p>The bleaching temporarily weakens your enamel so the bleach can pass through it and further lift those stains, explained Dr. Mohelicki. \"When [our enamel] is weakened during the bleaching treatment, many patients find that it can be hard to consume hot beverages, ice-cold beverages, or even eat certain foods. This typically wears off within 72 hours of ending treatment.\"&#160;</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a con_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/12Ys5OZ1INc":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn35@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-17-365_4dbc2205c7beae75.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683395},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f058ef55af6cc6d782ba4a6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"FILE PHOTO: Tesla China-made Model 3 vehicles are seen during a delivery event at its factory in Shanghai, China January 7, 2020. REUTERS/Aly Song\" height=\"4000\" width=\"6000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tesla China-made Model 3 vehicles are seen during a delivery event at its factory in Shanghai\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Tesla on Monday unveiled a 48-second video showing a time-lapse of automobile production at its Gigafactory in Shanghai.</li><li>Spotted in the video are as many as eight robots producing a single Model 3 vehicle, Electrek points out, as Musk seeks to shift the company's focus toward global manufacturing and increasingly toward automation.</li><li>In May, Tesla's global vice president estimated that the Shanghai factory would be able to produce 200,000 cars a year by the end of the second quarter.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>Tesla showed off the inside of its Model 3 production hub at its Shanghai factory in a new video released over the weekend.</p><p>The 48-second time-lapse clip that was created by the US-based electric vehicle maker provides a look at what CEO and product architect Elon Musk describes as its \"Alien dreadnought,\" <a href=\"https://electrek.co/2020/08/31/tesla-video-production-gigafactory-shanghai-alien-dreadnought/amp/\">as Electrek, which first reported on the video, points out.</a></p><p>The video displays up to eight robots producing a single Model 3 vehicle. Musk is looking to shift the company's focus toward global manufacturing, building out additional car factories around the world, and increasingly toward automative production.</p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/yUVuiZUhbyA?start=5\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>&#160;</p><p>Tesla's Shanghai Gigafactory, which began making cars in November 2019, is a vital component as Tesla looks to scale up production and maintain profitability. In May, Tesla Global Vice President Tao Lin <a href=\"http://www.xinhuanet.com/fortune/2020-05/18/c_1126001716.htm\">estimated</a> that the Shanghai factory would be able to produce 200,000 cars a year by the end of the second quarter in an interview with Xinhua News Agency.</p><p>Like many China-based factories, the Shanghai Gigafactory experienced some setbacks this year, temporarily shutting down a few times amid the coronavirus pandemic.</p><p>Tesla's Model 3 sedan <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tesla-reopens-shanghai-factory-after-closure-caused-by-coronavirus-2020-2\">experienced production delays</a> in February as the Shanghai factory reopened after temporarily closing due to a \"government-ordered closure.\" Tesla also <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tesla-halts-shanghai-china-factory-last-operational-plant-report-2020-5\">halted</a>&#160;production in China in May after the company suffered from part shortages, but ended up reopening its facility after just a few days of being shut down.</p><p>Tesla <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tesla-begins-deliveries-of-china-made-model-3-cars-2019-12\">began exporting</a> its Model 3 vehicle in December 2019, just 11 months after construction of the facility went underway.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/tesla-cars-being-made-model-3-video-shanghai-china-factory-2020-8'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a Sully)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f058ef55af6cc6d782ba4a6?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn42@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-16-990_e6e26fbe7eee9d76.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=bfagD5yK8rI:HHuNyRqwzoo:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn11@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-17-034_0203fb8b1bc60f4e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn80@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-14-200_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn77@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-13-332_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=bfagD5yK8rI:HHuNyRqwzoo:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn21@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-11-048_785e61ecea7de20e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn48@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-20-505_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/bfagD5yK8rI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn90@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-11-520_95ae4ce2d31b9527.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683394},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"The best messenger bags","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-messenger-bag","description":"<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Messenger bags are a great choice for commuters, students, and anyone looking for an alternative to a backpack.</strong></li><li><strong>After looking at a ton of options, we've found that the <a href=\"https://amzn.to/3gEp76U\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Chrome Industries Citizen</a> is the best overall messenger bag for everyday use.</strong></li></ul><p>Originally used by bicycle couriers in New York City, the messenger bag is based on the types of bags used by messenger services as far back as the Pony Express. Messenger bags are an extremely popular alternative to backpacks, partly because they can usually carry the same amount of gear, but they are easier to access since you can simply shift the bag to your side or front. I prefer it on the subway, too, for the same reason. If it's crowded, I can just shift it in front of me, rather than having to take it off and hold it.</p><p>Just like backpacks, there are lots of different designs, qualities, and price points among messenger bags, enough to fit any budget or need. We've looked at a ton of bags to find the best options, and we've narrowed them down here. Read on to check out our top picks. You can also check out the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-travel-backpack\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">best travel backpacks</a> and our guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-backpack-students\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">best backpacks for students of all ages</a>.</p><h2>Here are the best messenger bags:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Best overall: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MG6QO08/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B01MG6QO08&linkId=4c45d3a12c473a530d147f52fec1b75c2c473a530d147f52fec1b75c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Chrome Industries Citizen Messenger Bag</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best for laptops: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X9NVMRU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B00X9NVMRU&linkId=5d18fd625684c618a4a103b7767c04225684c618a4a103b7767c0422\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Timbuk2 Command Messenger Bag</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best classic messenger bag: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01IXT9TEM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B01IXT9TEM&linkId=5aa5869040998035d3a885b0b6026d1740998035d3a885b0b6026d17\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">Timbuk2 Classic Messenger Bag</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best for the office: <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.jcrew.com/p/mens_category/bags/messengers_totes/abingdon-messenger-bag/AG970\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">J.Crew Abingdon Messenger Bag</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best leather messenger bag: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QI2RHAU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B00QI2RHAU&linkId=947356f67149970041a1cb47b51883b07149970041a1cb47b51883b0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Kenneth Cole Reaction Show Business Messenger Bag</a></strong></li></ul><p><em>Prices and links are current as of 8/31/20. We also added a selection of related buying guides.</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59949333f1a85026008b5728?format=jpeg\" alt=\"citizen messenger copy\" height=\"605\" width=\"806\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chrome Industries</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Roomy and durable, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MG6QO08/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01MG6QO08&#38;linkId=4c45d3a12c473a530d147f52fec1b75c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Chrome Industries Citizen bag</a> makes it easy to carry heavy loads whether on bike or on foot.</h3><p>Chrome Industries makes a few different backpacks and messenger bags that are well-adapted to cycling and city life, but the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MG6QO08/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01MG6QO08&#38;linkId=4c45d3a12c473a530d147f52fec1b75c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Citizen messenger bag</a> is one of the most popular &#8212; and for good reason. This timeless bag was designed for biking, and it has an iconic, durable design with space, space, and more space.</p><p>When you open the bag, there's one huge main compartment that takes up most of the bag. There's no padded laptop pocket, no internal dividers, and nothing else to take up space. Even though the contents of that main section are less organized, there's more room for all your gear. You can use a laptop sleeve to protect your computer and pouches or other sleeves to organize smaller items.</p><p>A larger slash pocket on the front of the bag can fit a bicycle U-lock or other items, while a slightly smaller slash pocket in front of the bag closes with a zipper and sits next to a few pen and pencil pockets. The bag is large enough to carry a laptop up to 17 inches, notebooks, pens, documents, chargers, maybe a change of clothes, and just about anything else you might need.</p><p>The main compartment is lined with a removable water-resistant tarp that's held in place with velcro, in case you need to dry it later. You can actually use this as a makeshift divider, putting items between the bag's outer shell and the tarp. It's a great way to keep dirty gym clothes separate from the rest of your stuff. The outer portion of the bag is built with an abrasion-resistant fabric and comes in a ton of color options.</p><p>The shoulder strap has a seatbelt buckle so that rather than having to swing the bag over your head, you can just pull it around your body and click the buckle into place. You can keep the strap adjusted shorter, which makes it easier to carry heavy loads or ride a bike. There's also a quick-adjust strap which makes changing the length a breeze. Importantly, the strap is well-padded and very comfortable to carry.</p><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Lots of space, comfortable to carry, very durable</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: Doesn't come in multiple sizes, may be bigger than some are looking for, wouldn't work well for a formal office</p>\n\tThe best for laptops\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59949942b0e0b526008b5789?format=jpeg\" alt=\"timbuk2 command\" height=\"638\" width=\"850\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Timbuk2/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X9NVMRU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00X9NVMRU&#38;linkId=5d18fd625684c618a4a103b7767c0422\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Timbuk2 Command Messenger Bag</a> is a well-designed bag that's built to manage any commute, from bicycle to subway to airplane.</h3><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X9NVMRU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00X9NVMRU&#38;linkId=5d18fd625684c618a4a103b7767c0422\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Timbuk2</a> was founded in 1989 when a San Francisco bike courier set out to design a new, efficient messenger bag. Since then, the company has perfected its original model and built a number of variations and other kinds of bags, like backpacks and luggage.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X9NVMRU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00X9NVMRU&#38;linkId=5d18fd625684c618a4a103b7767c0422\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Command messenger bag</a> was built for organization. The bag is generously endowed with pockets, buckles, and zippers for all your needs. When the bag is closed, there are three side entry pockets on the front that you can still access, and each one is closed securely with zippers. One smaller pocket is felt-lined, making it perfect for a smartphone or other electronics. The largest side pocket sits behind it, and is big enough for a bicycle U-lock, a magazine or newspaper, or a tablet, while the third pocket is on the other side of the flap and fits items like a power adapter or sunglasses.</p><p>Spinning the Command around, the laptop pocket is accessible through a zipper on the back of the bag, completely isolating it from the main compartment underneath the flap. The pocket is well padded, and there's a second pocket for a tablet. You can also separate the laptop to conform with TSA standards when traveling. On the back of the bag, outside of the laptop section, a luggage handle pass-through lets you place the bag securely on top of a roller bag.</p><p>The inside of the bag is extremely organized, which is always a welcome feature for a bag you're commuting with. Interior zip pockets keep smaller items accessible, while pockets for pens, pencils, and other supplies keep the essentials handy.</p><p>There's an exterior pocket for a water bottle, which can fit just about any type of bottle. At the top of the bag, a padded handle makes carrying the bag by hand a breeze. Like many Timbuk2 bags, the shoulder strap has a quick-release buckle, which lets you lengthen and shorten the strap with one easy motion. It's a real help if you're biking or carrying a heavy bag.</p><p>The bag is lined with a weather-resistant material to keep your belongings safe whatever the day may hold. There are many color options and multiple sizes of the Command bag available, so make sure to check the dimensions to see which one you need.</p><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Padded handle, adjustable strap, tons of pockets and organization</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: Some reviewers have suggested the laptop sleeve is thinly padded</p>\n\tThe best classic messenger bag\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/599499a5b0e0b51c008b579b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Timbuk2 classic\" height=\"1364\" width=\"1819\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/timbuk2/photos/a.78447976920.86686.25386426920/10154120880371921/?type=3&#38;theater\" target=\"_blank\">Timbuk2/Facebook</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Based on Timbuk2's original design, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01IXT9TEM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01IXT9TEM&#38;linkId=5aa5869040998035d3a885b0b6026d17\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Classic Messenger Bag</a> has a traditional look with updated extras.</h3><p>That's right, we've chosen a second Timbuk2 bag for this list. With more than 25 years in the business, the brand has managed to figure some things out and design great products.</p><p>Compared to the Command bag, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01IXT9TEM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01IXT9TEM&#38;linkId=5aa5869040998035d3a885b0b6026d17\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Classic</a> is relatively minimalist. It manages to be more compact with a simple design and it keeps more inside the bag under the flap. There's no real handle, save for a small loop of fabric in the back. Although this works for quick carrying, it's not sturdy enough for much more than picking up the bag. There's only one pocket you can access while the bag is closed. This side entry pocket has a zipper&#160;and is deep and wide enough for a few essential items like a work ID, a phone, a commuter pass, or maybe a wallet.</p><p>Once you open the bag, you'll notice that there isn't really a padded laptop pocket &#8212; rather, there's a divider running the length of the interior to bisect the main compartment into two sections. While that does create a section you can use for a laptop, you may want to put your computer in a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dagne-dover-laptop-sleeve-tech-pouch-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">laptop sleeve</a> to make sure it's adequately protected.</p><p>Inside, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01IXT9TEM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01IXT9TEM&#38;linkId=5aa5869040998035d3a885b0b6026d17\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Classic messenger bag</a> has a bunch of pockets to help organize gear and keep weight evenly distributed. An interior water bottle pocket up against one side keeps a bottle or thermos upright and in place, while a similar pocket on the other side can hold an umbrella.</p><p>A slash pocket near the front can hold relatively quick-access items like earbuds, while a zippered pocket on the outside of the bag that's covered by the flap has a key strap and hook. A hard-to-spot zippered pocket inside the bag and near the front is almost a \"secret\" compartment and has plenty of room for a wallet, a passport, or anything else you want to keep safe. Like the Command bag, the Classic also has a few pockets for pens and pencils, as well as other small office items.</p><p>The Classic is lined with weather-resistant material and has a quick-adjust shoulder strap. It also comes in a ton of colors and sizes. For cyclists, all sizes except for XS come with an optional, removable crossbody strap for added stability.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Clean, classic design, well-organized with great weight distribution, holds a lot</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: Poorly padded laptop area means you should use a laptop sleeve</p>\n\tThe for the office\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59949c56b0e0b5901a8b54c8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"j Crew\" height=\"1050\" width=\"1400\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">J. Crew</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>With a classic and sophisticated style, the <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.jcrew.com/p/mens_category/bags/messengers_totes/abingdon-messenger-bag/AG970\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">J.Crew Abingdon Messenger Bag</a> is equally at home in the office or on a weekend adventure.</h3><p>J.Crew is known more for its clothes than its accessories, but the company managed to use its knowledge and experience with classic styling to design a stylish, understated messenger bag perfect for the modern man. The <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.jcrew.com/p/mens_category/bags/messengers_totes/abingdon-messenger-bag/AG970\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">Abingdon Messenger</a> is built from a waxed cotton canvas with leather trim and pulls off a clean look that hides a handful of useful features.</p><p>Outside the bag on the front side, there are two mid-sized pockets which can hold any range of quick-access essentials. The bag's flap just covers the top of those pockets, which use hidden magnetic snaps to keep closed. At the back of the bag, a wide slash pocket also closes with a magnetic snap. The back pocket is perfect for a magazine or tablet &#8212; that way you can access it during a commute without opening the whole bag. Rounding out the exterior pockets are two small pouches on the sides. They seem to be designed for a rolled-up newspaper or a water bottle, but they're too narrow for most reusable ones. They work well for a compact umbrella, though.</p><p>Inside the bag, there are a few open pockets at the front &#8212; two medium-sized slip pockets can hold plenty of everyday items, with a few pockets for pens next to them. Against the rear of the main compartment, a medium-sized zippered pocket is good for loose items you want to keep more secure. A leather strap and buckle holds the bag closed, while the flap folds down and is secured by two more buckles with quick release loops. Rather than undoing the whole buckles, you can just slip the strap off a brass hook.</p><p>J.Crew has been making the <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.jcrew.com/p/mens_category/bags/messengers_totes/abingdon-messenger-bag/AG970\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">Abingdon Messenger Bag</a> for a few years and has been tweaking it since. While reviews in past years suggested that the strap could break or fray if you were carrying heavy items in the bag, J.Crew seems to have fixed that problem &#8212; I've used the bag to carry some pretty heavy stuff without any issue.</p><p>The bag is great because of its flexibility, both in terms of functionality and style. The bag is softer and less structured than many alternatives, which makes it easy to under-fill or overstuff depending on what you need for the day.</p><p>As far as style goes, the bag, which is available in two colors, is like a lot of J.Crew's clothing collection &#8212; it can dress up or dress down equally well. I've felt comfortable carrying it to a job interview while wearing a suit, as well as bringing it on&#160;an overnight trip wearing sneakers and jeans.</p><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Stylish, functional, flexible, lately well-constructed</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: No padded laptop pocket, strap is long so can be annoying for shorter people</p>\n\tThe best leather messenger bag\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59949e55f1a8501d008b5746?format=jpeg\" alt=\"kenneth cole\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Kenneth Cole Reaction/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QI2RHAU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00QI2RHAU&#38;linkId=947356f67149970041a1cb47b51883b0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Kenneth Cole Reaction Show Business Messenger Bag</a> is affordable and stylish, but it can also hold your laptop and other essentials.</h3><p>There are a lot of leather messenger bags out there, which made this category a hard one to pick. In the end, though, once I factored in price and value, it became an easy choice. The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QI2RHAU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081817_best-messenger-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00QI2RHAU&#38;linkId=947356f67149970041a1cb47b51883b0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Kenneth Cole Reaction Show Business bag</a>&#160;thoughtfully designed and a fantastic bag for the price.</p><p>The bag looks a little more like a traditional briefcase than some other messenger bags, but the benefit of this is a structured, protective laptop pocket. Because the bag holds its shape, you&#160;can easily carry folders and documents without worrying about them getting bent &#8212; a possibility with less-structured bags like the J.Crew Abingdon.</p><p>A front pocket runs the length of the bag and has organizer loops and pockets for pens, a cell phone, business cards, and more. There's also a zippered pocket within that section. The main pocket has the padded laptop pouch, plus two extra open-top padded pockets &#8212; these are great for a tablet or a charger. There's room left over for any other items, too. Finally, there's a full zippered section on the back of the bag. Big enough for files, folders or magazines, it can also be used as a quick-access pocket, which you can get to while the rest of the bag is closed.</p><p>The bag has a sturdy handle on top and the shoulder strap is removable, so if you ever wanted to carry it as a briefcase you have that option. The flap has two buckles with quick-release clasps so that you don't have to undo them every time you want to access the bag. It's available in four different colors and is a steal for the price.</p><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Great laptop protection, removable shoulder strap, good for carrying folders or documents.</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: More formal than most messenger bags, stiff.</p>\n\tCheck out our other great travel gear guides\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e629670fee23d58f316a5e4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Dagne Dover Dakota\" height=\"634\" width=\"845\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dagne Dover</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-backpack\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best backpacks</a></h3><p>Backpacks are perfect for anyone who commutes to work every day or just tends to carry a lot of gear with them when they go out. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-backpack\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best backpacks</a> whether you need one for school books, a laptop, or simply your daily essentials.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-carry-on-bag\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"c9ca92dba7366da5c77f1ea2e9b405f6\">The best carry-ons</a></h3><p>Checking a bag can be a pain and even cost you money, so you need reliable carry-on luggage that you can bring onboard. Here are our top picks.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-luggage/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"73c7e40654f9a5527838994821c3ea08\">The best checked luggage</a></h3><p>Traveling doesn't have to be a hassle. Having a great suitcase can be the difference between an amazing trip and a bad one. After much research and testing, here are our favorites.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-travel-backpack/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"b1f2495f6f1e11a6b0d94b577f0e7fec\">The best travel backpacks</a></h3><p>Backpacks are perfect for when you don't need a full suitcase, but you want more than a regular daypack or messenger bag. Based on our research and real-world testing, here are our top picks.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-packing-cubes\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best packing cubes</a></h3><p>Packing cubes are a great way to keep your belongings organized and can help you make the most of the space in your suitcase. We tested 18 sets of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-packing-cubes\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">packing cubes</a> to determine the best of the best.</p>\n</div><div 75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/VFeyaEcYxT0":null},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683395},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"How to watch 'The Boys' — Amazon's dark comic book adaptation is back for season 2 on September 4","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-the-boys","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d50cb7ffa48002894d35b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"the boys\" height=\"1180\" width=\"1577\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Antony Starr as Homelander, leader of the superhero team the Seven in &#34;The Boys.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon Prime Video</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Season two of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08F82VMXW/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_083120_how-to-watch-the-boys-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B08F82VMXW&linkId=515ecf7955d5cb40ead18a21588f5e1d55d5cb40ead18a21588f5e1d\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">\"The Boys\"</a> will premiere on Amazon Prime Video on September 4.</li><li>\"The Boys\" is a dark parody set in a world of corrupt superheroes. The show is based on the comic book series by Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson.</li><li>Led by Billy Butcher, the Boys want to expose the world's super-powered people as evil, corporate frauds, but they'll have to overcome a sadistic group of heroes known as the Seven to reveal the truth.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08F82VMXW/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_083120_how-to-watch-the-boys-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B08F82VMXW&linkId=515ecf7955d5cb40ead18a21588f5e1d55d5cb40ead18a21588f5e1d\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Amazon Prime Video</a> is included as part of an Amazon Prime subscription for $119 a year.</li><li>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-amazon-prime-original-shows\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">17 critically acclaimed Amazon Prime Video original shows to add to your streaming queue</a></li></ul><div id=\"ProductCard_5da8618acc4a0a2aa85fef22\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5da8618acc4a0a2aa85fef22&type=small\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5e28784d24306a101e35ab35\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e28784d24306a101e35ab35&type=small\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>\"<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08F82VMXW/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_083120_how-to-watch-the-boys-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B08F82VMXW&linkId=515ecf7955d5cb40ead18a21588f5e1d55d5cb40ead18a21588f5e1d\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">The Boys</a>,\" Amazon Prime Video's biggest show of 2019, is set to return for its second season on September 4.</p><p>Based on a comic book by Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson, \"The Boys\" depicts the darker side of the superhero genre. Billy Butcher, a former CIA operative played by \"Star Trek\" and \"Doom\" star Karl Urban, leads a group of vigilantes dedicated to exposing the world's biggest secret &#8212; that the superpowered heroes worshipped by the public are actually morally corrupt frauds working for an international corporation.</p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/MN8fFM1ZdWo\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>Antony Starr plays Homelander, the cruel and arrogant leader of Vought International's leading superhero team, the Seven. Season one of \"The Boys\" reveals just how depraved the superhero group can be, causing the deaths of innocent people without remorse, manipulating the public, and attacking their fellow teammates.</p><p>Season two sees a new hero named Stormfront challenging Homelander for leadership over the Seven and advocating for an army of one million superpowered soldiers. Meanwhile, Butcher's reason for revenge has been called into question just as the Boys have become the world's most wanted criminals.</p><p>The first season of \"The Boys\" received critical acclaim, and currently holds an \"84% Fresh\" rating on review aggregation website <a href=\"https://www.rottentomatoes.com/tv/the_boys_2019/s01\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-uri=\"f2ad7312150b5e3bbef67a81b2b07494\">Rotten Tomatoes</a>. Early reviews for season two have been positive as well, as the second season currently holds an even higher \"96% Fresh\" rating on <a href=\"https://www.rottentomatoes.com/tv/the_boys_2019/s02\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Rotten Tomatoes</a>.&#160;</p><h2>How to watch \"The Boys\" season 2</h2><p>\"The Boys\" season two will premiere on Amazon Prime Video on September 4. The first three episodes of the season will be available that day, while remaining episodes will debut weekly every Friday. Season two is scheduled to include a total of eight episodes, and the season finale is set to stream on October 9.</p><p>\"The Boys\" is only available on Amazon Prime Video, which is included with all Amazon Prime subscriptions. While Amazon Prime costs $12.99 per month or $119 per year, you can subscribe to Prime Video alone for $8.99 per month.</p><p>In addition to the upcoming second season of \"The Boys,\" all eight episodes of the show's first season are also available to stream on Amazon Prime video.</p><p>You can watch Amazon Prime Video on Android and iOS mobile devices, Amazon's Fire TV and Fire tablet devices, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, most smart TV brands, and your home computer. Prime Video will let you download original shows like \"The Boys\" for offline viewing as well</p><h2>More hit shows on Amazon Prime Video</h2><p>Along with \"The Boys,\" you can find a large collection of originals series and films on Amazon Prime Video, including award-winning shows like \"Fleabag,\" \"Transparent,\" and \"The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel.\"</p><p>We've put together a full list of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-amazon-prime-original-shows\">best original shows you can find on Amazon Prime Video,</a> and if you're looking for more TV shows based on comic books like \"The Boys,\" you can check out this list of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-comic-book-tv-shows-all-time-ranked-2018-3\">20 best comic book TV shows of all-time.</a></p><div id=\"ProductCard_5da8618acc4a0a2aa85fef22\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5da8618acc4a0a2aa85fef22&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5da8618acc4a0a2aa85fef22\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a
