top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div>\n\tWhere they deliver\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e5024b5fee23d43a52c17bb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Online House Plants Charts Delivery areas \" height=\"2125\" width=\"3334\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>If you want to send your plant to someone in the US or even select areas of Europe, <strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Leon</a><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\"> &#38; George</a> </strong>emerges as the clear winner. It's the only service that also ships to Alaska and Hawaii, plus France, Belgium, and Luxembourg.</p><p>However, there's also a catch: all of its large and extra-large plants are only available in the San Francisco Bay Area and Los Angeles with white-glove delivery.&#160;</p>\n\tShipping fees\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e5024cafee23d43e141b903?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Online House Plants Charts Shipping fees\" height=\"1215\" width=\"3334\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Expect to pay shipping fees starting at $5. For each service, the standard shipping fee depends on your order total. Overall, it seems like <strong><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Bloomscape</a></strong> offers the best shipping policies since it's a flat $7 for orders up to $50, which isn't a high bar, and then free for orders $50+.&#160;&#160;</p>\n\tPlant prices\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e5024dbfee23d472d7a4ae3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Online House Plants Charts Sample price comparison\" height=\"1584\" width=\"3334\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>We compared the prices of each service's potted, medium-sized Calathea Medallion. While <strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">The Sill</a></strong> had <a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2Fproducts%2Fcalathea-medallion%3Fvariant%3D30407496335465\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">the lowest price for the plant itself</a>, <strong><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2Fproduct%2Fphilodendron-birkin%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">Bloomscape</a></strong> is ultimately <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2Fproduct%2Fphilodendron-birkin%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">the cheapest place to buy it</a> after you factor in shipping.&#160;</p><p>Since both plant and shipping prices vary by company, we recommend that you check each website if you want to pay the lowest price. The example above is for one specific plant and the same results may not apply for other plants.&#160;</p>\n\tPackaging\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e4ffca5fee23d2333144187?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Online House Plants delivery:unboxing Gif\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>We've ordered plants from all three services, and the way they all arrived is pretty similar: in a cardboard box, wrapped carefully in generous padding or bubble wrap. We were impressed by how safely delicate plants reached us.</p><p>Sometimes, there was a little soil spillage, but overall they arrived unscathed and ready to place on our desks or windowsills immediately.&#160;</p>\n\tCaring for your plant\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e5052d2fee23d7d663e2be5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"plant care leon and george\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Leon &#38; George</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Care instructions are enclosed in the deliveries from each of these services, but what if you lose the instruction card, or you need additional assistance?&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">The Sill</a>: </strong>You'll find many online and offline resources for plant care, including a library of articles with answers to common questions; virtual 1:1 consultations ($29-$39) with a houseplant expert; and weekly care and project-based workshops. I tested one of The Sill's classes and found it informal and informative, here's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/the-sill-online-plant-care-workshop-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the full review</a>.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Leon &#38; George</a>: </strong><a href=\"https://blog.leonandgeorge.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">La R&#233;sidence</a>&#160;is the brand's dedicated blog for plant care tips and guides, decor tips, and more. You can also email the company for specific questions about your plants.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Bloomscape</a>: </strong>The company offers general care tips along with guides for every single type of plant sold. Its <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">library of resources</a> is the most organized of the three services, and if you want to speak to a real person, you can ask Joyce Mast \"the Plant Mom,\" a horticulturist and the mother of Bloomscape's founder. You can also attend an exclusive virtual class with Mast if you purchase its <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2Fproduct%2Fgrow-how-kit%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Grow-How Kit for $75</a>. The brand will donate $20 of every purchase to <a href=\"http://www.detroitprep.org/\">Detroit Prep</a> to support the city's students with at-home school supplies during the novel coronavirus.</p>\n\tReturn policies\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e50526ffee23d7fff31dcb3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"return policy bloomscape\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bloomscape/Instagram</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>It's tricky to return a live plant when you didn't buy it directly from a brick and mortar store. However, the three online shops may be able to provide a replacement depending on the situation, and they won't require a direct return.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">The Sill</a>:&#160;</strong>Returns and replacements are handled on a case-by-case basis.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">Leon &#38; George</a>:&#160;</strong>30-day guarantee for plants that have not died due to negligence of care. Leon &#38; George will replace your plant, but a delivery fee may apply.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Bloomscape</a>:&#160;</strong>30-day guarantee for plants and pots that arrive damaged. Bloomscape will replace your plant and won't charge a delivery fee.</p>\n\tAdditional accessories\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e4ffca6fee23d1fac4e28d7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Online House Plants Graphics GIF 2 Additional accessories\" height=\"900\" width=\"1090\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>In addition to plants, these shops offer items that help you take care of your new greenery (or just accessorize it).&#160;</p><p>Here are some fun products we found in each online store:&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">The Sill</a>:&#160;</strong>Sells planters, potting mix, watering accessories, and decorative \"message pops\"</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5e540304fee23d1b081edf88\" style=\"position:relative; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div>\n\tWhere to shop in real life\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e45c8564b661b16cd214538?format=jpeg\" alt=\"the sill store location\" height=\"960\" width=\"1280\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">The Sill</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Just because they originated online doesn't mean they can't be found in real life. If you want to see the plants in person and still have them delivered directly to your home, you can visit one of these physical storefronts.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">The Sill</a>:&#160;</strong>Stores in New York City, Los Angeles, and San Francisco.</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Leon &#38; George</a>:&#160;</strong>Partner showrooms in New York City, Los Angeles, San Francisco, and <a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2Flocations\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">more metropolitan areas</a>.&#160;</p><p><strong><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Bloomscape</a>:&#160;</strong>Currently does not have any physical stores.&#160;</p>\n\tThe bottom line\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e501865fee23d377f57bca5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Online houseplant delivery comparison 4x3\" height=\"2500\" width=\"3333\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alyssa Powell/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Depending on the specific type of plant you're looking for and the level of plant education you expect from your experience, you'll prefer one service over another. You may also take shipping locations, shipping fees, and return policies into consideration.&#160;</p><p>While <strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">The Sill</a></strong> offers the best giftable plants and care resources (on- and offline) and <strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Leon &#38; George</a></strong> is the only service that ships to all 50 states, <strong><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">Bloomscape</a></strong> has the best overall shopping experience and the cheapest shipping fees.</p><p>Having tested them all, we trust each to get you the plant you want, but we like Bloomscape the most because the site is user-friendly and offers a large variety of plants, from simple ferns to towering cane plants. It has unique accessories, plus you'll feel supported as you learn how to become a successful plant parent. The reasonable prices, 30-day guarantee, and good shipping policies don't hurt, either.</p><p>Comparatively, we found the selections of Leon &#38; George and The Sill to be less robust, and The Sill's various tiers of shipping costs can get cumbersome.&#160;</p><h3><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=79314&#38;urllink=www.thesill.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Shop houseplants at The Sill</a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=81579&#38;urllink=www.leonandgeorge.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Shop houseplants at Leon &#38; George</a></h3><h3><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fbloomscape.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" epad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=chmrEyHTvV8:ufAYNlCEZLw:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn16@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-18-546_51fa0261e322613b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn80@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-14-200_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn77@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-13-332_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=chmrEyHTvV8:ufAYNlCEZLw:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn72@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-18-755_d995b74aa2a7f129.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn48@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-20-505_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/chmrEyHTvV8":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn27@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-23-104_22342274ea14ff4a.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683391},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"New Jersey and California are starting to reopen indoor dining and movie theaters after months of closure","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/new-jersey-california-starting-to-reopen-indoor-dining-theaters-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d88507ffa48002894d473?format=jpeg\" alt=\"New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy\" height=\"1200\" width=\"2400\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jose F. Moreno/The Philadelphia Inquirer/AP Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Starting on Friday, movie theaters, restaurants, and other indoor venues in New Jersey will be allowed to open business to patrons at 25% capacity, Gov. Phil Murphy announced on Monday.</li><li>California is also cautiously letting counties with low virus transmission reopen indoor dining and other activities, with restrictions.</li><li>The two states, along with New York, had some of the worst outbreaks in the US, but they've gotten them largely under control.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>After being closed for nearly half a year because of the coronavirus pandemic, New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy announced on Monday that movie theaters, restaurants, and bars can start reopening their indoor spaces &#8212; cautiously.</p><p>Starting on Friday, theaters will be required to follow stringent guidelines and are limited to operating at 25% capacity with only up to 150 people, <a href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/31/coronavirus-new-jersey-permitted-to-reopen-movie-theaters-friday.html\">CNBC reported</a>.</p><p>\"Masks are required to be worn at all times in the theater unless you're pulling it down to put away a handful of popcorn,\" Murphy said at a news conference.</p><p>For indoor dining, people will be capped to groups of eight and diners are required to wear masks when they're not seated. <a href=\"https://covid19.nj.gov/faqs/nj-information/reopening-guidance-and-restrictions/what-are-the-reopening-rules-for-bars-and-restaurants-what-precautions-or-policies-must-they-take\">Restaurants and bars</a> will also be limited to operating at 25% capacity.</p><p>New Jersey is starting to reopen indoor spaces because it's largely gotten its outbreak under control.</p><p>Newly reported cases in New Jersey are around 330 per day as of Saturday, down from the peak of nearly 4,000 in April, according to <a href=\"https://coronavirus.jhu.edu/data/state-timeline/new-confirmed-cases/new-jersey/84\">data from Johns Hopkins</a>. Newly reported cases in the Garden State began leveling off in early-July.</p><p>Across the US, more than 6 million people have contracted COVID-19 and nearly 184,000 people have died from the disease.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Governor Phil Murphy  (@GovMurphy) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300484197698723840?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 31, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Murphy's announcement gives theater owners only four days to prepare for reopening ahead of Labor Day weekend, when the Christopher Nolan movie \"<a href=\"https://www.insider.com/tenet-review-confusing-dull-thriller-2020-8\">Tenet</a>\" is set to debut in the US.</p><p>But some theaters will stay closed. Cinemark won't reopen its four theaters in the state on Friday, <a href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/31/coronavirus-new-jersey-permitted-to-reopen-movie-theaters-friday.html\">CNBC reported</a>.</p><p>New Jersey's decision to reopen theaters comes just two weeks after a judge upheld Murphy's decision to keep theaters closed. The court ruling denied a motion for an injunction by the National Associate of Theatre Owners and cinema chains that would permit theaters to reopen, <a href=\"https://deadline.com/2020/08/judge-upholds-order-closing-new-jersey-movie-theaters-1203016328/\">Deadline reported</a>.</p><p>In response to the decision on Monday, a spokesman for the owners' organization told <a href=\"http://nj.com/\">NJ.com</a> that they have been willing to meet state guidelines in order to reopen safely.</p><h2>California is taking things county-by-county</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5efce8f2aee6a83272467e56?format=jpeg\" alt=\"california dining coronavirus\" height=\"1354\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Outdoor dining has been permitted in California.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Michael Tullberg/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>On Friday, California Gov. Gavin Newsom announced his <a href=\"https://covid19.ca.gov/industry-guidance/\">guidelines</a> to reopen movie theaters and other indoor venues.</p><p>The state will also begin to immediately allow indoor dining in 19 of its counties, <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-usa/new-jersey-california-allow-some-indoor-dining-to-resume-idUSKBN25R1U6\">Reuters reported</a>.</p><p>The plan for reopening includes a <a href=\"https://www.cdph.ca.gov/Programs/CID/DCDC/Pages/COVID-19/COVID19CountyMonitoringOverview.aspx\">color-coded framework</a> that categorizes counties into tiers based on the number of new cases per 100,000 and percent positive testing rate.</p><p>Counties with fewer than one case per 100,000 and less than 2% positive testing rate are \"Minimal, Tier 4,\" for example, and can allow restaurants to operate indoors with up to 50% capacity. Progressively more stringent measures are imposed the higher the case and positive test rates.</p><p>Statewide, <a href=\"https://coronavirus.jhu.edu/data/state-timeline/new-confirmed-cases/california\">nearly 4,000 daily cases were reported on Sunday,</a> according to Johns Hopkins data &#8212; an overall decline from recent weeks.</p><p>Indoor dining bans remain in many of California's populous counties, but hair salons were allowed to reopen throughout the state on Monday.</p><div 08-244_ec77a67313321f51.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683402},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"The best music streaming services you can subscribe to","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-music-streaming-service-subscription","description":"<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Music streaming services give you access to millions of songs for a monthly subscription fee so you don't have to buy individual songs or albums anymore.</strong></li><li><strong>Spotify is the best music streaming service for most people, but&#160;Apple Music,&#160;Tidal,&#160;Amazon Music Unlimited, and YouTube Music are also great options, depending on your needs.</strong></li><li><strong>If you're looking for a good pair of headphones or speakers to listen to your favorite music services on, be sure to check out our roundups of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/headphone-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best headphone deals</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-speaker-deals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best speaker deals</a>.</strong></li></ul><p>Music listening has come a long way over the past few decades. Gone are the days when you had to buy CDs, vinyl records, or cassette tapes. You don't even have to buy digital downloads anymore. These days, you can simply sign up to a music streaming service and have access to all the music you'll ever need on a device that sits in your pocket.</p><p>Of course, there are quite a few music streaming services out there, and they're all a little different. Because of that, it can be hard to find the service that's perfect for your needs.</p><p>When deciding which streaming service to get, it's worth considering a few things. For starters, you'll want to make sure that there's an app for your chosen streaming service on every device you use for music listening.&#160;</p><p>You'll also want to consider things like streaming audio quality and support for platforms like digital assistants. Voice assistants are getting better at working with third-party services, but they're still not great at it &#8212; especially when it comes to Siri.&#160;</p><p>Still figuring out which streaming service is for you? We've done the research so that you don't have to. Here are the best music streaming services worth considering.&#160;</p><h2>Here are the best music streaming services:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Best music streaming service overall: <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Spotify</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best music streaming service for Apple devices: <a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2Fc%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best high resolution music streaming service for audiophiles: <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=17117&awinaffid=257137&clickref=&ued=https%3A%2F%2Ftry.tidal.com%2Fspringcom%2Fspring\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Tidal</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best music streaming service for Amazon Prime members: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/dmusic/promotions/prime.html?ref_=assoc_tag_ph_1402131587292&_encoding=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=pf4&tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&linkId=8061275a4e391cbf28134018d72d965d4e391cbf28134018d72d965d\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">Amazon Music Unlimited</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best music streaming service for Google users: <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/musicpremium\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube Music</a></strong></li></ul><p><em>Updated on 8/31/2020 by Steven Cohen: Revised pricing and free trial options for Spotify, Tidal, and Amazon Music. Removed paid promotion for Best Buy and Tidal. Added a link to our review of Amazon Music Unlimited.</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d1137d6e3ecba14f2544008?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Spotify\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Spotify</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Spotify</a> has a ton of music and audio content and it's available on a range of products, making it a great choice for those who listen to music on a variety of devices.</h3><p>Looking for a music streaming service that has a huge range of music and is compatible with all your devices? <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Spotify</a> is the way to go. Spotify is the original big music streaming service, and it has apps for all major platforms &#8212; including iOS, Android, and your preferred web browser.&#160;</p><p>One of the best things about <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Spotify</a> is that you can try it out without having to subscribe. There's a free, ad-based version of Spotify that you can use for as long as you like, as long as you're fine with hearing ads every now and then.&#160;</p><p>While on a desktop, many streaming services only work through web-based apps, <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Spotify</a> has native apps for everything. In other words, if you're on a Mac or PC and prefer a dedicated app, then you can get an app for Spotify. The service also has podcasts and video content, plus it streams music in up to a 320Kbps resolution, which should be good enough for the majority of listeners.</p><p>Of course, there are a few downsides to consider. For example, there's no live programming or lossless audio plan, like there is on some other music streaming services. Apart from that, however, <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Spotify</a> is a great streaming service that any music-lover will enjoy.&#160;&#160;</p><p>The ad-free version of Spotify starts at $9.99 per month for one account. There's also a Duo plan that supports two accounts for $12.99 month, and a Family plan that includes support for up to six accounts for $14.99 per month. Students can sign up for a discounted $4.99 per month plan as well.</p><p>New subscribers to the Spotify Individual Premium, Duo Premium, or Family Premium plans can currently receive a two-month free trial period. New Student Premium members can receive a free three-month trial.</p><p>For a detailed rundown of how Spotify stacks up to one of our other top picks, Amazon Music, check out our <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-music-vs-spotify\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">full comparison of both services</a>.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Highly compatible, has a ton of content, audio quality is good enough for most listeners, free version available</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>No live content, no lossless audio option</p>\n\tThe best for Apple fans\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d113b35e3ecba054c7607f2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Apple Music\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Apple</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a> works beautifully on Apple devices, plus there's an app for it across a range of platforms, including Android.</h3><p>If you use an iPhone and other Apple products, then it's worth considering <a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a>. Apple Music integrates very well with Apple's hardware and software, plus it's well-designed and works with your existing library of iTunes music. Not only that, but <a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a> has a library of 60 million songs, which is absolutely massive.</p><p>One of the best things about <a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a> is that it integrates with Siri and the Apple Watch perfectly, plus it can be played on a HomePod without issue. In other words, if you have other Apple devices, then <a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a> is probably the service to go for.</p><p><a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a> has a nice selection of content too. Apart from the songs available on Apple Music, the service also offers the Beats 1 radio station and some exclusive music.</p><p>Though Apple Music was initially missing a web browser option, Apple now allows subscribers to use the service through internet browsers on computers and laptops without having to install a separate app.&#160;</p><p>Apple Music starts at $9.99 per month for one account. A Family plan with support for six people is available for $14.99 per month, and a discounted Student plan is available for $4.99 per month. New members can receive a free three-month trial. That's one month longer than the trial period that Spotify currently offers for its comparable plans.</p><p>Unlike Spotify, however, <a href=\"http://apple.sjv.io/c/196318/435031/7613?subId1=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fmusic%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Apple Music</a> does not offer a free version with ads, so you will need to subscribe to enjoy the service's selection of songs.&#160;&#160;</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Huge selection of content, live radio, excellent integration with Apple devices, three-month trial</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>No free version, no lossless audio option</p>\n\tThe best for audiophiles\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d113e49e3ecba15104e39b2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Tidal\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tidal</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Ftidal.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Tidal</a> is available on a range of platforms, plus it offers much better audio quality than the majority of other music streaming services out there.</h3><p><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Ftidal.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Tidal</a> is a little different from other music streaming services in that it's targeted toward those who want a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-hd-audio\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">higher resolution audio experience</a> &#8212; and as such, it provides excellent sound performance.&#160;</p><p>While Tidal offers a Premium plan that uses the same 320Kbps bitrate that services like Spotify use, Tidal also has a HiFi plan that steps things up to a whopping 1,411Kbps in the lossless FLAC format. This means that you get to listen to music in <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-hd-audio\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">full CD quality</a> exactly as it was meant to be heard. It should be noted, however, that you will need higher quality audio gear and a Wi-Fi or wired connection to your playback device in order to really enjoy the benefits that lossless audio provides.</p><p>Tidal's HiFi plan also includes a selection of 3D audio tracks using the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-dolby-atmos\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dolby Atmos</a> or Sony 360 Reality Audio codecs. 3D audio uses spatial technology to create an expanded sense of dimension with more enveloping sound.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Ftidal.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Tidal</a> is also known for streaming some notable exclusive content. Albums like Jay-Z's \"4:44\" and Kanye West's \"The Life of Pablo\" were first launched on Tidal, and the service will likely get other exclusive launches too. There are also music videos and other behind-the-scenes content, plus <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Ftidal.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Tidal subscribers</a> get access to select concert and sports tickets.</p><p>Nothing's perfect, and <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Ftidal.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Tidal</a> is no exception to that rule. The service doesn't have some features that others offer, like lyrics, and there's no free version for those that don't mind an ad-supported service. The HiFi plan also costs more than most competing music streaming services &#8212; though you do get better sound quality for the higher monthly fee.&#160;</p><p>Tidal Premium starts at $9.99 per month for one account, and there's a Family plan for $14.99 per month with support for six people. Tidal HiFi steps the price up to $19.99 per month for one account, or $29.99 for the Family plan with support for six people. A Student Premium option is also available for $4.99 per month, along with a Student HiFi plan for $9.99 per month. A 30-day trial is available for new members who sign up for a regularly priced plan.</p><p>When it comes to other lossless music streaming options, Tidal has some tough competition from <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited/hd?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=a38eaeabc61c79022cdb1130634225e0&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Amazon's new Music HD plan</a>. This service offers similar high resolution audio for a more affordable price of $14.99 per month. Unlike Tidal, however, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited/hd?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=a38eaeabc61c79022cdb1130634225e0&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Amazon Music HD </a>doesn't include videos. Music HD is also available on fewer devices and it lacks the exclusive releases that Tidal features.&#160;</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Excellent audio quality with an option for lossless playback, available on a range of platforms, exclusive content, includes music videos</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>No free version, missing some features, HiFi plan is expensive</p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tidal-hifi-streaming-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Check our our full review of Tidal here</a></li></ul>\n\tThe best with Alexa\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d113ecbe3ecba33e8444633?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Amazon Music\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=f7d3aacb8782d88b4eac5d8710232831&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Amazon Music Unlimited</a> works on a range of platforms, plus it integrates perfectly with Alexa and offers discounts for Prime subscribers or Echo owners.</h3><p>If you're an <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/tryprimefree?ref_=assoc_tag_ph_1427739975520&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=pf4&#38;tag=bi_062419_setup-amazon-fire-stick-20&#38;linkId=07592d51046ccf2e2c5723cc680f3601\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Amazon Prime subscriber</a>, you might want to save a few bucks and go for Amazon's music subscription service, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=f7d3aacb8782d88b4eac5d8710232831&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Amazon Music Unlimited</a>.</p><p>If you're a Prime subscriber, you already have access to Prime Music, but if you want a more comprehensive streaming service, then it's worth stepping things up with Music Unlimited, which offers a much bigger music library.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=f7d3aacb8782d88b4eac5d8710232831&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Music Unlimited</a> is available on a range of platforms, including iOS, Android, and the web. The service is tightly integrated with Amazon's Alexa, so if you have an <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0749WVS7J/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B0749WVS7J&#38;linkId=7b365ea26a5264f2c7a810d0b1a9d77a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Echo</a> or other Alexa product, it'll work perfectly.</p><p>If you use other Amazon products, you might get a bit of a deal, too. Amazon Music Unlimited normally costs $9.99 per month, but <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/tryprimefree?ref_=assoc_tag_ph_1427739975520&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=pf4&#38;tag=bi_062419_setup-amazon-fire-stick-20&#38;linkId=07592d51046ccf2e2c5723cc680f3601\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Amazon Prime subscribers</a> can pay a discounted monthly fee of just $7.99 per month or an annual fee of $79 a year. Prime members can also choose a Family plan with support for six people for $14.99 per month or an annual plan cost of $149 a year. If you just want to stream music on one Amazon device, like an <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07R1CXKN7/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07R1CXKN7&#38;linkId=cb5afc9871b1e9b44120f2669fff97cf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">Amazon Echo</a> or <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0792KTHKJ/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B0792KTHKJ&#38;linkId=2e408ce23981217fa1a1cca23dfad7f2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Echo Dot</a>, you have the option for an even cheaper plan at just $3.99 per month.</p><p>New members can receive a free 30-day trial of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=f7d3aacb8782d88b4eac5d8710232831&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Music Unlimited</a>. After the trial, your subscription will automatically continue for the regular monthly price unless you decide to cancel.&#160;</p><p>When it comes to audio quality, Music Unlimited streams at 256Kbps. Amazon doesn't detail exactly how many tracks are included on Music Unlimited, but the company boasts a collection of \"over 60 million songs.\" <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=f7d3aacb8782d88b4eac5d8710232831&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Music Unlimited</a> doesn't offer any non-music content, but apart from that, it's a pretty great service for those plugged into the Amazon ecosystem.</p><p>For those who want lossless audio playback, Amazon also offers its <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited/hd?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=a38eaeabc61c79022cdb1130634225e0&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Music HD</a> service with support for high resolution audio playback. <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/music/unlimited/hd?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=a38eaeabc61c79022cdb1130634225e0&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Amazon Music HD</a> is available for a regular price of $14.99 per month or a Prime member discounted price of just $12.99 per month.</p><p>In addition to lossless audio, Music HD includes a selection of tracks mastered in <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-dolby-atmos\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dolby Atmos</a> and Sony's 360 Reality Audio codecs as well. These formats enable 3D audio on supported devices, including the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07G9Y3ZMC/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_062419_best-music-streaming-services-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07G9Y3ZMC&#38;linkId=e7f8ae000d9b66ee8b9afd7afd980071\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Echo Studio</a>.&#160;</p><p>For a detailed rundown of how Amazon Music stacks up to our top pick, Spotify, check out our <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-music-vs-spotify\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">full comparison of both services</a>.</p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-music-unlimited-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Check our our full review of Amazon Music Unlimited here</a></li></ul><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Discounts for Amazon Prime and Echo customers, good music library selection, Alexa integration</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>No content other than music</p>\n\tThe best for Android users\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d1135fde3ecba036c215da2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"YouTube Music\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">YouTube</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/musicpremium\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube Music</a> has a decent library of music, plus it integrates very well with Google's other apps and services, including Google Assistant.&#160;</h3><p><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/musicpremium\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube Music</a> is the way to go if you're really plugged into Google's ecosystem of products. In other words, if you have an Android phone and want your music streaming service to integrate well with Google Assistant, then YouTube Music is a convenient service.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/musicpremium\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube Music</a> isn't only available for Android devices. It's also available on iOS and on the web, so you should be able to access the service wherever you are. The platform is smart, so you'll get interesting location-based playlists and the ability to search for songs based on the lyrics in that song.</p><p>Of course, <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/musicpremium\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube Music</a> isn't perfect, but Google has been working on making it better. The app doesn't really integrate with other voice assistants like Alexa, so if you have an Echo you'll be stuck with playing music through the Bluetooth connection on your phone. With that said, the service does now support Siri.&#160;</p><p>Like Spotify, YouTube Music offers a free, ad-supported version that you can try out first. The Premium plan without ads is $9.99 per month for one account. There's also a discounted Student plan for $4.99 per month, and a Family plan with support for six people for $14.99 per month. All of the plans include a one-month free trial.</p><p>YouTube Music is also included as part of a <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/premium\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube Premium plan</a> for $11.99 a month. YouTube Premium includes exclusive video content and ad-free video playback. Since this option is only $2 more than YouTube Music Premium is on its own, this plan is a better value for music fans who also like to watch YouTube videos.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Interesting playlists, good integration with Google services, free version available</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Doesn't integrate with Alexa, no lossless audio option</p>\n\tCheck out our other related buying guides\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e7d0929671de0362706da9e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Apple Airpods\" height=\"1125\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>If you're signing up for a music streaming service, chances are you'll need a reliable media player or smartphone to access the app, along with a nice pair of speakers or headphones to actually listen to your favorite tracks on. With that in mind, we've highlighted some of our other buying guides for streaming players, mobile devices, headphones, and speakers that are sure to come in handy for anyone who wants to stream music.&#160;&#160;</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-streaming-box-stick\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best streaming sticks and boxes</a></h3><p>Though media players are primarily used for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-streaming-service\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">video services</a>, like Netflix and <a href=\"http://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?subId1=biip_111119_disney-plus&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fpreview.disneyplus.com%2F&#38;subid2=1585669242138akreo10th&#38;subId3=xid:fr1585669244095cbh\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a>, many streaming devices also offer access to music services like Spotify. With a dedicated streaming player you can listen to your favorite songs directly through your TV. Through research and testing we've picked <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-streaming-box-stick\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best streaming sticks and boxes you can buy</a>.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-smartphone\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best smartphones</a></h3><p>If you're looking for a reliable device to stream music on throughout the day, few options are as convenient as a smartphone. Android and iOS mobile devices offer access to a large assortment of music streaming services, allowing you to easily stream tracks over your mobile connection or Wi-Fi. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-smartphone\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best smartphones you can buy</a>.&#160;</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-noise-cancelling-headphones\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best noise-cancelling headphones</a></h3><p>After finding a device to access your favorite music streaming services on, you'll need something to actually hear your music through, and a good pair of noise-cancelling headphones are an excellent choice. With active noise cancelling tech, these headphones are able to minimize distracting ambient sounds, making it easier to hear your music. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-noise-cancelling-headphones\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best noise-cancelling headphones you can buy</a>.</p><hr /><h3>&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-wireless-earbuds\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best true wireless earbuds</a></h3><p>Completely free from wires, true wireless headphones allow you to pair each earbud to your phone without any pesky cables getting in the way. Some true wireless earbuds even include support for noise cancellation technology. After testing out several models, we've selected <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-wireless-earbuds\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best true wireless earbuds you can buy</a>.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-speakers\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best speakers</a></h3><p>Headphones are great for personal listening, but if you want music to fill your living room or office you'll need a nice pair of speakers. There are many different speaker types to choose from. For the best audio quality you'll likely want to go for a pair of floorstanding speakers or bookshelf speakers. Meanwhile, if mobility or digital assistant functionality are your primary concern, you'll be better off with a Bluetooth speaker or a smart speaker. With different needs and budgets in mind, we've picked <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-speakers\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best speakers you can buy</a>.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-speakers\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best Bluetooth speakers</a></h3><p>Bluetooth speakers allow you to listen to music wirelessly from a connected device. Though Bluetooth speakers typically don't offer the very best audio quality, they often feature other added benefits, like portability and digital assistant integration. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-speakers\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best Bluetooth speakers you can buy</a>.&#160;</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-dacs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best digital-to-analog converters</a></h3><p>If you plan on streaming hi-res music services, like Tidal or Amazon Music HD, then a dedicated digital-to-analog converter (DAC) will help unlock the full potential of higher fidelity tracks. A quality DAC can refine the processing of digital to analog audio transformations to optimize the sound produced by <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-smartphone\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">smartphones</a>, computers, and other connected devices. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-dacs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best DACs you can buy</a>.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"How to get a full or partial refund from Airbnb, or issue one as a host","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-get-a-refund-from-airbnb","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d4ff860bf1f0028079895?format=jpeg\" alt=\"woman traveling with suitcases\" height=\"1400\" width=\"2800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>It&#39;s not hard to get a refund on Airbnb.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Roos Koole/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>You can get a complete or partial refund as an Airbnb guest, or issue one as an Airbnb host.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>Before you request a refund from your Airbnb host, be sure to review the host's cancellation policy.</strong></li><li><strong>Any refund issues between a host and guest that can't be resolved within 72 hours can be submitted to Airbnb's Resolution Center for mediation.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><p>In a perfect world, there would never be a need for an <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/airbnb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Airbnb</a> host to issue their guests a refund.&#160;</p><p>But in the real world, plans change all the time, for all sorts of reasons, and sometimes those pristine pictures posted on a website aren't the most accurate representation of a property.</p><p>In other words, refunds are going to be a part of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/airbnb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Airbnb</a> experience. Fortunately, assuming both host and guest are working in good faith, getting a refund from Airbnb is a pretty easy process.&#160;</p><p>To make things as easy as possible on yourself, don't book a stay until your dates are locked and you have thoroughly vetted the property. If you realize the rental won't work, cancel it ASAP.</p><h2>How to get a refund on Airbnb</h2><p>To request a refund outside the grace period, which is usually 14 days before your rental period begins, the first step is to message the host. This creates a log that Airbnb employees can reference later if you can't work things out peer-to-peer.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e502fd5fee23d54932855c6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to get a refund from Airbnb\" height=\"507\" width=\"803\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Most rentals can be cancelled without fee for up to 48 hours after the booking is made.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Steven John/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>1.</strong> If you can't work things out with your host, go to the Airbnb <a href=\"https://www.airbnb.com/resolutions\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Resolution Center.</a></p><p><strong>2. </strong>First, click on the \"Request Money\" button.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d4c7760bf1f002807987a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"airbnb\" height=\"579\" width=\"1442\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can have the Airbnb service fee waived three times annually for cancelled reservations; after that, you will usually have to pay a fee.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Grace Eliza Goodwin/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3. </strong>Then click on the reservation in question.&#160;</p><p><strong>4. </strong>You can now click on the \"View Details\" button and then click to request a refund.&#160;</p><p>If you encounter any issues with the online system, you can call Airbnb at 1-855-424-7262 for further assistance.</p><h2>How to send a refund on Airbnb</h2><p>If you are a host and a guest has requested a refund prior to their stay, go to the <a href=\"https://www.airbnb.com/my_reservations\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Your Reservations</a> page and select the rental in question. Then simply click \"Issue Refund\" and confirm the action.&#160;</p><p>For guests requesting refunds during or after a stay as a result of some issue, you should first discuss the amount to be returned, and you will then need to use the <a href=\"https://www.airbnb.com/resolutions\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Resolution Center</a>. Once there, click on the reservation in question and then, under \"Select a Reason\" you can click \"Offer Partial Reimbursement.\"</p><p>Enter the amount agreed upon, the currency, and a message and submit the refund. Once the guest accepts the refund, it will be processed within 48 hours.</p><h2><strong>Related coverage from&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Tech Reference</a>:</strong></h2><ul><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-start-an-airbnb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to create an Airbnb listing and list your home or apartment on the platform<br ></a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-see-your-reviews-on-airbnb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to see your reviews on Airbnb in 3 simple steps</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/does-airbnb-allow-pets\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">'Does Airbnb allow pets?': How to find reservations on Airbnb that allow pets</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-leave-a-review-on-airbnb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">How to leave a review on an Airbnb as a guest in 3 simple steps</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-book-airbnb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to //cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/VSOe8Qe85q4":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn93@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-12-943_5ec437895c74ccdc.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683392},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"Zoom's stock soars as it reports blockbuster earnings with 355% revenue growth","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-q2-earnings-report-beat-expectations-revenue-growth-2020-8","description":"<figure> \n <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cf85ba611e2053a853c6542?format=jpeg\" alt=\"eric yuan zoom ceo\" height=\"3382\" width=\"4509\" charset=\"\"> \n  <figcaption>\n   Zoom CEO Eric Yuan. \n   <p class=\"copyright\">Reuters/Carlo Allegri</p> \n  </figcaption> </img>\n</figure>\n<ul class=\"summary-list\">\n <li>Zoom reported 355% revenue growth from a year prior in its second quarter earnings on Monday.</li>\n <li>Zoom's business has grown tremendously this year due to the coronavirus pandemic and the subsequent remote work mandates.&nbsp;</li>\n <li>The second quarter's beat follows <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-doubled-guidance-earnings-growth-risks-competition-analysts-2020-6\">Zoom's blockbuster Q1 earnings report in June</a>, when it reported 169% revenue growth from a year prior.&nbsp;</li>\n <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"f0e80ded5d35b2778c5da3bdda2e6898\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Zoom stock rose roughly 23% after-hours on Monday after its second quarter earnings soared past Wall Street's estimates on both the top and bottom line.</p>\n<p>Zoom's business has grown tremendously this year due to the coronavirus pandemic and the subsequent remote work mandates, and its revenue in Q2 grew a stunning 355% from a year prior. The second quarter's beat follows <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-doubled-guidance-earnings-growth-risks-competition-analysts-2020-6\">Zoom's blockbuster first quarter earnings report in June</a>, and blows past the 169% year-over-year revenue growth it reported in Q1.&nbsp;</p>\n<p>Zoom reported revenue of $663.5 million in its second quarter, much higher than the $500.2 million analysts forecasted. Meanwhile, it reported earnings per share of $0.92, surpassing analyst expectations of $0.45. Zoom also raised its full-year revenue guidance by about $590 million, to between $2.37 billion and $2.39 billion. It previously forecasted between $1.78 billion and $1.80 billion in full-year revenue. The new guidance takes into account the increase in remote work and the likelihood of a higher number of customers paying on a monthly basis in the second half of the year, Zoom said.&nbsp;</p>\n<p>Its number of large customers also increased, with 988 customers paying over $100,000 in trailing 12 months revenue. In the first quarter, Zoom reported 769 large customers. CEO Eric Yuan called out new deals with ExxonMobil and Activision Blizzard as new customer wins in a call with analysts. 81% of the revenue growth can be attributed to new customer subscriptions in the quarter, CFO Kelly Steckelberg said on the call.&nbsp;</p>\n<p>\"Organizations are shifting from addressing their immediate business continuity needs to supporting a future of working anywhere, learning anywhere, and connecting anywhere on Zoom's video-first platform,\" Yuan said in an earnings release.</p>\n<p>Zoom's valuation has surged this year: Even before the earnings on Monday, its stock was up more than 340% for the year to-date.</p>\n<p>Still, it hasn't been all good news. After <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-facing-multiple-reported-security-issues-amid-coronavirus-crisis-2020-4\">a spat of security blunders in the spring</a>, Zoom faced backlash earlier this summer over its initial plan to only provide end-to-end encryption to paid users. It eventually <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-end-to-end-encryption-update-all-free-paid-users-2020-6\">revised those plans to provide it to all users</a>.</p>\n<p>Then, in August, it <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-stop-direct-sales-mainland-china-partner-only-model-2020-8\">halted direct sales of its video conferencing products in mainland China</a>, and decided to only offer its technology through a few third-party partners. The decision came as Zoom's surge in popularity has led to scrutiny of its ties to China, though Zoom didn't cite that as the reason for the change. When asked on the earnings call what impact this would have on the company, Yuan said that it has had almost no impact on revenue, and that the decision was tied to simplifying its go-to-market model in China. Zoom also has a large research and development team in the country.&nbsp;</p>\n<p>Zoom also brought on some <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-power-players-eric-yuan-security-hiring-2020-6\">new leaders in the second quarter</a>, including Jason Lee as its new chief information security officer, VMware veteran Velchamy Sankarlingam as its new president of engineering and product, and Damien Hooper-Campbell as its chief diversity officer. Zoom also acquired secure messaging startup Keybase in early May to help it build end-to-end encryption into its product, with cofounder and CEO Max Krohn becoming Zoom's new head of security engineering. Earlier this month it also hired Jeff True as its new general counsel after promoting Aparna Bawa to chief operating officer in May.</p>\n<p>In May, it also announced plans to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-cfo-hiring-500-engineers-phoenix-pittsburgh-remote-work-2020-5\">build two new R&amp;D centers in Phoenix and Pittsburgh</a>, to hire a combined 500 new engineers over the next several years.&nbsp;It has also been expanding its hardware offerings, including a new $600 screen dedicated for Zoom calls, and plans to add Zoom capabilities to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/zoom-for-home-smart-display-device-facebook-amazon-google-2020-8\">smart devices like Amazon Echo Shows and Facebook Portals</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>\n<p><strong>Here are the most important numbers:</strong></p>\n<ul>\n <li>Revenue: $663.5 million. Analysts were expecting $500.2 million</li>\n <li>Earnings per share (adjusted): $0.92. Analysts predicted $0.45.&nbsp;</li>\n <li>Revenue (next quarter): $685 million and $690 million. Analysts had predicted $492.8 million.</li>\n <li>Earnings per share (adjusted, next quarter): $0.73&nbsp;and&nbsp;$0.74. Analysts predicted $0.35.</li>\n <li>Full year revenue: $2.37 billion to $2.39 billion forecasted.</li>\n <li>Customers paying more than $100K in trailing 12 months revenue: 988, up approximately 112% from the same quarter last fiscal year.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><em><strong>Got a tip?</strong>&nbsp;Contact this reporter via email at&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:pzaveri@businessinsider.com\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"6ddbcf32eb86321b95ad83b964aff5a2\">pzaveri@businessinsider.com</a>&nbsp;or Signal at&nbsp;925-364-4258.
