width=\"1203\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></em></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>E-learning poses an opportunity for cheap, impactful online learning in a way that makes sense for your schedule, budget, and interests.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=59453&urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Felive.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">CreativeLive</a> is the go-to site for creatives with more than 1,500 classes taught by 650+ industry-leading experts covering topics such as photo and video, art and design, music and audio, crafts and makers, or money and life.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>Classes start as low as $15, and you can buy and own them forever &#8212; just in case you need a refresher one day.</strong></li><li><strong>Below are <a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=59453&urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fcatalog%3Ffilter%3Dbest-sellers%26via%3Dlink-to-catalog_7to-catalog_7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">15 of the site's bestselling courses</a>.</strong></li></ul><p>Online classes and e-learning have become increasingly popular in the last few years &#8212; and for good reasons.</p><p>They're cheap, impactful, and a step towards a better career and/or personal life that you can begin almost instantaneously.</p><p>You can take <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-online-courses-from-the-best-colleges-2018-4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">courses from Ivy Leagues at a fraction of the cost of attending</a>, learn how to tailor a resume for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-resume-skills-list-linkedin-jobs-2018-4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">new job opportunities,</a> adapt to a shifting industry without heading back to a college campus, or <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-interesting-fun-online-courses-classes-coursera-2018-06\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">skirt an existential crisis</a> by learning a new skill at any point in your life.</p><p><strong>In other words, online classes provide meaningful access to affordable education &#8212; you just have to commit to showing up (or, rather, logging on).</strong></p><p>There are a plethora of computer and business classes on sites like <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&mid=39197&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.udemy.com%2F&u1=475258547.14906341947.1490634194\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Udemy</a>, <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&mid=40328&murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%2F&u1=475258547.14906341947.1490634194\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Coursera</a>, <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/https://www.lynda.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">LinkedIn Learning</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&awinaffid=257137&clickref=&p=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fw.edx.org%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">EdX</a>, but creatives may find the most appealing classes at <a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=59453&urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Felive.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">CreativeLive</a>.</p><p>The site houses over 1,500 classes taught by 650+ industry-leading experts. The community includes over 10 million students and each class falls under one of five categories: photo and video, art and design, music and audio, craft and maker, or money and life. Ultimately, the classes are centered around making creativity a habit, be it for personal or professional use.&#160;</p><p>As a CreativeLive student, you can watch on-air broadcasts for free on five channels for 24-hours a day, or you can buy a class and own it for life with the option to watch, rewind, and access bonus materials whenever. This is particularly great for anyone looking to develop a hobby, since you may fall out of consistent practice and want to pick it up again later. As a whole, the site adds structure, insight, and timetables to an industry that can feel obscure and opaque to beginners, as well as provide walk-throughs of new advancements for veterans.</p><p>If you're looking for a way to develop a creative habit, add industry know-how, or expand a creative business (many of which rely heavily upon the individual), then <a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=59453&urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Felive.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">CreativeLive</a> may be a tool worth considering.&#160;</p><h2>Looking for more e-learning? Here are some of the best online classes you can take</h2><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/where-to-take-classes-online\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">6 places to take free and affordable classes online, on everything from programming to photography</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/moma-musuem-of-modern-art-free-online-coursera-course\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">I use Coursera to take all the fun classes I never got to take in college, like the history of modern art &#8212; they're completely free and I can work at my own pace</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/data-science-courses-online\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\">10 affordable data science courses and programs you can take online &#8212; offered by Harvard, MIT, and companies like IBM, Google, and Amazon</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-online-resources-to-learn-new-language\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\">The best cheap or free online resources to learn a new language</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/online-courses-to-advance-your-career\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">12 affordable online courses that could help advance your career, according to a professional career coach</a></li></ul><h2>Below are <a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&u=1088116&m=59453&urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fcatalog%3Ffilter%3Dbest-sellers%26via%3Dlink-to-catalog_7to-catalog_7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">15 of the most popular courses</a> among CreativeLive students:</h2><p><em>Descriptions provided by CreativeLive and edited for length.</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tPricing and sales for photographers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b52bec023204aa666e3e4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"1200 1\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fpricing-and-sales-photographers-julia-kelleher\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Pricing and sales for photographers, $19 (originally $49)</a></h2><p>In order to make money as a photographer, you have to know how to price, package, and sell your work. In this 3-day course, small business owner and award-winning portrait photographer Julia Kelleher will teach you how to create a strategic sales system &#8212; without relying on over-the-top, hard-selling sales techniques.</p><p>By the end of this course, you will know how to predict your sales averages, forecast growth, and go from thinking about the next single sale to thinking about the next year of sales.</p>\n\tSpeedlights 101\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b5323d5873a4cd00fe918?format=jpeg\" alt=\"900\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fspeedlights-101-mark-wallace\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Speedlights 101, $19 (originally $49)</a></h2><section id=\"description\"><p>This workshop will give you the confidence to incorporate small portable flash in your photography toolkit. From shooting receptions at weddings or adding drama in senior portraits, this workshop will include lots of live shooting examples that will help everything make sense. Once you start working with a portable flash, you'll never understand how you lived without it.</p></section>\n\tFundamentals of photography\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b535715ea4b461c48d668?format=jpeg\" alt=\"900 1\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Ffundamentals-of-photography-john-greengo-2018\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Fundamentals of photography, $79 (originally $199)</a></h2><p>As a photographer, you will need to master the technical basics of the camera and form an understanding of the types of equipment you need. The Fundamentals of Photography class will also teach something even more important (and crucial for success) &#8212; how to bring your creative vision to fruition.</p><p>Taught by seasoned photographer John Greengo, who specializes in outdoor and travel photography, the Fundamentals of Photography places emphasis on quality visuals and experiential learning. In this course, you'll learn:</p><ul><li>How to bring together the elements of manual mode to create an evocative image: shutter speed, aperture, and image composition.</li><li>How to choose the right gear and develop efficient workflow.</li><li>How to recognize and take advantage of beautiful natural light.</li></ul>\n\tPosing for curvy women\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b5385b3b0924de5242434?format=jpeg\" alt=\"161201_Photo_Lindsey Adler_Posing_for_Curvy_Women_Course GFX_WEB_1600x900\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fposing-for-curvy-women-lindsay-adler\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Posing for curvy women, $19 (originally $49)</a></h2><p>Photographers are hired to capture portraits that accentuate the best features of their subjects. Fashion photographer Lindsay Adler will share techniques on how to photograph your full-figured and curvier clients by accentuating their lines and creating beautiful silhouettes.</p><p>This class will cover:&#160;</p><ul><li>Styling suggestions for full-figured women including a bridal session.</li><li>Camera angles and posing techniques for the most flattering images.</li><li>Photoshop techniques to help highlight your curvy subject.</li></ul>\n\tLighting & posing large groups\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b53af29d6d9523d4737c5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"900 2\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Flighting-posing-shooting-groups-lindsay-adler\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Lighting &#38; posing large groups, $11 (originally $29)</a></h2><section id=\"description\"><p>If you've photographed groups before you know it can be a challenge. This class will answer your questions and cover the most important considerations to keep in mind for your next group session. You'll learn depth of field, lens choice, posing, focus considerations, light modifiers, light position, and more.</p></section>\n\tRetouching for interior architectural photography\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b53f40b3c9b4b7506577c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"900 3\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fretouching-for-interior-architectural-photography-mike-kelley\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Retouching for interior architectural photography, $11 (originally $29)</a></h2><section id=\"description\"><p>Images of architectural interiors present particular challenges for retouchers. In this class, architecture photographer Mike Kelley will show you how to use exposure blending, manual masking, advanced blemish removal, curve adjustments and other techniques to achieve stunning interior shots.</p><p>You'll see how Mike overcomes extreme dynamic range, color casts from various sources and difficult perspective issues to create a professional interior architectural photograph.</p></section>\n\tWorkflow, time management, and productivity for creatives\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b541e0b3c9b4bb534d2e7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"5489 1\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Forganization-and-time-management-for-creatives-lisa-congdon\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Workflow, time management, and productivity for creatives, $15 (originally $49)</a></h2><p>Fine artist, illustrator, and author Lisa Congdon has worked with over 75 clients around the world including MoMA, REI Co-op, Harvard University, Martha Stewart Living, Chronicle Books, and Random House Publishing, among many others.</p><p>In this class, she will teach you how to establish effective workflows and time management strategies that will streamline your processes and maximize creative work time.</p><p>Among other things, you will learn:</p><ul><li>How to organize and implement a workflow system.</li><li>How to manage to-do lists effectively.</li><li>How to utilize time-blocking.</li><li>How to identify and manage the distractions that keep you from being productive.</li></ul>\n\tThe headshot\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b5449b3b0924e7862f522?format=jpeg\" alt=\"900 4\" height=\"900\" href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fthe-headshot-peter-hurley\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">The headshot, $11 (originally $29)</a></h2><p>In this class, Peter Hurley, author of \"The Headshot,\" reveals his methodology for capturing amazing headshot portraits.<br /><br />Hurley spent the last two years formulating these unique concepts into his highly anticipated book and will demonstrate how his simple techniques can help bring the best out of every person you photograph. His \"squinching\" phenomenon has gone viral and continues to have people using his signature lower lid move every time they step foot in front of a camera.</p>\n\tPortraits under pressure\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b547f15ea4b46c5118f85?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Victoria_Will_Portraits_Under_Pressure_WEB_1600x900\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fportraits-under-pressure-victoria-will\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Portraits under pressure, $39 (originally $99)</a></h2><p>Victoria Will's background as a photojournalist and celebrity photographer helped her develop techniques on editorial assignments to quickly connect with a subject. She'll show you how to use your environment to capture a unique image that reflects the person in the portrait. She'll also highlight how to quickly evaluate a less than perfect situation and make it work for you and your subject.&#160;</p><p>You'll learn:</p><ul><li>Techniques for choosing the light, process, and locations for a successful portrait.</li><li>How to build a rapport and utilize clear communication with your subjects.</li><li>How to set up a developed concept, as well as how to light on the fly.</li><li>Successful strategies for marketing yourself as a photographer and how to get your work in front of editors.</li></ul>\n\tAdobe Photoshop mastery: retouch and restore\n\t<figure>\n\t<img class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fphotoshop-mastery-retouch-and-restore-with-ben-willmore\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Adobe Photoshop mastery: retouch and restore, $19 (originally $49)</a></h2><p>Photographs are among our most treasured possessions, but not every photo was shot under optimal conditions or preserved in an ideal way, which makes photo restoration a big business opportunity for skilled photographers and retouchers.&#160;</p><p>If you want to answer every, \"can you fix it?\" with a resounding \"yes,\" Adobe Photoshop mastery with Ben Willmore is the class for you.</p><p>You'll learn how to tackle:</p><ul><li>Advanced color correction and enhancement techniques.</li><li>Retouching and scratch removal strategies.</li><li>Detail enhancements.</li><li>Folds, scratch, mildew, ink, and water stain repairs.</li><li>Reconstruction of missing pieces such as torn corners and rips.</li><li>How to fix faded images and make skin tones more lifelike.</li></ul><p>You'll also learn what actions to take, the optimal order to perform them, and which tools are right for the job. Ben will share time-saving tips and offer insights on the corrections that create the biggest impact.</p>\n\tThe magic of watercolor\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b54eedcd88c557a0f3656?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Malan 2\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fwatercolor02\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">The magic of watercolor, $19 (originally $49)</a></h2><section id=\"description\"><p>Join Molly Murrah for a fun, 5-week watercolor class for beginners. Learn about color, papers, brushes, drawing, and composition, as well as many great painting techniques that will get you working and playing with watercolors. The class will cover lessons such as paint properties, understanding color, the color wheel, mixing colors, light and shadow, and more.</p></section>\n\tHow to break the habit of self-doubt and build real confidence\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b55110b3c9b4bd12133d1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"900 5\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fhow-to-break-the-habit-of-self-doubt-and-build-real-confidence-mel-robbins\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">How to break the habit of self-doubt and build real confidence, $29 (originally $149)</a></h2><p>Mel Robbins is the most booked female speaker in the world, a serial entrepreneur, and a best-selling author. She is one of the most sought-after motivational instructors trusted by global brands to design and deliver life-changing, interactive experiences that inspire change, challenge thinking, and accelerate personal and professional growth.</p><p>If you are plagued by imposter syndrome, suffer from anxiety or low self-esteem, or fall into the trap of self-pity that keeps you from seeing positive outcomes, you're definitely not alone.</p><p>Mel will give you concrete, actionable advice and steps to overcome these problems and build the confidence to realize your dreams. After this class, you'll better understand your patterns, what to do to break unhealthy habits, act with courage, self-compassion, and overcome self-doubt so you can get what you want out of life.</p>\n\tColor for designers: exploration, theory, & application\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b5544c023204d4d07e4d5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"500\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fcolor-designers-exploration-theory-application-richard-mehl\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Color for designers: exploration, theory, &#38; application, $19 (originally $49)</a></h2><p>Our response to color comes from the place in our brain where trust, loyalty, behavior, and decision occur. Every successful project relies on a designer making smart choices about color.</p><p>In this class, Richard Mehl will give you a foundational understanding of color theory principles and demonstrate how to apply them. Richard has studied alongside design legends like Paul Rand, Bradbury Thompson, and Herbert Matter, and will share insights gleaned from 12 years of teaching and writing about color in design.</p><p>Richard takes an accessible approach to the serious study of color theory for designers. You'll be exposed to a relevant series of ideas and skills by exploring a range of analog and digital projects.</p><p>Richard will discuss:</p><ul><li>Color terminology and meaning.</li><li>How to view color in context.</li><li>Contrast grids and color illusion.&#160;</li><li>Tips for creating harmonious color palettes.</li></ul>\n\tExploring low-key portraiture\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b557adcd88c55eb633884?format=jpeg\" alt=\"180314_exploringlowkeyportraiture_lindseythomas_digitalweb_1600x900_final\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fexploring-low-key-portraiture-chris-knight\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Exploring low-key portraiture, $11 (originally $29)</a></h2><p data-overflowed=\"false\">Learn how to shoot and retouch with shadows and dark tones in this class led by photographer Chris Knight. Students study how to maximize details in dark imagery through lighting and post-production. Chris will take you from concept through execution covering simple (yet effective) lighting techniques as well as tethering tips with Adobe Lightroom.</p><p data-overflowed=\"false\">He'll also discuss how to develop the raw image, as well as retouching tactics to make your image appear powerful and purposeful.</p>\n\tWedding photography: capturing the story\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e8b55b373d0c85017450945?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Rocco_Ancora_Wedding_Photography_Capturing_the_Story_WEB_1600x900\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">CreativeLive</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2 data-overflowed=\"false\"><a href=\"http://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=59453&#38;urllink=www.creativelive.com%2Fclass%2Fwedding-photography-capturing-story-rocco-ancora-ryan-schembri\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Wedding photography: capturing the story, $19 (originally $49)</a></h2><p>The emotional and physical energy of weddings makes for good photography, but a wedding photographer does more than simple, passive documentation of the revelry. Great wedding photography immortalizes the story of the event by combining a mastery of technical skills in a highly dynamic environment, and the social skills to put people at ease and capture genuine moments.</p><p>Join Rocco Ancora and Ryan Schembri for this in-depth class on wedding photography and powerful storytelling. You'll learn:</p><ul><li>The fundamentals of shooting a wedding &#8212; lighting, exposure, and composition.</li><li>How to maximize the use of natural and artificial light to create the mood.</li><li>What to do once the wedding is over &#8212; image culling, album development, and sales.</li></ul><p>This class places heavy emphasis on developing strong posing and direction techniques and deploying them in a natural, non-confrontational manner. Rocco and Ryan believe that the job of the wedding photographer is to understand the story of the evening and to document it as a journalist would, with technical confidence and the mind on storytelling. All levels of wedding photographers will benefit from this class.&#160;</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a delivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn52@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-19-361_388cffcbdb1803f9.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn80@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-14-200_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn77@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-13-332_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=dLdf0WPROH0:fP5kxDMl9y0:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn51@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-15-858_192734cbfd2e2d50.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn48@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-20-505_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/dLdf0WPROH0":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn97@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-22-771_4b52dd85e38634ab.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683405},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"7 tips from travel writers on how to plan safe vacations during a pandemic","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-travel-advice-tips","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4cf94560bf1f00280796d8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Planning travel in pandemic\" height=\"1500\" width=\"1999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Archie Binamira/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Most travel in 2020 has been upended by the novel coronavirus pandemic.</strong></li><li><strong>As states reopened, travelers cautiously weighed options and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/popular-us-travel-destinations-booking\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">altered plans</a> and behavior to resume travel, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">but safely</a>.</strong></li><li><strong>This includes travel writers, who are sharing personal tips and advice below based on their experiences this summer.</strong></li><li><strong>If you're considering booking a last-minute getaway, seasonal deal, or discounted package for next year, factor in&#160;the following tips and advice.</strong></li><li><strong>Read more:&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"d826cec008a7f3c5fa2e19eae976b263\">Is travel safe? We interviewed experts on risks associated with flying, booking hotels or Airbnbs, renting cars, and more, plus ideas on safe vacations during COVID-19</a></strong></li></ul><p>Despite the sluggish pace of sheltering in place for six months now, Labor Day weekend is days away. Summer came, and in a flash, will be gone again. And while that trend is nothing new, it certainly looked a lot different this year.&#160;</p><p>Not only did our habits around <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/work-from-home-revolution-pandemic-us-economy-covid-19-2020-7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">working</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/post-coronavirus-more-americans-will-shop-online-for-groceries-2020-4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">shopping</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/eating-habits-during-covid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">eating</a> change, but so did summer travel. Instead of international trips, many stuck close to home for getaways accessible by car. Indeed, rather than<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/top-travel-places\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"> attempt my canceled spring trip</a> to Greece, I opted <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/where-to-travel-this-summer\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">for a long weekend in Cape Cod</a>.</p><p>And while summer may be winding down, and the novel coronavirus <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-records-4-million-covid-cases-2-weeks-3-million-2020-7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">continues to hit the US with record force</a>, the desire to escape the confines of our home &#8212; safely &#8212; is seemingly here to stay in one form or another. Just as many embarked on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/safe-vacations-during-covid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">safer summer travel during COVID-19</a>, travelers will likely book <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-labor-day-hotel-deals-us\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">last-minute summer deals</a>, socially distant <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-hotels-fall-foliage\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">leaf peeping this fall</a>, ski trips for winter, and take advantage of discounted, flexible packages into next year.</p><p>But before you rush to hit book, you may want to keep reading to heed timely advice from Insider Reviews travel writers. We're sharing our biggest takeaways based on how we altered our behaviors to safely travel during COVID-19, and what we plan to do differently next time.</p><p>Of course, it's crucial to assess your own risk and understand that without a vaccine, it's impossible to guarantee safety. Also, check whether you're leaving from or traveling to a hotspot, so as not to contribute to infection spikes, be aware of local mandates, and follow guidelines from the CDC and WHO such as wearing a mask, washing your hands, and social distancing, no matter where you go.</p><p>If you do choose to travel in the weeks and months ahead, consider making some of these modifications, proceed with caution, and remember that this is a fast-evolving situation. Flexible cancelation policies are everything right now.&#160;</p><h2>Keep reading for top tips and advice from travel writers on how to safely travel during coronavirus.</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\t1. Prefer to stay in hotels? Look for one that makes it easy to follow COVID-19 guidelines and take advantage of flexible cancellation policies.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4cfc497ffa48002894d192?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Seagrove credit hotels.com\" height=\"530\" width=\"706\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Hotels.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book your next trip on Hotels.com</a></h2><p>I <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/where-to-travel-this-summer#the-seagrove-suites-and-guest-rooms-eastham-massachusetts-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">previously wrote about</a> how I booked a small cottage-style hotel on Hotels.com for a weekend with my husband. We weren't comfortable flying, staying in large hotels, or planning a long road trip that required multiple stops and encounters with others. With <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/where-to-book-vacation-homes\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">vacation rentals either booked up or too expensive</a>, we selected a small property with standalone accommodations and private exterior entrances.&#160;</p><p>While I was initially nervous, I ultimately enjoyed my decision. I'm someone who loves hotels and I was able to enjoy the amenities only a hotel can provide (super clean renovated room, a pool) in a smaller setting akin to a private home.&#160;</p><p>My nerves weren't quelled immediately, but here's how I eased them: I opted for contactless check-in, brought my own pillow, and upon entering my room, wiped down high-touch surfaces, opened all the windows, and promptly left for three hours to air it out.</p><p>Heeding <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">these tips from experts</a> made us feel much more comfortable. More importantly, we knew our limits and established boundaries. We wanted to avoid restaurants, so we brought takeout back to the hotel's spaced out picnic tables. We limited our time at the beach to the morning when it was less crowded, and returned to the hotel to avoid public restrooms and use the small hotel pool when everyone else was still by the ocean. In doing so, we took advantage of on-site amenities we may not have otherwise and were able to still enjoy our vacation.</p><p>Next time though, I'm booking farther in advance with a generous cancellation policy so I can widen my scope of lodging choices. Many hotels offer significantly more flexible policies and fewer fees than you'll find on vacation rental platforms &#8212; take advantage of these deals. <strong><em>&#8212; Emily Hochberg, Insider Reviews travel editor</em></strong></p>\n\t2. Opt for multiple, short getaways to gauge your comfort with resuming travel.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d35cd60bf1f0028079814?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Camping road trip\" height=\"1666\" width=\"2222\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Thomas Barwick/Getty</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.expedia.com/?pwaLob=wizard-car-pwa\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book car rentals for your weekend getaway</a></h2><p>As a travel editor, I'm used to frequent global trips and typically go for flights over road trips and hotels over vacation rentals. But all that was upended in 2020.&#160;</p><p>This year, I opted for a few domestic trips, all within easy driving distance and social distancing in mind. Like many New Yorkers, I don't own a car, but after reading expert advice, I felt <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-rental-cars-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">safer renting a car</a> for short road trips than taking flights or trains. Similarly, I followed recommendations to stay in <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/which-is-safer-airbnb-hotels-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">vacation rentals</a> since there is less contact with others.</p><p>My first trip post-pandemic trip was to Cape Cod. I stuck to socially distant activities like biking and beach picnics in uncrowded areas. After I felt comfortable with that, I planned a short weekend trip to a campsite on Long Island since camping in your own designated area feels especially safe. Now, for the fall, I'm eyeing a similarly remote-but-nearby getaway to catch the fall foliage the Northeast is famous for.</p><p>While the pandemic often makes it hard to plan in advance, I've learned it's best to look for vacation rentals and car rentals as far out as possible. Both are becoming increasingly popular and booking up fast. If you can, opt for rentals that come with flexible cancellation policies so you have your bases covered, especially if you aren't sure how you feel about resuming travel. <strong><em>&#8212; Hannah Freedman, Insider Reviews associate travel editor</em></strong></p>\n\t3. Be open to types of travel you may have previously overlooked, and discerning with accommodations.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4cfdbf7ffa48002894d19a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"travel tips during the pandemic Airbnb\" height=\"960\" width=\"1280\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Airbnb</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://airbnb.pvxt.net/c/196318/264339/4273?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.airbnb.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Book a vacation rental on Airbnb</a>&#160;</h2><p>Staying at hotels is a big part of my job. But with COVID-19, the idea of communal spaces like hallways and lobbies made me anxious. For my 2020 summer vacation, I decided to try Airbnb. The idea of having an entire house for just my family felt much safer.&#160;</p><p>But beyond just picking a home within driving distance, I looked for one with a Superhost, stellar reviews, and followed <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/airbnb-new-cleaning-protocol\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Airbnb Enhanced Clean guidelines</a>.&#160;</p><p>I found that in this <a href=\"https://airbnb.pvxt.net/c/196318/264339/4273?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.airbnb.com%2Frooms%2F9795682%3Fsource_impression_id%3Dp3_1598881239_9BCykQgVccYAc21D\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">restored sawmill</a>. My Superhosts not only followed the Airbnb Enhanced Clean program, they also chose to leave the property empty for three days between guests.&#160;</p><p>Also, living in a house in a small town gave us a true taste of local life and after a few days, we no longer felt like tourists. The overall experience was more immersive than staying in a hotel, and we felt the right balance of privacy and togetherness.</p><p>I liked my experience so much, I came back a few weeks later and rented another property from the same hosts, an <a href=\"https://airbnb.pvxt.net/c/196318/264339/4273?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.airbnb.com%2Frooms%2F25269850%3Fsource_impression_id%3Dp3_1598881364_rNhv97z0lFKIwUNZ\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">airy apartment at an old boarding house</a>. It was equally spotless and fabulous. I am now hooked on Airbnb, pandemic or not.&#160; <strong><em>&#8212; Allison Tibaldi, freelance travel writer</em></strong></p>\n\t4. Speak to the hotel before you arrive to discuss concerns and ask questions about impacted services.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d13fd7ffa48002894d207?format=jpeg\" alt=\"The Landing Lake Tahoe Resort &#38; Spa\" height=\"800\" width=\"1066\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Booking.com</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book hotels on Booking.com</a></h2><p>My biggest tip for traveling during COVID-19 is to speak to the hotel before you book. The majority have reopened with limited amenities, meaning, the pool, spa, gym, and restaurants may be partially or completely closed.&#160;</p><p>Beyond that, try to get as much information as possible regarding how they're handling social distancing and protocols. If the hotel pool is open and your plan is to spend the day there, make sure there isn't a time limit per guest, which some hotels are doing, or if there is food and drink service available by the pool.</p><p>For example, on my recent weekend getaway to the Catskills, I didn't know the pool had a limit of only 10 people at a time and was with five other girls. We had to make sure we got to the pool extra early to ensure we had spots, which forced us to alter our morning plans.&#160;</p><p>Next time, I will check beforehand to plan accordingly. Plus, when you learn of the details before you book, you'll know how to adjust your expectations and still enjoy the experience. &#160;<strong><em>&#8212; Lindsay Paige Stein, freelance travel writer</em></strong></p>\n\t5. Work with a travel agent if you plan to visit another country.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d36657ffa48002894d2c5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"online banks customer service\" height=\"1436\" width=\"1915\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">HRAUN/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/travel-booking-tips-from-travel-agents-tour-operators\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read what travel agents want you to know about planning a vacation during COVID-19</a></h2><p>I'm based in Barcelona and when Americans can once again travel to Europe, they should be prepared for any eventuality. COVID restrictions, including social distancing, mask requirements, and even lockdowns, are constantly shifting, from one country to another, and sometimes even within a single country.</p><p>I'm generally a DIY-er when it comes to planning travel, but with Europe's COVID restrictions constantly in flux, it might be wise for Americans to use a travel agent when they can once again visit Europe.</p><p>An experienced agent can respond quickly to any COVID-related issue, whether it's arranging alternative destinations due to a lockdown or managing flights should any problems arise. You may recall in mid-March, following sweeping travel restrictions on Europe, Americans abroad were desperately seeking flights and spending thousands of dollars on return tickets. Hopefully, this won't occur again, but a travel agent is far better positioned to work with airlines to get you home. <strong><em>&#8212; Jennifer Ceaser, freelance travel writer</em></strong></p>\n\t6. Wake up early and do what makes you the most comfortable.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d36277ffa48002894d2c4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"croatia tourist face mask\" height=\"800\" width=\"1066\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.gettyimages.com/search/photographer?family=creative&#38;photographer=Marko&#43;Klaric&#43;%2F&#43;EyeEm\" target=\"_blank\">Marko Klaric/EyeEm/Getty Images</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/safe-vacations-during-covid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read our tips on how to plan for safe vacations during COVID-19</a></h2><p>Wake up early. Even when there's not a pandemic, I always try to avoid the crowds while traveling. During a recent trip to the Jersey Shore, I felt much freer to go for a run on the beach or bike down the boardwalk in the morning when there were fewer people.</p><p>And don't let yourself feel silly. If your vacation destination is more crowded than you anticipated, you might see a lot of people walking around without a mask. It's even possible that you'll be the only one following the rules. While no one will tell you to take your mask off, the pressure to fit in is real and can be strong. Be aware that this feeling might come up and be prepared to stick to your guns. <strong><em>&#8212; Jamie Ditaranto, freelance travel writer</em></strong></p>\n\t7. Consider other options besides flying or driving.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d357060bf1f0028079811?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Amtrak conductor\" height=\"745\" width=\"994\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Robert Alexander/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-train-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>Here's what experts say you should know about safe train travel during the pandemic</strong></a></h2><p>I'm loving Amtrak as an alternative to flying or driving and took it all the way from New Orleans to New York City.&#160;</p><p>The coach fares are comparable to flights and you don't have to worry about traffic. Plus, not having to deal with airports is a real bonus right now. Taking a train requires a little more time flexibility, but you'll have Wi-Fi and meals available on board so it's easy to work, relax, and watch movies. You'll also arrive right in a city center for added convenience without having to look for parking.</p><p>I hadn't traveled much by train prior to the pandemic, but I'm an absolute convert. The new Amtrak booking engine also shows you how full each service is, making it easier to book with social distancing in mind. <strong><em>&#8212; Paul Oswell, freelance travel writer</em></strong></p>\n\tFor more reporting on safe travel, click a link below to jump directly to related coverage:\n\t\n\t<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Is travel safe? We interviewed experts on risks associated with flying, booking hotels or Airbnbs, renting cars, and more, plus ideas on safe vacations during COVID-19</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-hotels-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Is it safe to stay in a hotel right now? An infectious disease doctor, a cleaning expert, and hotel reps all share what you should know before you check-in.</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-airbnbs-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Are Airbnbs safe? We spoke to experts, a company representative, and an Airbnb host to share everything you should know before booking someone's home.</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/which-is-safer-airbnb-hotels-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Which is safer: Airbnb or hotels? </figcaption> </img>\n</figure>\n<ul class=\"summary-list\">\n <li><strong>Competitive swimmers train with gear that, when used properly, helps improve their technique, strength, and endurance.</strong></li>\n <li><strong>As a recreational swimmer, I find certain items like my cap, a pair of goggles, and my waterproof iPod Shuffle essential to completing laps efficiently.</strong></li>\n <li><strong>Before jumping into the pool, grab a few or more of these 12 items to elevate your next swimming session.</strong></li>\n</ul>\n<p>If I arrive at the pool without a <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0079JHHTM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B0079JHHTM&amp;linkId=423064dc3478068d32697899381f091c3478068d32697899381f091c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">pair of goggles</a>, or my <a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">waterproof iPod shuffle</a>, I know my workout is doomed. These three items are essential to me completing any lap at a brisk pace. I know I'm not alone, too. So often I see recreational swimmers use other accessories to aid their workouts, but I didn't always understand their purposes.</p>\n<p>With several competitive (high school, club, collegiate, U.S. Masters) swimmers in my family, however, I learned about the advantages of different items. If used properly, gear like <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07NQ9CL4C/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07NQ9CL4C&amp;linkId=cbd024771a0e19f880dc597d2a3092e31a0e19f880dc597d2a3092e3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">fins</a>, and even <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Ffinis-swimmers-swim-snorkel-1221%2F%3F%26color%3D10804%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dgoogle-shopping%26campaignid%3D1662349812%26adgroupid%3D65165653198%26keyword%3D%26matchtype%3D%26targetid%3Dpla-438278798145%26device%3Dc%26creativeid%3D320296013494%26adposition%3D1o1%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMIwYz3xaym5QIVUdyGCh0x8QA_EAQYASABEgJXLPD_BwEBEgJXLPD_BwE\" rel=\"noopener\">practice stroke mechanics</a> and build strength and endurance.&nbsp;</p>\n<p>Whether you're training to improve your swim technique for competition or just like to hop in the pool for exercise, here are 12 pieces of gear designed to help boost your aquatic workouts.</p>\n<h2>Here's the best swim gear for enhancing your workout:&nbsp;</h2>\n<ul>\n <li><strong><a <li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-swim-gear-accessories#an-ankle-band-for-upper-body-strength-7\">An ankle band for upper body strength</a></strong></li>\n <li><strong><a tunes</a></strong></li>\n</ul> \n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n  Goggles to see underwater and protect your eyes \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fd324af9096e324a5de3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Swim Outlet</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fspeedo-womens-vanquisher-20-mirrored-goggle-8138578%2F%3Fq%3D1%26richrelevance%26SessionPurchaseCP%26item_pagerr1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Speedo Vanquisher 2.0 Mirrored Swim Goggles, $21.99, available on Swim Outlet</a></h3>\n <p>Whether you're swimming 20 or 200 laps, goggles are a vital piece of your swim kit. Besides allowing you to see clearly underwater, goggles protect your eyes from pool water, dirt, chlorine, and other cleaning chemicals. According to the <a href=\"https://www.aao.org/eye-health/tips-prevention/swimming-contacts-your-eyes\">American Academy of Ophthalmology</a>, chlorine washes away your eyes' protective layers of tears, leaving them vulnerable to irritating chemicals and harmful bacteria. Nobody wants anything to do with conjunctivitis — i.e. Pink eye.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>I've worn the <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fspeedo-womens-vanquisher-20-mirrored-goggle-8138578%2F%3Fq%3D1%26richrelevance%26SessionPurchaseCP%26item_pagerr1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Speedo Vanquisher 2.0 Mirrored Swim Goggles</a> for years. They're streamlined, comfortable, effectively keep water out, and provide fine underwater visibility.</p> Anti-fog spray to prevent fog build-up \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fd444af9096e587ae484?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Swim Outlet</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fjaws-quick-spit-antifog-6788%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">JAWS Quick Spit Antifog Spray, $7.95, available on Swim Outlet</a>&nbsp;</h3>\n <p>Fogged-up goggle lenses are a nuisance. Even worse, clearing them up means having to full stop, only to see them fog up again by the next lap. As gross (and potentially conjunctivitis-causing) as is sounds, I used to spit in my goggles, spread saliva on the inner lenses, and rinse them to prevent fogging. Then my competitive swimmer daughter shared her hack of using baby shampoo. But who's actually toting along baby shampoo and tissues (which you need to keep dry)?</p>\n <p>Instead, opt for the <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fjaws-quick-spit-antifog-6788%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">JAWS Quick Spit Antifog Spray</a>. Made in the USA with natural ingredients, this convenient spray is hypo-allergenic, alcohol-free, effective, easy to use, and much cleaner than actual saliva in preventing fogged-up lenses.</p> A swim cap to reduce drag \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fd564af9096e88340da3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0079JHHTM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B0079JHHTM&amp;linkId=423064dc3478068d32697899381f091c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Arena Classic Silicone Swim Cap, $10.56, available on Amazon</a></h3>\n <p>Even after pulling your hair back in a ponytail, stray strands always find a way to float into your face. Swimming like that is a drag — that also creates drag. Whether you have long or short hair, a <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0079JHHTM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B0079JHHTM&amp;linkId=423064dc3478068d32697899381f091c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">cap</a> creates a more streamlined head for better hydrodynamics.</p>\n <p>Although a cap doesn't keep hair dry, it is a barrier that prevents pool water from soaking it while offering protection from chlorine and keeping stray hair out of the pool (and filters). A cap also helps retain heat, which you lose quickly through your head. Some swimmers even wear two caps for extra warmth.</p>\n <p>Whether you wear one or two caps, you'll have a choice between going for silicone or latex. Silicone caps work well in avoiding pulling on your hair and are thicker than their latex counterparts. Though latex caps are thinner and more likely to pull your hair, they are more economical.&nbsp;</p> A kickboard to build core and leg strength \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fd684af9096eb369e077?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00A7HTE5I/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B00A7HTE5I&amp;linkId=367c6959040d79ed6d56b3fe8785cc96\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">FINIS Alignment Kickboard, $19.99, available on Amazon</a></h3>\n <p>A kickboard is key for honing proper kicking. It keeps your upper body still and above water while you concentrate on core and leg muscles for building strength. You can also hold the kickboard vertically to provide increased resistance when pushing through the water.</p>\n <p>Most people are used to the traditional tombstone-shaped kickboard, but that shape and size may be uncomfortable for some, particularly in the shoulders. The triangular <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00A7HTE5I/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B00A7HTE5I&amp;linkId=367c6959040d79ed6d56b3fe8785cc96\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">FINIS Alignment Kickboard's top strap</a> allows swimmers to use it without having to grip the sides, thus taking pressure off their shoulders. This model is versatile for practicing standard kicking, side kicking, and one-arm drills.&nbsp;</p> Hand paddles for arm strength and stroke technique \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fd7ecc4a0a27b4328b17?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07NQ9CL4C/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07NQ9CL4C&amp;linkId=cbd024771a0e19f880dc597d2a3092e3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">FINIS Agility Paddles, $20.89 - $31.99, available on Amazon</a></h3>\n <p>When used properly, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07NQ9CL4C/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07NQ9CL4C&amp;linkId=cbd024771a0e19f880dc597d2a3092e3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">hand paddles</a> are great for increasing power and speed as well as working on arm stroke mechanics. They also create resistance in the water which helps further develop arm strength.</p>\n <p>There are a few caveats, however: Don't use hand paddles that are more than 10% larger than your hand, don't use them for more than a quarter of your workout, and don't develop bad habits like spreading your fingers apart to hold the paddle. Using hand paddles that are too large and for too long can often strain arms and shoulders.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>The Finis Agility Paddles are a great choice for swimmers because they don't require straps, which helps reduce unwanted pressure on your hands.&nbsp;</p> An ankle band for upper body strength \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fda24af9096f2a61403a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Swim Outlet</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Ffinis-pulling-ankle-band-13414%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">FINIS Pulling Ankle Band, $4.79 on sale </a><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Ffinis-swimmers-swim-snorkel-1221%2F%3F%26color%3D10804%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dgoogle-shopping%26campaignid%3D1662349812%26adgroupid%3D65165653198%26keyword%3D%26matchtype%3D%26targetid%3Dpla-438278798145%26device%3Dc%26creativeid%3D320296013494%26adposition%3D1o1%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMIwYz3xaym5QIVUdyGCh0x8QA_EAQYASABEgJXLPD_BwE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">(originally $5.99)</a><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Ffinis-pulling-ankle-band-13414%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">, available on Swim Outlet</a></h3>\n <p>Another way to strengthen your upper body is to wear an <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Ffinis-pulling-ankle-band-13414%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">ankle band</a>. To prevent kicking during pull sets, strap a band around your ankles to keep your feet together. An ankle band can be used with a pull buoy to keep the body in alignment, or without a pull buoy to really work our abdominal muscles by forcing you to prevent your legs from sinking on your own.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>&nbsp;</p> Fins to improve endurance and align your posture \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fdb34af9096f7670be65?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Swim Outlet</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fbettertimes-floating-swim-fins-1264%2F%3F%26size%3D10924%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dgoogle-shopping%26campaignid%3D1662349812%26adgroupid%3D65758352762%26keyword%3D%26matchtype%3D%26targetid%3Dpla-803089938405%26device%3Dc%26creative\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Bettertimes Tritan Floating Swim Fins, $21.95, available on Swim Outlet</a></h3>\n <p>A proper pair of fins help propel you through the water with increased power and speed, while also keeping your feet elevated for an aligned posture.&nbsp;My niece, who swims in college, notes that her coach has her teammates wear longer fins for power and shorter fins for endurance while training.</p>\n <p>The <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fbettertimes-floating-swim-fins-1264%2F%3F%26size%3D10924%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dgoogle-shopping%26campaignid%3D1662349812%26adgroupid%3D65758352762%26keyword%3D%26matchtype%3D%26targetid%3Dpla-803089938405%26device%3Dc%26creative\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Bettertimes Tritan Floating Swim Fins</a> are great for a variety of training sessions with their long-blade fins and a closed-ankle design for support.</p> A snorkel to keep your body aligned \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fdc04af9096f95628ca5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Swim Outlet</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Ffinis-swimmers-swim-snorkel-1221%2F%3F%26color%3D10804%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dgoogle-shopping%26campaignid%3D1662349812%26adgroupid%3D65165653198%26keyword%3D%26matchtype%3D%26targetid%3Dpla-438278798145%26device%3Dc%26creativeid%3D320296013494%26adposition%3D1o1%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMIwYz3xaym5QIVUdyGCh0x8QA_EAQYASABEgJXLPD_BwE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">FINIS Swimmer's Swim Snorkel, $26.99 on sale (originally $29.99), available on Swim Outlet</a></h3>\n <p>You may think it's unnecessary to throw on a snorkel while swimming laps but wearing one allows you to practice streamlining your strokes while continuously staying face-down in the water. You're able to better focus on freestyle and breaststroke technique without having to turn or raise your head to breathe.</p>\n <p>The <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Ffinis-swimmers-swim-snorkel-1221%2F%3F%26color%3D10804%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dgoogle-shopping%26campaignid%3D1662349812%26adgroupid%3D65165653198%26keyword%3D%26matchtype%3D%26targetid%3Dpla-438278798145%26device%3Dc%26creativeid%3D320296013494%26adposition%3D1o1%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMIwYz3xaym5QIVUdyGCh0x8QA_EAQYASABEgJXLPD_BwE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">FINIS Swimmer's Swim Snorkel</a> helps keep your body aligned and head properly positioned, and also stays on during flip turns.</p> A mesh bag for equipment \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fdcf4af9096fdd4b0e32?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Swim Outlet</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fsporti-mesh-bag-with-zipper-pocket-8163775%2F%3Frec%3Dtop_primary%2Bbrand\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Sporti Mesh Bag, $6.36 on sale (originally $7.95), available on Swim Outlet</a></h3>\n <p>If you use fins, hand paddles, a buoy, and really any variety of gear from this list, you'll need a large bag to lug everything to the pool and back. Your best option is to invest in a reliable mesh bag that's capable of not just fitting everything you need, but allowing wet gear to air dry when you're done.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>At 18 inches by 29.5 inches, the <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&amp;mid=41206&amp;u1=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.swimoutlet.com%2Fp%2Fsporti-mesh-bag-with-zipper-pocket-8163775%2F%3Frec%3Dtop_primary%2Bbrand\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Sporti Mesh Bag with Zipper Pocket</a> fits plenty in its main compartment and even has corner zip pockets for carrying smaller items like keys or a wallet.</p> Hair towels for a convenient way to dry your hair \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fdf0cc4a0a289f689168?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Bed Bath and Beyond</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://goto.walmart.com/c/196318/565706/9383?veh=aff&amp;sourceid=imp_000011112222333344&amp;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FTurbie-Twist-The-Original-Microfiber-Super-Absorbent-Hair-Towel%2F43340806%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Turbie Twist Hair Towels, $4.98, available on Bed Bath and Beyond</a></h3>\n <p>This is an essential after swim item for anyone with long hair. You may look like you're at a spa rather than a pool, but its convenience and dryness trump appearance. You'll also be able to avoid excessively dripping water while toweling off and changing into dry clothes. Plus, if you need to run to your car in cold weather while your hair is still wet, a hair towel can be a lifesaver.</p>\n <p>These absorbent microfiber <a href=\"https://goto.walmart.com/c/196318/565706/9383?veh=aff&amp;sourceid=imp_000011112222333344&amp;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FTurbie-Twist-The-Original-Microfiber-Super-Absorbent-Hair-Towel%2F43340806%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Turbie Twist Hair Towels </a>in neutral white give off of a vibe much more akin to \"I-just-swam-a-mile\" than \"I-just-had-my-hair-done.\"</p> A backpack that can be filled to the brim \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fdfdcc4a0a28dd2d3765?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07MVXMPSS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07MVXMPSS&amp;linkId=a52e1ec474b7913d93481aa905923da5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Speedo Teamster Backpack, $47.48 on sale (originally $64), available on Amazon</a></h3>\n <p>When I started swimming, I realized the value of a backpack designed specifically for the sport. Where the mesh bag excels with a minimal amount of gear, a proper backpack helps when you have more than just the basics.</p>\n <p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07MVXMPSS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07MVXMPSS&amp;linkId=a52e1ec474b7913d93481aa905923da5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Speedo's Teamster Backpack</a> fits everything from goggles and towels to spare suits and hand paddles. It has plenty of convenient storage space, including a front mesh pocket perfect for toting a wet bathing suit and flip-flops. This backpack also has a wide, rubber-like water-resistant bottom that keeps it standing upright on a wet pool deck and keeps interior items dry.</p> A waterproof iPod Shuffle to motivate you to keep going \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da9fe0bcc4a0a29055eba74?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14 important pieces of swim gear\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07ZJTQXXL/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07ZJTQXXL&amp;linkId=bbc4941c47d288a4abdfbdc4a1ff1253\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Underwater Audio Waterproof iPod Shuffle (Renewed), $195, available on Amazon</a></h3>\n <p>This <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07ZJTQXXL/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07ZJTQXXL&amp;linkId=bbc4941c47d288a4abdfbdc4a1ff1253\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">waterproof iPod shuffle</a> was a complete game-changer for me. Instead of taking breaks between laps and staring at the wall, I now swim continuously without stopping — much. While listening to podcasts or my favorite playlists, I swim harder and longer, ultimately completing more laps in a shorter amount of time. It allows me to avoid getting bored or driving myself crazy overthinking while staring at the bottom of the pool — or ceiling during backstroke.</p>\n <p>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07ZJTQXXL/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipf_101819_swim-gear-for-workout-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B07ZJTQXXL&amp;linkId=bbc4941c47d288a4abdfbdc4a1ff1253\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Underwater Audio Waterproof iPod Shuffle</a> bundle comes not just with the music player but also with a set of waterproof earbuds of various sizes. Just load up it with music, audiobooks, and/or podcasts and enjoy your swim. It's a refurbished (or renewed, as Amazon puts it) model but works just the same and comes with a 90-day return policy.</p> \n</div>\n<div class=\"read-original\">\n Read the original article on \n <a
