Mao)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f03790f4dca6865a313b403?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn83@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-03-914_df79ad5734da576f.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fd324af9096e324a5de3?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn51@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-09-369_449e2894906fd092.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fd444af9096e587ae484?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn66@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-11-519_f466b0fa369eb24c.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fd564af9096e88340da3?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn91@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-18-703_3fcecd1298c19417.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fd684af9096eb369e077?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn78@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-09-672_533e782fde58f0ad.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fd7ecc4a0a27b4328b17?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn85@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-11-576_2d7f7654ec9e4803.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fda24af9096f2a61403a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn24@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-09-264_06f82efeab8afc5c.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fdb34af9096f7670be65?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn51@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-13-097_92e21d988b174b70.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fdc04af9096f95628ca5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn44@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-20-478_12594d72f3482dac.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fdcf4af9096fdd4b0e32?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn76@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-09-763_2c20da563349b631.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fdf0cc4a0a289f689168?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn9@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-13-448_dbf9c762c768bc00.webp","https://i.insider.com/5da9fdfdcc4a0a28dd2d3765?format=jpeg":null,"https://i.insider.com/5da9fe0bcc4a0a29055eba74?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn30@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-10-932_68a19770a838899f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=6OBw5AV9L0g:MqVq7vvRZwg:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn81@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-11-453_80dac1fbc296bc8d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn80@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-14-200_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn77@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-13-332_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=6OBw5AV9L0g:MqVq7vvRZwg:gIN9vFwOqvQ":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn48@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-20-505_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/6OBw5AV9L0g":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn1@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-10-900_4e90664ada9983ca.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683396},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"Trump defended Kyle Rittenhouse, a 17-year-old supporter of his charged with double homicide in Kenosha","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-defends-kyle-rittenhouse-charged-with-homicide-in-kenosha-2020-8","description":"<figure> \n <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d8fac60bf1f00280799ba?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages 1228245630\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\"> \n  <figcaption>\n   A man wears a shirt calling for freedom for Kyle Rittenhouse, 17, the man who allegedly shot protesters in Wisconsin, during a US President Donald Trump Campaign Rally, the day after the end of the Republican National Convention, at Manchester airport in Londonderry, New Hampshire on August 28, 2020. \n   <p class=\"copyright\">JOSEPH PREZIOSO/AFP via Getty Images</p> \n  </figcaption> </img>\n</figure>\n<ul class=\"summary-list\">\n <li>President Donald Trump, at a press conference on Monday, defended Kyle Rittenhouse, a 17-year-old supporter charged with double homicide in connection with the killing of two men in Kenosha, Wisconsin.</li>\n <li>\"That was an interesting situation,\" Trump said. \"He was trying to get away from them, I guess, it looks like, and he fell, and then they very violently attacked him.\"</li>\n <li>Trump did not mention that, prior to the scene he described, authorities say Rittenhouse had already shot and killed another person, according to a criminal complaint filed on Friday.</li>\n <li>Rittenhouse was charged with first-degree reckless homicide, first-degree intentional homicide, and attempted first-degree intentional homicide.</li>\n <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>President Donald Trump refused to condemn the actions of a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kenosha-shooting-suspect-attended-trump-rally-2020-8\">17-year-old supporter</a> who has been charged with double homicide in connection with the killings of two men last week in Kenosha, Wisconsin.</p>\n<p>\"That was an interesting situation,\" Trump said at a press conference on Monday, regarding the actions of <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/category/kyle-rittenhouse\">Kyle Rittenhouse</a>. \"He was trying to get away from them, I guess, it looks like, and he fell, and then they very violently attacked him.\"</p>\n<p>Trump did not mention that, prior to the scene he described, Rittenhouse — a vigilante who crossed state lines to patrol the streets of Kenosha amid protests and unrest in the wake of the <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/picture-details-jacob-blake-black-man-shot-by-police-kenosha-2020-8\">police shooting of Jacob Blake</a> — had already shot and killed another person: Joseph Rosenbaum, showing \"utter disregard for human life,\" according to a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kenosha-kyle-rittenhouse-charged-with-first-degree-homicide-2020-8\">criminal complaint the state of Wisconsin filed last Friday</a>.</p>\n<p>An autopsy revealed that Rosenbaum was shot multiple times, including in the back, fracturing his pelvis and perforating his right lung and liver. He also had gunshot wounds to his thigh and forehead.</p>\n<p>Rittenhouse has been charged with first-degree intentional homicide, first-degree reckless homicide, and attempted first-degree intentional homicide, among other charges.</p>\n<blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">\n —Aaron Rupar (@atrupar) \n <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300557880001794049?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 31, 2020</a>\n</blockquote>\n<script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script>\n<p>Rittenhouse's attorney has claimed the shootings were in self-defense, but the criminal complaint says video of the incident that police reviewed showed the victim \"appears to be unarmed.\"</p>\n<p>The complaint says that after the first shooting, Rittenhouse, who was carrying an assault weapon, tried to flee, prompting a chase, during which he fell and then shot two men, Anthony Huber and Gaige Grosskreutz, killing the former and severely wounding the latter.</p>\n<p>\"He was in very big trouble,\" Trump claimed. \"He probably would have been killed. It's under investigation.\"</p>\n<p>But according to the criminal complaint, and video of the incident that law enforcement reviewed, Huber was not attempting to kill anyone; rather, he \"appears to be trying to pull the gun away from the defendant.\"</p>\n<p>According to an autopsy, Huber died of a \"gunshot wound to his chest that perforated his heart.\"</p>\n<h2>Biden immediately condemned Trump's comments</h2>\n<p>Former Vice President Joe Biden, in a statement, condemned Trump's comments.</p>\n<p>\"Tonight, the president declined to rebuke violence,\" Biden said. \"He wouldn't even repudiate one of his supporters who is charged with murder because of his attacks on others. He is too weak, too scared of the hatred he has stirred to put an end to it.\"</p>\n<blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">\n —Sarah Mucha (@sarahmucha) \n <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1300574493023375361?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 31, 2020</a>\n</blockquote>\n<script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script>\n<p>Initially, Trump's reelection campaign sought to distance the president from Rittenhouse, who <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kenosha-shooting-suspect-attended-trump-rally-2020-8\">attended a January 2020 rally</a> for the president, <a href=\"https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/ellievhall/kenosha-suspect-kyle-rittenhouse-trump-rally\">as BuzzFeed News first reported</a>.</p>\n<p>\"President Trump has repeatedly and consistently condemned all forms of violence,\" <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kenosha-shooting-suspect-attended-trump-rally-2020-8\">a spokesperson said on Wednesday</a> — despite the president <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=14&amp;v=WIs2L2nUL-0&amp;feature=emb_titlemb_title\">encouraging violence against protesters and hecklers at his campaign rallies</a>. \"This individual had nothing to do with our campaign, and we fully support our fantastic law enforcement for their swift action in this case.\"</p>\n<p><em>Have a news tip? Email this reporter: <a href=\"mailto:cdavis@insider.com\">cdavis@insider.com</a></em></p>\n<div class=\"read-original\">\n Read the original article on \n <a src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/T2tIi3A7-8o\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\" />","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 01 Sep 2020 00:52:00 +0000","feedId":2931,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f4d8fbd7ffa48002894d478?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"18ea9e0eec52eee03fbfb2e9e3d0c427","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn52@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-08-034_c88595f9b6af29d7.webp","destWidth":2217,"destHeight":1662,"sourceBytes":173404,"destBytes":173404,"author":"cdavis@insider.com (Charles Davis)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f4d8fac60bf1f00280799ba?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn48@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-17-646_37b177fb9d7e5566.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=T2tIi3A7-8o:XSeJIpv_HJU:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn8@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-20-168_654b8ef7ae2f308a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn80@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-14-200_99a57cc2511f53cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=bcOpcFrp8Mo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn77@2020_4/2020/09/01/02-18-13-332_403f715e664a4d00.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?i=T2tIi3A7-8o:XSeJIpv_HJU:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn20@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-09-461_a9ab3a5c45626bc8.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn48@2020_2/2020/09/01/02-18-20-505_be4dce30169e75ab.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn89@2020_6/2020/09/01/02-18-22-732_c4d57f9dd1ff11a2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn71@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-24-178_0165ab2292566722.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?d=7Q72WNTAKBA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn61@2020_3/2020/09/01/02-18-14-887_b28aa1f69f1eb446.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider/~4/T2tIi3A7-8o":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn55@2020_5/2020/09/01/02-18-22-407_4ced44548c274060.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683401},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"Alternative meat startup is hoping this 3D-printed steak could upend the meat industry","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/3d-printed-steak-redefine-meat-alternative-meat-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d621960bf1f002807993a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"3d steak\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Redefine Meat&#39;s 3D-printed vegan steak.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><div class=\"insider-raw-embed\"><iframe src=\"https://www.facebook.com/plugins/video.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2FBusinessInsiderToday%2Fvideos%2F1210324305999993%2F&show_text=false&width=734&height=411&appId\" width=\"734\" height=\"411\" style=\"border:none;overflow:hidden\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowtransparency=\"true\" allow=\"encrypted-media\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></iframe></div><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Israeli startup Redefine Meat is racing to develop a 3D-printed steak that can rival the taste and texture of real meat.</li><li>Steak is one aspect of the rapidly growing alternative meat industry that is yet to hit the mainstream.</li><li>The global alternative meat market is projected to reach a value of $8.1 billion by 2026.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/BusinessInsiderToday/\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">View more episodes of Business Insider Today on Facebook.</a></strong></li></ul><p>It may look like Play-Doh. But it's actually a 3D-printed steak.</p><p>It's made by the Israeli alternative meat startup <a href=\"https://www.redefinemeat.com/\">Redefine Meat</a>, and the technology behind it is one of many contenders in today's sizzling hot, international race to capitalize on the growing faux-meat market.</p><p>Redefine Meat isn't focusing on alternatives to ground beef or sausages, but whole-cut steaks &#8212; an area of the market that has yet to hit the mainstream.</p><p>\"There is an amazing industry of alternative meat that is focused on minced meat. And actually the meat industry is driven by the whole muscle cuts,\" CEO Eshchar Ben-Shitrit told Reuters. \"Steaks, roast, slow-cooking, grilling &#8212; everything that an animal can do we want to do the same or even better.\"</p><p>Ben-Shitrit is focused on creating industrial-level 3D printers that would ultimately be sold to meat distributors around the globe and become part of the meat supply chain.</p><p>\"The idea is to replace a cow. So each of our machines produce in a day exactly like a cow, up to 250 [kilograms] in a single day,\" he said.</p><p>Faux meat is believed to be significantly better for the environment, requiring less water and energy and releasing fewer fossil fuels than livestock &#8212; the CEO calls it \"the best way to fight climate change, to deliver healthier solutions and food to the entire population of the planet.\"</p><p>At this stage in development, Redefine Meat is not disclosing how much the printers will cost. The plan is to keep the price of their 3D-printed steaks comparable to traditional ones, which can range from $5 to $12 per pound.</p><p>The company aims to debut the steaks at high-end restaurants in Israel, Switzerland, and Germany by the end of 2020.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d64787ffa48002894d405?format=jpeg\" alt=\"3d steak\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Israeli company hopes to release machines that can print 44 pounds of faux steak an hour.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>But it will be a while before the printers are part of the meat-industrial complex. Currently the machines only produce up to 13 pounds of meat an hour, and next year, the company plans to release a new generation of machines that will print 44 pounds an hour.&#160;</p><p>By comparison, American slaughterhouses can collectively process over 100,000 cows a day, each of which yields hundreds of pounds of beef.</p><p>In the meat industry, profit margins are greatest on whole-animal cuts, like steaks. The key to those profits is creating a product with the same taste and texture as traditional meat, Redefine Meat food engineer Alexey Tomsov said.</p><p>\"We analyzed the different components that make those beautiful cuts and and &#8230; we identified three main components &#8212; the muscle, the blood, and the fat,\" he said. \"These are the components that we need to mimic in order to reach the perfect, beautiful steak.\"</p><p>Redefine Meat's recipe contains soy and pea proteins, coconut fat, and sunflower oil, among other ingredients. Although the full list is secret, the company says all ingredients are plant-based and vegan.</p><p>The company has some competition.&#160;Israel is a hotspot for alternative meat companies, developing both lab-grown and 3D-printed food. In Spain, the startup Novameat is also working on 3D-printed steaks, and also recently developed a whole-muscle version of pork. Big companies including Tesco and Unilever are developing plant-based meats, too.</p><p>Venture capital money is pouring in and the global faux meat market is projected to reach a value of $8.1 billion by 2026, <a href=\"https://www.alliedmarketresearch.com/press-release/global-meat-substitute-market.html\">according to Allied Market Research</a>.</p><p>They're all racing to convince consumers that a lab-grown product can taste as good as the real thing.</p><p>\"At the end of the day, technology is important, but what's more interesting is to have a really delicious and tasty food product that you can cut through and have a bite, and be excited,\" Ben-Shitrit said.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/3d-printed-steak-redefine-meat-alternative-meat-2020-8'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/typepad/alleyinsider/silicon_alley_insider?a=-eQxJNgjOsM:7c3x4twCUEk:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img _insider/~4/-eQxJNgjOsM":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn61@2020_1/2020/09/01/02-18-12-216_624115332e23f1fe.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598926683402},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"The best reusable shopping and tote bags","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-reusable-shopping-tote-bag","description":"<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Reusable shopping bags and totes are a great way to cut down on plastic and paper usage and lessen your carbon footprint in your grocery routine.</strong></li><li><strong>As more states and municipalities ban the use of disposable plastic bags while charging for paper, bringing your own bag is a simple and smart solution.</strong></li><li><strong>Our top pick, the </strong><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QJA52KS/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&linkCode=sl1&tag=bitht_022820_factory-reset-amazon-echo-20&linkId=ca886f54491b46af6328d0edf1b4fa25&language=en_USp;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">BagPodz Reusable Bag and Storage System</a><strong>, makes it easy to store your shopping bags so they don't clutter your space.</strong></li></ul><p>In March 2020, New York became the second state to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/new-york-plastic-bag-ban-delay-2020-2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">ban the use of plastic bags</a> at most stores, following California and hundreds of cities in other states. In addition, New York City and other municipalities have imposed a tax on shoppers who need single-use paper bags.</p><p>The easiest way to avoid this inconvenience and fees is to bring your own reusable bags. But there are also added benefits: Reusable shopping bags are stronger than the plastic bags that stores distribute, and they are environmentally friendly since they help cut down on waste and lessen your carbon footprint. Even in many where there aren't any bans on plastic bags, some retailers encourage shoppers to use their own bags.</p><p>Most reusable shopping bags are made of nylon or canvas and come in all shapes and sizes. Though they look similar on the surface, there are subtle differences that make some reusable shopping bags perform better than others. Some, like our top pick, come with their own storage solutions, and others are just cuter and sturdier than the competition.</p><h2>The best reusable shopping and tote bags:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Best reusable overall: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QJA52KS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B00QJA52KS&linkId=273b4cc6b47999c7a2dd55b836db21afb47999c7a2dd55b836db21af\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">BagPodz Reusable Bag and Storage System</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best canvas: <a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkpMRUJGSEhLR01CRkpMTUlO?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaggu.com%2Fcollections%2Fduck-bag&sid=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bagsbags\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Baggu Duck Bag</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best waxed: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B075963J6Z/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B075963J6Z&linkId=4c11321dec99f1ea8f770feb0bf0defeec99f1ea8f770feb0bf0defe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Colony Co. Reusable Grocery Bag</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best under $10: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X86681I/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B00X86681I&linkId=bd31d57b128a9c021cb7882a4af150ca128a9c021cb7882a4af150ca\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Easy Fold Bag Reusable Grocery Bags 3 Pack</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best large size: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07H51Q9LV/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B07H51Q9LV&linkId=a850bd5e18c02135cd34d8ddcab64d6c18c02135cd34d8ddcab64d6c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Baggu Large Reusable Shopping Bag</a></strong></li></ul><p><em>Updated 8/31/2020. We updated prices and links and added a selection of related buying guides.</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c86932c2628984df726af44?format=jpeg\" alt=\"bagpodz reusable storage system\" height=\"1125\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QJA52KS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00QJA52KS&#38;linkId=273b4cc6b47999c7a2dd55b836db21af\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">BagPodz Reusable Bag and Storage System</a> comes with several nylon shopping bags, plus a pouch to hold them all together without taking up too much space.</h3><p>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QJA52KS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00QJA52KS&#38;linkId=273b4cc6b47999c7a2dd55b836db21af\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">BagPodz Reusable Bag and Storage System</a> comes in sets of five or 10 shopping bags made of sustainable, water-resistant, machine washable nylon. These are ideal for transporting groceries.</p><p>This set is unique because it comes with a compact pouch that holds the bags for easy storage in a cabinet or the trunk of a car when they're not in use. There's a clip on one end that attaches to a shopping car, so you don't have to juggle with them in the middle of the produce aisle. If you always forget to bring enough bags when shopping, having them all in a convenient place would help.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Comes with multiple bags, storage pouch, clip for shopping cart</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Limited designs</p>\n\tThe best canvas\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c8696082628984e6857e74b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Duck Bag Canvas Tote copy\" height=\"631\" width=\"841\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Baggu</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkpMRUJGSEhLR01CRkpMTUlO?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaggu.com%2Fcollections%2Fduck-bag&#38;sid=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Baggu Duck Bag</a> is an attractive and sturdy canvas tote suitable for a variety of lifestyles and purposes.</h3><p>For a reusable shopping bag that could double as, well, a regular bag, look at the <a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkpMRUJGSEhLR01CRkpMTUlO?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaggu.com%2Fcollections%2Fduck-bag&#38;sid=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Baggu Duck Bag</a>. Adorable name aside, this is a nice-looking and practical canvas tote. You could easily take it from the office to the grocery store, or as an everyday tote.</p><p>The <a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRkpMRUJGSEhLR01CRkpMTUlO?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaggu.com%2Fcollections%2Fduck-bag&#38;sid=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Duck Bag</a> snaps shut, has an interior zipper pocket, and two sets of straps &#8212; top handles and shoulder straps. It's a bit more structured than other reusable bags, so it's well-suited to more than just groceries. That said, despite the deep compartment, the size makes it better for smaller runs than your big weekly shopping haul.</p><p>But the slouchy material and artfully worn fabrics create a cool, lived-in effect. These bags are machine washable but should be hung to dry to prevent fading. While the structure and thicker fabric make it a bit more durable than some of its nylon counterparts, the shape is a bit restrictive so you likely can't carry as many items.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Stylish, durable, machine washable, multiple handles</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Not as large as some picks, expensive</p>\n\tThe best waxed\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c8696d5262898756f345199?format=jpeg\" alt=\"colony waxed canvas\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1440\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B075963J6Z/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B075963J6Z&#38;linkId=4c11321dec99f1ea8f770feb0bf0defe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Colony Co. Reusable Grocery Bag</a> is made of stylish, durable waxed canvas for a look inspired by old-school paper bags.</h3><p>Another stylish-meets-functional choice is the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B075963J6Z/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B075963J6Z&#38;linkId=4c11321dec99f1ea8f770feb0bf0defe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Colony Co. Reusable Grocery Bag</a>. Inspired by the look of a classic paper shopping bag, it's made of waxed canvas that is stain-resistant and easy to clean, though not machine washable.</p><p>The 16-ounce bag is shorter than it is wide and measures 17 inches tall, 12 inches wide, and 7 inches deep. It's also vegan and made with an eye toward sustainability, as most reusable grocery bags are. The brand also sells <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B074TBYVB3/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B074TBYVB3&#38;linkId=198abf4dfb02bd36a187c8c547e5bdcc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">reusable produce bags</a>, which would make a nice addition to any sustainable shopping routine.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Cute design, durable waxed canvas</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Only has top straps</p>\n\tThe best under $10\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c86975b2628983ed1331e0c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"easy fold\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X86681I/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00X86681I&#38;linkId=bd31d57b128a9c021cb7882a4af150ca\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Easy Fold Bag Reusable Grocery Bags 3 Pack</a> is a super affordable set of nylon bags that fold for easy transportation.</h3><p>If you're not looking to splurge, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00X86681I/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00X86681I&#38;linkId=bd31d57b128a9c021cb7882a4af150ca\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Easy Fold Bag Reusable Grocery Bags 3 Pack</a> is a great option. It comes with three ripstop nylon bags that fold for easy storage or transportation.</p><p>These are machine washable and, though not as attractive as some of the others on this list (the company is going more for utilitarian than style), they do come in three colors. At $9.98, you can't beat the price. They aren't as sturdy as some of the pricier options, based on reviews, but should still last a long while.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Affordable, pack of three, machine washable</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Fabric is a little shiny, not as sturdy as other picks</p>\n\tThe best large size\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c869a57262898076f759647?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Standard_Baggu_Ripstop_Black 04_170e81d6 99cf 4ae7 8bd4 7a72550e89bc_2048x2048\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Baggu</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07H51Q9LV/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07H51Q9LV&#38;linkId=a850bd5e18c02135cd34d8ddcab64d6c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Baggu Large Reusable Shopping Bag</a> is both stylish and practical, holding up to 50 pounds at a time.</h3><p>Need a super-sized shopping bag? The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07H51Q9LV/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_031119_best-reusable-shopping-bags-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07H51Q9LV&#38;linkId=a850bd5e18c02135cd34d8ddcab64d6c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Baggu Large Reusable Shopping Bag</a> holds up to 50 pounds and comes in a host of cute colors and patterns.</p><p>Made of sturdy 100% ripstop nylon, the bag is durable and flexible. Despite its large capacity, it folds down to a neat 7-by-7-inch square for easy storage. The material is both thin and strong, allowing you to carry a number of heavy items with ease. The bag is also machine washable.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Holds up to 50 pounds, machine washable, cute patterns, folds into small square</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Short handles, shapeless</p>\n\tSee more great grocery shopping guides\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e9e25c00fc63920eb6edd55?format=jpeg\" alt=\"groceries\" height=\"1414\" width=\"2121\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty Images/vgajic</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-online-grocery-store\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best places to buy groceries online</a></h3><p>Shopping for groceries online can be a convenient way to save time and ensure you can get the food you need. Here are the best options.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/online-seafood-delivery\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best places to buy fresh seafood online</a></h3><p>Navigating the e-commerce world for fresh, high-quality seafood is full of obstacles and trepidation, and the last thing you want is to end up with overpriced and weeks- or months-old fish at a premium price. We spent eight months sifting through the world of online seafood suppliers to find the best ones.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a 10:18:03","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 10:18:03","title":"The stock market is about to enter its worst month of the year after a historic August — but that doesn't mean investors should sell stock, LPL says","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-market-outlook-september-worst-month-year-lpl-strategy-buy-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f319ab22618b92e973db90c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"NYSE trader\" height=\"2280\" width=\"4560\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Drew Angerer/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>After a historic August, the stock market is about to enter its worth month of the year on average, according to a note from LPL published on Monday.</strong></li><li><strong>The S&#38;P 500 posted a gain of more than 7% in the month of August, marking its best return for the month since 1984, LPL said.</strong></li><li><strong>But investors shouldn't expect these gains to continue into the months of September and October, given that during election years, both months tend to be weak as investors divert focus to a November election.</strong></li><li><strong>On top of that, when the S&#38;P 500 was up more than 5% in August in 1986 and 2000, the market fell 8.5% and 5.4% in the following month, respectively, LPL said.</strong></li><li><strong>Despite the seasonal weakness, investors should use any dips in the market as opportunities to add to their longer-term core stock holdings, LPL said.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestmp;utm_medium=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><hr ><p>The stock market has experienced a surge in August, but investors shouldn't expect the gains to continue, at least not for the next two months, LPL said in a note published on Monday.</p><p>The S&#38;P 500 is up more than 7% in the month of August, marking its best return for the month since 1984, according to LPL.&#160;</p><p>This represents the first August on record that saw two separate six-day win streaks, LPL observed.</p><p>But what follows a strong August tends to be a weak September.</p><p>Since 1950, September has been the worst month of the year for stocks on average. And when August is a particularly strong month, September is an especially bad month for stocks.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong>&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-investing-championship-strategy-matthew-caruso-contender-secret-to-return-2020-8?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-position=\"5\" data-analytics-module=\"\">US Investing Championship hopeful Matthew Caruso landed a 382% return in the first half of 2020. He shares the unique twist he's putting on a classic trading strategy &#8212; and 3 stocks he's holding right now.</a></em></p><p>LPL's chief market strategist, Ryan Detrick, said \"the last two times August was up more than 5% were 1986 and 2000, the S&#38;P 500 fell 8.5% and 5.4% in September those years [respectively].\"</p><p>But election year throws a wrench into the average monthly market returns as measured by the S&#38;P 500.</p><p>During election years, both September and October tend to be weak months as investors prepare for an uncertain presidential election.</p><p>\"What caught our attention was both September and October have a negative return during election years, with October the worst month of the year,\" Detrick added.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d48a67ffa48002894d322?format=jpeg\" alt=\"lpl election chart 12.JPG\" height=\"695\" width=\"1557\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">LPL Research</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>During election years, the S&#38;P 500 returned an average decline of -0.2% in September and -0.7% in October during election years, according to LPL.</p><p>Despite the historical weakness in stocks for the months of September and October during election years, especially after a strong August, investors shouldn't sell their stocks now. Instead, they should do the opposite, LPL said.</p><p>While noting that the current rally in stocks is \"extremely stretched,\" Detrick recommended investors should \"continue to use any pullbacks as an opportunity to add to longer-term core equity holdings, as the economy continues to come back quicker than most expected,\" the note concluded.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original
